column2: Cursor not shown when typing a message
column3: You know the little pulsing bar that appears when writing something in a text box I'm sure i thas a name but I can not think of a better description right now Since 2 14 1 probably 2 14 it has disappeared from textsecure This obviously makes it hard and uncomfortable to write messages I like textsecure and I appreciate the effort you are putting into it really But do you even test the app before releasing updates Missing commas that screw the phones and make us lose messages huge usability problems that would have taken 10 seconds to notice I mean of course it is human to forget a comma or introduce bugs we all know it The problem is that testing should be considered fundamental even when you have beta testers Beta testers are supposed to find smaller problems not sacrifice their product for the sake of bugs That is what the developers should be doing Apologies if it sounds rude and thanks again

column2: Emoji category icons in drawer are not highlighted when selected
column3: Hello the Emoji catergory icons in the TextSecure Emoji drawer are not being highlighted when they are selected They simply remain gray when they are selected With Emoji category icons I mean the clock smiley flower bell car and symbol icons at the top of the Emoji drawer which allow to toggle between the different Emoji categories They are all gray and remain gray when selected But they should turn white when being selected so that they are visibly highlighted They also turn white on selection on the Google AOSP keyboard on the Telegram for Android Emoji drawer on the WhatsApp for Android Emoji drawer and so on TextSecure should do the same In the Telegram for Android and WhatsApp for Android Emoji drawers the scrollbar below the Emoji categories also has a different color than grey it is blue green there It would be nice if that scrollbar in TextSecure would also have a special color white would be okay as well I think to make it stick out a little more Could you please do that Regards

column2: native system emoji overriding TextSecure provided ones
column3: Hello the Emoji drawer in TextSecure currently is using the Google Noto Color Emoji Emoji set A lot of Android phones do not have the Google Noto Color Emoji Emoji set as their native system Emoji set though Samsung uses their own Emoji set LG uses their own Emoji set HTC uses their own Emoji set and so on You can see some of those Emoji sets over there Unfortunately though TextSecure does not replace the native system Emojis with the Google Noto Color Emoji Emojis when the native system Emojis are not the Google Noto Color Emoji Emojis like on Samsung LG and HTC devices for example So when Samsung LG HTC users tap on one of the Google Noto Color Emoji Emojis in the TextSecure Emoji drawer a Samsung LG HTC Emoji appears in the message input box and in the messages themselves and not the Google Noto Color Emoji Emojis the user actually selected So could you please replace overwrite the Emojis in the message input box and in the messages and everywhere else where it is possible with the Emojis that are being used in the Emoji drawer Telegram for Android also has a built in Emoji drawer and also has built in Emojis And Telegram for Android does replace overwrite the Emojis in the message input box and in the messages and everywhere else where it is possible with the Emojis that are being used in the Emoji drawer So it is possible to do it Could you please fix this and do it like Telegram for Android is doing it Regards

column2: Screenshot shown in Overview Recents if screen off with TextSecure in focus
column3: When context switching from TextSecure by Overview Recents or the home button the system behaves as expected a screenshot is not captured and a blank window is displayed in Overview Recents The issue occurs when TextSecure is in focus and the screen is shut off either by power button or timeout The screenshot then persists in Overview Recents until TextSecure is dismissed from the list even across reboots Screen security is enabled and logs indicate both that FLAG SUPPORTS PROTECTED BUFFERS is enabled on the display and that the screen capture should have failed with W SurfaceFlinger FB is protected PERMISSION DENIED Missing from the logs however is W WindowManager Screenshot failure taking screenshot for entry The system still captures caches and displays a screenshot of TextSecure in Overview Recents Device and software Google Nexus 5 D820 Android 5 1 LMY47I stock no superuser TextSecure master 14 May ab8593d also release v2 9 3 Steps to reproduce 1 Ensure the Screen security setting is enabled in TextSecure 2 Tap the Home button to get to the home screen 3 Tap the Overview Recents button dismiss TextSecure if listed 4 Launch TextSecure navigate to any desired screen 5 Press the power button to turn off the screen or wait for screen timeout 6 Press the power button to turn on the screen authenticate if necessary 7 Tap the Overview Recents button 8 Behold an allegedly secure window protected framebuffer Log timeout

column2: no more Release java
column3: 1 move PUSH URL from Release java into BuildConfig java 2 avoid redeclaration of proguard files prevents future 3127 3 move all packagingOptions exclusions into a single closure the first is necessary for my upcoming espresso test PR the second and third make our build file more readable which makes espresso test related changes easier to create and understand

column2: SMS as auto fallback
column3: Hello I think it would be really nice if a textsecure message has not been received it auto retries using the unsecured SMS ofcourse only optional disabled by defalt This is useful in many situations like roaming or even when you want to save battery and disable push or mobile networking completely and someone else tries to reach you So what I propose is to add an option to notify the user when his textsecure message has not been recieved for X minutes and or add an option to automatically send the same text via SMS to make sure it reaches the other one ditching the security for a moment when other things are more important For normal textsecure users this can be a rather frequent annoyance EDIT If possible maybe one should delete the secured TextSecure message if the auto falback SMS has been sent to avoid double sending

column2: Received a message that may have been incorrectly identified as encrypted with an old version of TextSecure
column3: I received an SMS from Google Calendar is SMS notification short code 48368 that TextSecure believes was encrypted with an out of date version of TextSecure I do not believe that Google uses TextSecure is encryption correct me if I'm wrong thus I'm lead to believe that TextSecure is incorrect in it is evaluation that the message was encrypted I am unable to retrieve the original encrypted text TextSecure simply displays the error text Received a message encrypted using an old version of TextSecure that is no longer supported Please as the sender to upgrade to the most recent version and resend the message Sent May 15th 2015 02 10 02 PM EDT I believe I was up to date at that time My current version of TextSecure is 2 14 5 on Android 5 1 I have since received another message from 48368 which was not evaluated as encrypted and displayed as a normal unencrypted SMS Is there any further information I can provide to help debug the issue Is there anyway to get the original raw SMS message from under that error

column2: A lot of Emojis are missing from Emoji drawer and Emoji ordering and categorization is incorrect
column3: Hello a lot of Emojis are missing from the TextSecure Emoji drawer When I say a lot of Emojis are missing then I am not referring to the fact that TextSecure is using an outdated Emoji set What I mean is that they are actually missing and should be there even in the oudated Emoji set I also noticed that the Emoji ordering and categorization is incorrect The Emojis in the categories have a different ordering than they should have and some Emojis are placed in the wrong categories The issue seems to be caused by the actual source files see Because those source files exhibit the same issues as mentioned above Here is a list of the Emojis which should be available in the outdated set and the list also shows the expected ordering and categorization of the Emojis see you can toggle between the different categories by clicking on the smiley flower bell car symbols icons in the upper right corner above the list But please note that Apple already seems to have introduced adopted a new Emoji category ordering system in their latest OS updates see Emoji Categories Prepare to re learn the position of your favorite emojis as they have all changed New categories have been introduced and emojis have been re arranged within the existing categories as well The new categories are People Nature Food Drink Celebration Activity Travel Places Objects Symbols Essentially many emojis that were previously in the People or Objects categories may now be in one of the new more specific categories Objects Symbols is now a catch all for the more obscure remaining characters So maybe it would make sense to adopt that new system So could you please add all the missing Emojis and ideally update to the new set while being at it and correct the ordering of the Emojis either to the traditional system or to the new system that Apple is already using It would be much appreciated Regards

column2: Emoji category selection bar on Emoji drawer too wide in certain circumstances becomes scrollable moveable
column3: Hello the TextSecure Emoji drawer renders outside of the visible screen area in certain circumstances Unfortunately I could not make a screenshot of it because I saw it happen on someone else is device It was a HTC Desire Bravo with an 3 7 inch 480 800 pixel screen running TextSecure 2 10 2 on an unofficial 4 4 4 KitKat based CyanogenMod 11 0 ROM with system font size set to maximum When the Emoji drawer was set to the recent clock icon category or to the people smiley icon category then everything seemed to be fine But when the Emoji drawer was set to another category like the nature flower icon category for example then the Emoji drawer was growing a bit towards the left side of the screen essentially making it render outside of the visible screen area it became wider than the actual screen width On a LG G2 with stock 4 4 2 KitKat ROM this does not happen So maybe it is related to the low screen resolution of the HTC Desire Bravo Again I could not take a screenshot but maybe you can reproduce it in an emulator or something like that when setting the screen resolution to 480x800 and setting system font size to maximum Could you please fix it Regards

column2: Espresso tests
column3: espresso prerequisites cleanup 1 move PUSH URL from Release java into BuildConfig java 2 avoid redeclaration of proguard files prevents future 3127 3 move all packagingOptions exclusions into a single closure espresso tests 1 bumped espresso core dependency to 2 1 2 removed unecessary testing support lib dependency 3 fixed proguard testing pro rules 4 use TS staging server for all tests 5 wrote a bunch of espresso tests 6 simplified the androidTest source set definition 7 added rule to optionally include espressoTest dir in androidTest source set 8 added gradle properties and test device numbers to gitignore FREEBIE we want to keep our espresso tests separate from our regular unit tests ideally we would do this by defining a new build target called espresso or whatever but this does not work because although gradle was nice enough to give us testBuildType there is only one test source set androidTest and gradle still considers it to be a magic special case so instead we optionally include the espressoTest directory into the androidTest source set defaulting to not included and overridden by setting the property espresso either through a gradle properties file or via command line parameter personally I would like to rename the androidTest directory unitTest or something more appropriate but kinda getting picky at that point p warning running the espresso tests will delete all contacts on your test device

column2: Memory leak fix for ContactSelectionListAdapter
column3: FREEBIE Relates to 3094 3092 3084 Because ContactSelectionListItem is used as a RecipientModifiedListener it leaks its context NewConversationActivity PushContactSelectionActivity which can lead to OOM crashes Here we keep a reference to the inflated views in order to unbind them whenever they become unused Because views are recycled while scrolling the adapter the HashSet stays the same size dependant on how many rows are visible on screen regardless of how many contacts you have scrolled through I used Square is new LeakCanary library to detect the leak and confirm the fix

column2: UTF 16 messages leads to 70 characters SMS
column3: For some reasons textsecure on my phone seems to send 16bit encoded SMS So I can only have 70 characters per SMS instead of 140 in 8bit or 160 in 7bit Is the character encoding choosed by TextSecure or is it enforced by android system I suspect 16bit encoding is mandatory for emoji but in the case if I do not use them could TextSecure switch to 8bit or 7bit if I do not even use accents This could cut by two my SMS budget

column2: Crash on Conversation All images
column3: Updated from master 14 May ab8593d to master 20 May 7ecc580 today TextSecure crashed when attempting to view All images on a conversation which contained images from before the update The crash seems to have been introduced in commit dc903e4 Device and software Google Nexus 5 D820 Android 5 1 LMY47I stock no superuser TextSecure master 20 May 7ecc580 also master 18 May dc903e4 Steps to reproduce 1 Install Textsecure master 18 May dc903e4 or later 2 Tap a conversation which contains images from before commit dc903e4 was installed 3 Tap the overflow menu then All images 4 Observe the app come crashing down Log CRASH git checkout 7ecc580 latest master

column2: Fix flickering emoji and periodic emoji vanishings
column3: fixes the issue with emoji flickering and should fix 3231 My hunch for the emoji being invisible until a forced invalidation is that I was calling View post in the drawable callback which only works when the view has been attached to the window In response I ensure the code actually runs and does so on the main thread Refactored our main thread Runnable logic a bit too

column2: send multiple images
column3: It would be great of TS like other messengers would support sending multiple images at once

column2: Ability to Lock Messages
column3: Many texting apps provide users with the ability to lock messages so that they cannot be deleted It would be very useful to see this functionality come to the app because after I imported all of my messages I began to clean them out and noticed that my locked messages were being deleted as well Thank you

column2: Adding Group Member with multiple phone numbers
column3: I experienced the following today I have two phones with two separate numbers both with textsecure installed and push enabled A friend started a new groupchat and tried to invite me He only has the option to invite on of my numbers since my contact only appears once in the list with one number The same happens when he tries to start a new 1 to 1 chat He only has the option to start a conversation with one of my numbers since the second one ist never shown in the list He has my two numbers safed in one contact Device HTC One stock android Lollipop Latest TextSecure 2 14 5 App state Push registered incoming SMS disabled outgoing SMS fully disabled

column2: Please add optional online offline last seen status feature
column3: Hello could you please add an optional online offline last seen status feature Other popular messengers like Telegram for Android and WhatsApp for Android do have that feature and it can be quite useful Those users who would not like it could simply disable it Telegram has a rather nice way of handling this see So could you please add such a feature Regards

column2: Please add optional read receipt feature
column3: Hello this is a follow up to Delivery receipts are implemented now But read receipts are still missing Could you please add an optional read receipt feature turned on by default Popular messengers like WhatsApp for Android and Telegram for Android do have this feature and it can be quite useful or even quite essential to say the least Those users who would not like it could simply disable it Regards

column2: picture not delivered
column3: I repeatedly tried to send a picture with text to a certain number but get a not delivered information after a while Sending images without text to another number succeeded but the image was never displayed issue 3248 My internet connection is of very low bandwidth and high latency

column2: Support GSM 7 bit alphabet for SMS
column3: Hello it would be useful in order to further promote TextSecure as a full messaging replacement to friends and family to support the GSM 7 bit alphabet which would allow keeping the cost of SMS low in some countries

column3: I love the trim after x messages but also wish I could have messages older than x days be deleted Please support this as a feature

column2: secure connection does not work even though messages are shown blue for one side
column3: I have weird problems with one of my friends It just wo not encrypt my messages anymore even though it worked before like a couple of weeks before She says however that the messages are shown in blue to her But for me they are green and the lock is open The info says that I am using insecure messages I tried disabling and reenabling secure messages but that did not fix the problem I have TextSecure 2 14 5 and my friend says that she has the latest version also She tried reinstalling the app but it did not fix the problem She says that it still works fine for her other friends I have no problems with all my other friends

column2: use ConfirmIdentityDialog instead of ReceiveKeyDialog
column3: We currently have two different dialogs to confirm a changed Identity ConfirmIdentityDialog and ReceiveKeyDialog This PR gets rid of the latter ConfirmIdentityDialog seems to handle all message confilcts of a contact while you have to confirm every single message with ReceiveKeyDialog This also switches to AppCompatDialog see 3222

column2: Emojis occasionally not rendered
column3: Emojis seem to be occasionally missing in conversations message snippets contact names and group names I cannot reproduce this consistently in conversations But in the main conversation list it is consistent when TS is opened for the first time How to reproduce 1 Make sure that there is at least one emoji somewhere in the main conversation list contact group name or message snippet 2 Close TS from the Recent apps list 3 Open TS 4 Emojis are most likely missing in the main conversation list markorepairs no emoji 5 Open some conversation 6 Come back to main conversation list 7 The emojis are visible again markorepairs emoji TS 2 16 1 U8800 Android 4 0 4 Nexus 4 stock Android 5 1 1 Debug log from Nexus 4 5 7 emojis failed to render or 6 8 if the one under the system navigation bar is counted

column2: prevent early callback death
column3: In the documentation for setCallback Drawable Bind a Drawable Callback object to this Drawable Required for clients that want to support animated drawables In Android is code There were no hard references for the callback so it was just getting GC would and then nothing was being redrawn Deep breath It is like you took a bottle of ink and you threw it at a wall Smash And all that ink spread And in the middle it is dense is not it And as it gets out on the edge the little droplets get finer and finer and make more complicated patterns see So in the same way there was a big bang at the beginning of Android and it spread Fixes 3255

column2: Select and attach several attachments batch mode feature
column3: At the moment attachments like pictures can only be attached one at a time This applies to 1 Gallery select image s Share TextSecure only shows up as sharing option if 1 image is selected starting with two the sharing option disappears 2 TextSecure some conversation Add attachment Picture It would be nice to have the possibility to add a batch of attachments instead of having to add them one by one

column2: message emailed to phone num vtext com gets truncated
column3: In the past I have emailed myphone vtext com and received it as a text in TextSecure sucessfully Now it seems to be getting truncated Tested with a couple emails and same result TS 2 12 0 Android 4 4 2 stock ROM no root no titanium backup Samsung Galaxy S4 Send the following text as a plaintext email to your phone num vtext com and note that you do not even get all of the first rule Maybe this even applies to long sms Beginner pilot rules 1 The propeller is just a big fan made to cool down the pilot in the cockpit When it stops you can see the pilot start sweating excessively 2 You do not have to take off but landing is mandatory 3 Pushing forward on the flight stick makes the earth look bigger pulling makes it look smaller If you pull too much or too long however it will look bigger yet again 4 Flying is safe as long as you do not crash 5 It is better to wish you were flying than to wish you were on the ground 6 A good landing is a landing in which everyone walks away 7 Besides affecting apples gravity also affects planes

column2: Group message issues after device change
column3: Recently as I got a new phone I experienced some issues with group messaging As I cannot say how far they are related I will just describe what happened First of all did a backup of the messages on the old phone Tried to unregister push on the old phone This did not work with some rather generic error message something like unable to perform task or so do not remember exactly Installed Textsecure on the new phone registered for push Imported backup from the old phone So far so good The hassle began when the first group message arrived The message is shown in a conversation named Unknown group There is no way for me to change the group name or even leave the group to be readded After someone else has added me to the group a second time although I was already part of the group according to his phone I can see the group name and receive messages but only from the one who readded me Messages from other members are not shown However now I can leave the group After being readded again I can now receive all messages from any group member again

column2: Notifications miss a category for Android 5 0 Silent mode
column3: Adding the MESSAGE category to notifications would allow TextSecure is notification as messages and even show up in silent mode if the user configured it to do so settings sounds notifications interuptions Details are in the closed PR 2155 To implement it the support library has to be upgraded to v21 first

column2: TS emojis not used in notifications
column3: Some TextSecure emojis are not used in Android notifications Here is an example message that I received from a strange number The message contains the AIRPLANE U 2708 emoji which is displayed differently in notifications and in TS Lock screen notification lock Notification drawer notification Heads up notification headsup And finally the actual TextSecure message message The meaning of the message changes completely depending on the emoji set used Now I do not know if I should report this unknown sender to the authorities like the good law abiding citizen I am or just wish this person a safe trip I'm not certain if the emojis in the notifications can even be changed but I'm under the impression that WhatsApp does show it is own iOS like emojis in Android notifications Related 2936 TS 2 16 2 Nexus 4 stock 5 1 1

column2: no more emoji pane fragment
column3: It looks like the NPE is caused by the fragment throwing out instance state when configuration changes happen This can be fixed by going back to using regular views which is necessary anyway to move the emoji panel to a PopupWindow to avoid the window spazzing when opening the keyboard

column2: reduce emoji memory consumption
column3: Shrink the raw sprite asset size to 75 of original size 32dp at xxhdpi so resizing consumes less memory Also shrunk the display size of emoji in the panel to keep things on the safe side and be able to display them in imageviews without resampling

column2: Messages missing no chronology
column3: Hi everyone after a good time using TextSecure I am starting to experience a really crippling bug that has many different outcomes I am missing a certain number of messages were sent to me but never received Those I do receive are hardly ever pushed with a notification I have to open TextSecure for them to show up and they appear to have been sent right that minute Tens of messages mark Now as the time they were sent received This is of course wrong and fucks up the entire chronology latest received on top Whenever I try to send a text it says TextSecure is trying to send a large quantity of messages A fair amount of messages give me an unable to send error message Any idea what the problem could be Here is the debug log Thanks R gis

column2: ASCII emoji support
column3: Fixes 2943 Simplifies the code a bit since we are dealing with all emoji as Strings now Why are the emoji back to being stored as Java statics you ask Well Android is resource XML does not support all UTF 16 codepoints so there was no choice if we wanted to represent the emoji as strings I made EmojiView since TextView is onDraw is too heavy to work efficiently in older phones Horrible lag EmojiView is a nano ImageView TextView hybrid that has a very fast draw cycle making it great for having dozens of them on screen at a time Seems subjectively faster than even the ImageView we were using before

column2: Make the colored first letter symbols as optional Feature
column3: After last week is update I noticed 'colored first letter of the name symbols inside a circle next I guess this feature might help in group chats or maybe it was added after noticing it in telegram But I would love a toggle for this new feature because its making the dark theme look very ugly and functionally it is not helpful at all I guess this is super low priority but do consider adding an option to turn this UI design off

column2: Emojis are full of jaggies have low resolution
column3: Hello using TextSecure 2 16 4 on an LG G2 running latest stock ROM Android 5 0 2 Lollipop the Emojis are full of jaggies have a low resolution It becomes especially noticeable in the Emoji drawer when the system font size is set to a large value which in turn lets the Emojis become bigger in the Emoji drawer Here is a screenshot with system font size set to maximum Image As you can see the Emojis show a lot of jaggies and seem to have a low resolution This can not be an issue with the Google Noto Color Emoji Emoji set itself since it is even available in SVG format from source see git 2Fcolor emoji 2Fsvg So could you please fix that Regards

column2: 1 Unregister from Cyanogen 2 Download TS 3 Bad Encrypted Message
column3: Hi Bear with me here This could be a problem with Cyanogen or may be more appropriate for the support form Feel free to close if either of these are the case Android 4 2 2 Samsung SGH T399 TextSecure 2 16 4 Debug log I have mysteriously been registered to Cyanogen is whisperpush server for awhile now I have never installed cyanogenmod on my device and finally got around to unregistering myself Previously while I was registered my friend who uses cyanogenmod tried to send me multiple encrypted messages which would silently fail After unregistering from Cyanogen is servers today I downloaded TextSecure and successfully registered with my phone number However when my friend with cyanogenmod and I tried sending encrypted messages to each other we received bad encrypted message for each message we sent He tried disabling encryption on his end in which case i could only send him sms messages and re enabling it but we still got bad encrypted message errors Maybe some sort of problem with key exchanges failing when I was registered to cyanogen servers

column2: Thumbnails disappear when scrolling in 'All images' view
column3: When you scroll in a certain way in the 'All images' gallery picture thumbnails at the top and bottom boundaries disappear Possibly related 2985 I have only encountered this today so I guess this has been introduced fairly recently Glide issue 1 Open 'All images' from a conversation that has so many of your precious photos that you need to scroll to see them all 2 Scroll down and pull up before new images are fully visible do this move gently do not jerk like a machine 3 Continue scrolling down to expose new precious photos 4 Alternate between steps 2 and 3 as long as you wish or until your lifespan expires 5 When you do this the two leftmost boundary thumbnails will disappear like tears in the rain gif demonstration blade runner TS 2 14 1 stock andy 5 1 Nexus 4 model with artificial snake scale back skin of finest quality media File LG Nexus 4 back glass jpg Debug log Also happens with my old 4 0 4 skin job model which should be retired already

column2: units
column3: On the textSecure panel showing the list of threads each of them has a field showing the time elapsed since the last message typically I read something like 11 mins I wonder what the s after min stands for Unit for minute is min and units do not take plural form Unfortunately I must say that this trend of putting plural mark to units is more and more common in the US and it appears that it is getting more common in other countries as well Spreading that nonsense is definitely not good so I suggest that the plural unit issue be taken care of as soon as possible Check also for the hour I am pretty sure that soon some hrs will show up h would actually be the best while hr being also accepted Thank you

column2: espresso tests jenkins CI
column3: 1 comment out broken PartDatabase tests until fixed 2 move androidTest into new test directory 3 move PUSH URL from Release java into BuildConfig java 4 use textsecure service staging whispersystems org for test build 5 move magic SMS mocking code into own util class 6 created a new build flavor for espresso tests 7 create a new source set full of espresso tests 8 updated proguard testing pro 9 added test device numbers to gitignore 10 make running the espresso tests optional via Pespresso 1 command line arg I did my best to split this up into small logical commits Jenkins Spoon work happily with this setup using these I have got a build server running espresso tests on all connected android devices for every new push to my branch and publishing test reports to HTML pages the espresso build flavor is included conditionally by the project property espresso being set to anything this property can be set from the command line or in a settings gradle file so by default these new tests will not run on the connectedCheck build target

column2: fix messages with push flag and sms flag set
column3: The insecure message approval logic sets the message as forced SMS but does not unset the push flag so all our view logic was displaying insecure fallback SMS messages as push without a lock origin L511

column2: Conversations are not associated with Contact even though Contact exists for that phonenumber
column3: On my LG G2 smartphone TextSecure is having problems associating my contacts to the conversations Instead of using the contact image and name it will show the standard happy face and the phonenumber the conversation is related to as if I did not have any contact stored for this number It should be noted that many of the conversations are correctly associated with the correct contact and thus shows both image and name from the contact It seems to be rather random what contacts are effected by this bug I have also seen conversations that was previously associated with the correct contact forget this ones a new message arrives and just show the happy face and number instead I have tried updated the contacts and adding the phonenumber to them again even adding them several times to the same contact In some rare cases this made the contact show up correctly but normally it does not fix anything I have not been able to find a common course for the problem yet It does not matter if a contact have only one or several phonenumbers Also note that the standard message app on the phone works as it should and shows all conversations with the correct contacts

column2: fixed DynamicLanguage to handle sporadic Locale changes
column3: The Locale on Context getResources getConfiguration was sporadically changing due to android configChanges such as orientation and also sometimes onActivityResult so 1 added onConfigurationChanged and onActivityResult methods to DynamicLanguage 2 switched all activites to inherit from BaseActivity or BaseActionBarActivity 3 moved all uses of DynamicLanguage into base activity classes 4 added missing super onActivityResult call to KeyScanningActivity 5 removed unused imports along the way Fixes 2815 2898 FREEBIE

column2: Feature request integration with KK Widget
column3: KK Widget aka DashClock has the ability to show text messages on its screen saver but unfortunately TextSecure messages do not show As a result I no longer can easily see when I receive a text Would be nice to see these two somehow integrated

column2: ure
Attachments Quick Capture audio video recording and playback Google is Messenger Android app style
column3: Those who have used Google is Messenger application for Android in its more recent iterations may have noticed a new feature for attachments Clicking the paperclip for Attachments besides the usual options to attach a file gives the user the option a number of Quick in app in line media capture options For instance choosing Picture or alternately Video allows the user to capture the picture or video right from Messenger a camera window is opened below the text entry box which is then added to the message to form the outgoing MMS Likewise if the user chooses the Audio tab there is a Microphone button and instructions to press and hold to record Doing so allows the user to speak a message which is then encoded as an audio file and added to the outgoing MMS From what I can tell TextSecure lacks these options While a user can send a picture video or audio file that has already been saved elsewhere I believe it would benefit TextSecure to enable these Quick Capture options both for traditional SMS MMS and Secure Data messaging Many users find these options alluring particularly the audio quick capture which allows the sending of a short audio message that can be played by the recipient at their leisure and TextSecure supporting these features would mean users who enjoy them currently on other platforms could switch and enjoy better privacy security without having to lose said features Please let me know if this seems feasible Thank you

column2: NewConversationActivity only shows contacts if TS is default app on Galaxy S4
column3: the contact list in NewConversationActivity will be empty unless TextSecure is set to be the default SMS app on Samsung Galaxy S4 devices or at least the one I tested we have run into a couple issues with the contact query used in this activity such as 2378 and another mentioned by where sometimes the query takes upwards of 5 seconds to complete we should look into some alternatives

column2: Not possible to know if a contact is verified or not
column3: If I look at my TextSecure contact list or directly in a contact conversation there is no way to know if a contact has been verified or not In case I'm not sure I can only verify the contact again to be 100 sure It would be nice to have an indication of verified contact I e it could be an orange dot for unverified and green dot for verified or the lock in the conversation view could change is color when it is verified Or at least on the Verify identity screen you should write Successfully verified Verified or Verified on date time I do not know what is more suitable but I'm sure it would be a very useful and important feature to help people use the app in the best possible way

column2: Add camera preview to message composition
column3: Long overdue work from WBoC15 this adds a Facebook Messenger Google Messenger style camera preview that lets you quickly take photos without exiting the ConversationActivity view part of 520 This does not currently encrypt the files because I did not want the work to conflict with the changes from the Glide PR EDIT Since the Glide PR got merged in I updated the branch Also this probably fixes and definitely affects 2930 because the new view cannot handle not being redrawn on rotation QuickCamera java requires knowledge of the device orientation to rotate the camera preview display and image properly screenshot 2015 04 20 12 46 32 portrait landscape

column2: Per Recipient notification silencing
column3: This implements a first step towards per recipient notifications as discussed on the mailing list and wished for in many tickets So far I only implemented the possibilities to silence certain people and groups permanently or temporarily since this seemed to be the minimal consensus achieved on the mailing list WARNING This upgrades your database Although a downgrade should be comparatively easy delete a table and downgrade the global database version make sure to have a backup if you test this

column2: TextSecure incorrectly thinks recipient is registered
column3: Over the past week I have experienced a very strange failure mode 1 Me and person P were exhanging unsecured text messages I was using TextSecure push registered while P was using a stock messaging app 2 At some point TextSecure on my phone started thinking that P was registered with TextSecure and switched to sending encrypted messages I sent a few encrypted messages to P which P never received 3 Upon learning that P was not receiving my messages I tried ending the secure session with P on my phone This had no effect TextSecure still insisted on sending encrypted messages I tried de registering my phone and then registering it again but that did not help Ultimately the only way to reach P was to de register my phone and keep push disabled The most pressing issue is Why did TextSecure think P was registered P never installed TextSecure or Signal and did not change their phone number or anything like that The secondary issue is Why did TextSecure not allow me to send plain SMS even after I selected end secure session I looked at the log and the only potentially relevant line I could find was this W Directory 22806 Adding active token xx 47 CqoNE Fv5gw where xx is the last 2 digits of P is phone number so I know the line corresponds to their account PS Is the debug log designed to be safe for posting in public or is there a document describing which fields should be censored Version info for my device

column2: memory leaks with list items listening to recipient changes
column3: As far as I know there is no great way for a list adapter to notify each list item that it needs to be recycled in the event that the activity is being paused stopped destroyed Because of this there is context leak around our Recipient listener logic Seems like we should either 1 find a consistent way for RecyclerView ListView adapters to listen to lifecycle events and report them up to their bound list items or 2 make all our RecipientListeners only hold a weak reference to the context

column2: Convert AsyncTask to IntentService
column3: Hi TextSecure developers I'm doing research on Android async programming particularly on AsyncTask and IntentService AsyncTask can lead to memory leak and losing task result when GUI is recreated during task running such as orientation change This article describes the problems very well We discussed with some Android experts and they agree with this issue and claim that AsyncTask can be considered only for short tasks less than 1 second However using IntentService or AsyncTaskLoader can avoid such problems since their lifecycles are independent from Activity Fragment In TextSecure the AsyncTasks are declared as non static inner classes of Activity Fragment So the above issue can occur especially for relatively long tasks I refactored 9 AsyncTasks in TextSecure to IntentService in 8 separate commits with the help of a refactoring tool we developed Do you think using IntentService should be better in some of these 9 scenario Do you want to merge some commits in this pr Thanks

column2: Refactor colorization to support dark theme
quick direct capture
column3: This continues off the work of the original author big shout out what If a camera is available on the hardware provide a quick capture drawer directly within the app Unlike when using external intents captured media will never be visible to other apps Which is pretty cool summary Use CWAC Camera library for cross device camera compatibility since there are many gotchas in the Android world Unfortunately the library is a bit dated so there are a few classes that needed to be copied and modified to fit our needs SurfacePreviewStrategy java is copied without modification TexturePreviewStrategy java is copied without modification CameraView java was copied and modified to initialize asynchronously Unnecessary parts were removed The keyboard aware code was moved out of a ViewGroup and into a helper method so it can be used by whatever needs that info Makes more sense that way Drafts can now be encrypted or unencrypted they are treated the same All input is through PartAuthority maybe I should rename it to ContentAuthority come to think of it A new CaptureProvider deals with the file management known bugs on gingerbread the cropping rectangle is not set properly creating a strangely cropped result dragging animation twitches sometimes unknown cause

column2: Register time too short cannot register without both wifi and phone network
column3: I have tried over and over and cannot register my phone for TextSecure I live in a remote rural area and cannot get decent phone reception at the same time that I have a wifi connection If I drive to a spot to receive the SMS then I lose the wifi connection If I try to do Voice Verify then it says no network presumably meaning no wifi connection So it is impossible to register here I almost got it once by driving out to get reception but the short time limit of 2 minutes cut off before the SMS that came in moments later I do not understand why you have to make it so difficult to register the phone or even why a secure messaging app needs to have my phone number registered in the first place Is this some hidden tracking agenda why need the phone number for text messaging But my real point here is to let you know that registration is broken for people like me in rural areas It seems the only way for me to do this is to wait for some day when I'm at some cafe with free wifi and decent phone reception both together Can this not be made less onerous

column3: Me and my friends all completely despise the Google emojis I do not really know why but the fact still remains that we do With that said I think a lot of people would be happy to see alternatives Twitter is emojis are open source and look quite nice Of course I would prefer Apple is but those are not open source at all so that might be a problem I do not really see how WhatsApp could get away with using them though With Signal for Iphone and Signal soon coming to Android I think it is quite important that both people see the same thing That is the way Telegram does it and it makes sure both people see the exact same emojis Some Apple Google emojis are so different that it is not even funny Yeah I know Samsung for example has their own emojis but that does not exactly make things easier Is this being worked on Is it even being considered I even tried using Emoji Switcher to get Apple is emojis but it just is not working

group SMS feature still missing why has issue 413 been locked limited
column3: Hi I am am wondering why there is yet not an update on the still missing group SMS feature in Textsecure The original issue concerning this question issue 413 has already been opend in 2013 and now in mid 2015 there is still no information when the feature will be implemented For 1 1 2 years this feature has been wished by a lot of people as the lively discussion in 413 shows But now the conversation 413 has been locked and limited to collaborators ca a month ago and you cannot participate in the discussion in 413 anymore Why this limitation of the discussion Can you provide us please with any concrete information when the missing group SMS feaure will be implemented Thanks I did not want to open a duplicate but as it is technically impossible to write in 413 which is in general about the missing feature and not about technical details I saw no other way Sorry if the new issue caused trouble However my question was not about a regular update service but was only caused as this group SMS feature request is open since quite a long time and I was wondering if it is still planned or not Thanks again

column2: Fix direct capture layout issues
column3: The drag twitch is no longer present making the experience much smoother The Conversation List should no longer be visible as the camera opens as I added a black background turtlekiosk originally had that but I accidentally removed in when rebasing conversation activity xml my bad It turns out we were doing the camera pause logic on the main thread still so the UI thread hang should be gone as well I do not know why CWAC Camera added and removed the SurfaceView TextureView on resume and pause but it seems to work fine adding it once and just waiting until the views are ready before continuing initialization So I went that route

column2: Apple emoji small difficult to read in conversation
column3: The implementation of Apple emoji in 9a18be0 is difficult to read in conversation Nexus 5 xxhdpi due to reduction in displayed size as well as more colors and details in Apple is emoji images For reference behold a short story about MERS preferably on an xxhdpi mobile screen Google Emoji fa62b9b 2015 07 02 emoji mers google Apple Emoji 9a18be0 2015 07 06 emoji mers apple A quick code comparison src org thoughtcrime securesms components emoji EmojiProvider java Google emoji fa62b9b Changing EMOJI SMALL to 0 90 96 6 64 restores emoji height to where it was before emoji mers apple scale 90

column2: Please add option to change default theme color globally
column3: Hello with TextSecure 2 21 0 you can change the color for each contact When changing the color the color for the conversation toolbar changes as well So it is a bit like changing the theme color However the attachment button inside the conversation remains blue default theme color for example It would be really nice if you could add an option to TextSecure which would allow to change not just the color for each contact but also change the theme color globally so that the color is changed everywhere including the main screen and settings and so on Or with other words Currently the default color in the TextSecure Light theme is blue I would like to have an option to change this default color to something else Any chance you could do that It could be placed under Settings Appearance It would be much appreciated Regards

column2: Lock symbol and date have very low contrast in incoming message bubbles phone number in conversation toolbar has the same issue
column3: Hello the incoming message bubbles in TextSecure 2 21 0 have a colored background color depends on setting per contact and the text inside those incoming message bubbles is white So far that is fine But The lock symbol and the date in those incoming message bubbles basically have the same color as the bubble is background which results in a very low contrast and bad readability In comparison The outgoing message bubbles in TextSecure 2 21 0 have a white background and the text inside those outgoing message bubbles is black dark gray And the lock symbol and the date in those outgoing message bubbles have the same or similar contrasting color as the message text black dark gray which results in a much better readability So Could you please change the lock symbol and the date in the incoming message bubbles to a white color With white they would have a much better contrast to the colored background and would have a much better readability PS The phone number in the conversation toolbar the phone number that is being displayed below the chat partner is name has the same issue So it would be nice if you would change that to a white color as well Regards

column2: Option to hide replace emoji button
column3: It would be great if one could hide the emoji button and or replace it with something more useful e g attachment button There are various reasons why one might not need the emoji button The keyboard used might already provide an emoji button as in my case One might prefer to use type old fashioned ASCII emojis therefore not needing the advanced emoji menu provided by TextSecure One might not want to use emojis at all and probably some more that I can not think of

column2: Use system look for emoji or add a compatibility mode
column3: Some want uniformity and emoji can get lost in translation but this is not a TextSecure problem and should not be fixed here Even if it were to be fixed here why settle on the Apple ones I can not see how many people have installed Signal but there are 253 ratings compared to 19 627 ratings for TextSecure Would iOS users like Android emoji Probably not Most people likely prefer whatever they are used to so it is better to let the system handle the look instead of forcing everyone to use the Apple ones which look really cheap and does not fit in at all on Android TextSecure uses one set of emoji while the rest of the system and other apps uses another now Also notifications still use the system emoji and apparently nothing can be done about this The inconsistencies look really sloppy Adding options is usually not a good idea but the same goes for changing the look that people are used to so if anything there should be a compatibility mode where those who want to make sure nothing gets lost in translation can switch to Apple emoji

column3: First off the gist of the debug log I have used TextSecure for a long while but I only very recently picked up my first contact who also uses it I was so excited when I sent my first message I was slightly less excited when she said that all she received was a Bad encrypted message error I did some debugging on my end which led to a debug log that looked something like the one that I posted above but without the crash This morning however her Bad encrypted message to me also resulted in TextSecure crashing upon receiving the message I do not know why today is message exchange led to a crash but the previous ones did not I'm also confused as to why I'm trying to JSON decode an HTML error message Any ideas as to what could be going on and or suggestions on what to try next

column2: Improve check mark readability
column3: The check mark that signals the message has been correctly sent was a very welcome feature I recently introduced TextSecure to my father who is 60 years old and despite not having severe sigh problems at all in his life at that age he needs to use glasses to read his phone 5 Moto G and has it configured with very large fonts for ease of use In that context we recently had minor problems with messages not arriving due to connectivity and he was unable to notice because he can barely see the check mark I can perfectly see it in my Nexus 4 with normal fonts but I agree it should be easier to identify Maybe making it bigger and or changing the character to U 2714 and maybe using a different bright color that helps spotting the mark way easier than it is now

column2: Refactor contact stuff

column2: use better ImageView properties
column3: should reduce memory consumption It looks like the default ImageView scaleType does not allow Glide to safely resize properly whereas fitCenter does It is also recommended to force loading as a bitmap with toBitmap if you are not using other features like gif to make sure the pool is used We can revisit this with gif support

column2: Transition in RecipientActivity and hide keyboard on ContactSelection 3523 3704 and 3706
column3: This Pullrequest contains 3 very small and trivial fixes RecipientActivity Use the transition that happens on onBackPressed in onOptionsItemSelected As a result the transition moving the contact name in the actionbar of the conversation view is applied not only on a backbutton press but also when pressing the home arrow in the actionbar Should fix 3523 ContactSelection Hide the keyboard when user wants to send a new message and the ContactSelection view is opened Most people probably do not want to search for their contacts at the first but immediately click on them in their contact list as stated in the corresponding issue Fixes 3704 ContactSelection Pressing the toggle button now brings up the keyboard Furthermore I changed the keyboard as the default for the toggle button instead of the dial pad because people would like to input real names instead of phone numbers most of the times and since the keyboard ist hidden by default the keyboard should appear first when clicking the toggle button Fixes 3706 All commits are FREEBIES

column2: gifs
column3: Use Glide for rounding and cropping images and gifs off the main thread finally cutting out our use of RoundedImageView This was traditionally less memory efficient but Glide is pooling and reuse of bitmaps make that not the case any more If anything this should make scrolling faster since there is no shader activity in the ImageView is onDraw Our new RoundedCorners transformation cheats transparency with a hint for what the background it is being drawn on is This way we do not need an alpha channel for our drawables so can continue using RGB 565 to save memory Add support for animated gifs and a new media constraint allowing them to be up to 1MB

column2: New permissions in TextSecure 2 32 2
column3: Hi I am a big fan of TextSecure and just discovered the new version 2 32 2 in the Google Play store Unfortunately the app is requesting a lot of new permissions The stated reason is so you can integrate RedPhone later on which makes sense to make TextSecure more like Signal While I do not want to imply that I think you guys are doing anything fishy with my data you will surely understand that people might not install a secure messaging app that has just about access to anything For example I cannot see how access to my Calendar is important to exchange messages nor to make phone calls I think it would really serve you and the community well if you would put an explanation of all the permissions in a prominent place on the open whisper systems website Having this information easily accessible link from Google store to that site will help users to build trust Of course anyone can read the code to see that you are not up to anything but that is not a good enough answer here since not many people will have the time nor the technical expertise to do so If your code is audited you could add information about audits on your website stating who did the audit with which version of the app and link to their results Thanks

column2: Change mute strings and times
column3: When looking over at other apps for translation hints I found Facebook messenger is way of handling the new feature textsecure 2015 06 11 204749 The time options make more sense IMO and as you can see Mute has no literal translation in French and needs at least 3 words Replacing Mute for 1 hour with For 1 hour helps a lot and Mute is already mentioned in the title

column2: CrashBrowser 2 22 2 ANR
CrashBrowser 2 22 2 'Input dispatching timed out' ANR
Deliver a full and a small TextSecure version for enhanced trust
column3: Not everyone wants to use all the features but the standard install now asks for calendar microphone in RedPhone preparation location and other permissions How about a second smaller TextSecure version that really is just a limited secure messenger Should not even be able to take pictures Even though it is Open Source and I could check things most people cannot and hence less Android permissions would create more trust Please consider two builds one full featured and one with just messaging capabilities You might even kill SMS support and make it even less requiring Thanks

column2: 2 32 2 really wants to have a lot of permissions
column3: Hi TextSecure now wants permissions that allow TextSecure to know about 'Device and app history' which gives a readout about activity on the device including which apps are running browsing history bookmarks my calendar my physical location my microphone and the name of my wifi connection This is not cool Your update notes say that permissions are being upgraded in relation to merging with RedPhone Some of these things make sense in relation to that but I fail to understand why you want my calendar why you want my physical location why you want the ability to read my wifi infomation Please advise as this level of permissions is really not something I like giving out at all

column2: TextSecure changes colors of Google contacts
column3: Contacts without assigned images in the default Google contacts app also used in the default phone dialer are assigned a color which normally cannot be changed Recently however I have noticed that contacts of the people who are TextSecure registered users do change The color changes are seemingly random one was grey then light blue red orange now purple and I have yet to find a pattern as when they happen once it occurred right after I switched back to the contact screen from TextSecure sometimes I only notice when I open the phone dialer When it happens all of the contacts of TextSecure users change at once I'm not exactly sure what causes the problem but I'm pretty sure it is an issue with TextSecure since all my contacts' colors stay the same except for those who also use TextSecure even one whom I have never actually texted Note that this does not apply to the colors that you can assign people within TextSecure those remain the same Changing them within TextSecure is probably not the impetus for a change in contacts either since one that I have never changed within TextSecure has changed in Google contacts I wonder if it has something to do with the new searching contacts screen in TextSecure I feel it happens more often after I go to that screen but that is just a guess I'm using TextSecure 2 23 2 on a Nexus 5 running Android 5 1 1 Here is a log if that helps

column2: Transport warning message
column3: This pull request displays a message above the compose window if the current selected transport does not match the transport of the last received message This is something I have found myself in dire need of since using TextSecure for my main SMS app again and having a number of contacts who had TextSecure and now do not or are iPhone users and sometimes contact with SMS and sometimes TextSecure This could go a long way for increasing adoption of TextSecure as it reduces some of the frustration when dealing with contacts with varying usage I'm not sure if this is the final look we want to go for or not screenshots

column2: Added textCapSentences to group name
column3: Fixes 3788 Y'know if y'all feel inclined to make this design change Edit Since this is a thing FREEBIE

column2: Modified Usage of Light Dark Colors in Conversation Activity
column3: I have only recently started using a version of TextSecure with the custom per conversation colors but there were a couple of things that struck me straight away The fact that the action bar and text bubbles appear the same color makes the layout of the objects on screen seem less clear It suggests that they are at the same point in the hierarchy and the only thing that suggests otherwise is the slight drop shadow that you can sometimes see over a text bubble if it is in the right place In the dark theme the status bar color is lighter than the action bar this looks particularly odd and goes against design recommendations I believe This pull request makes two changes In the light theme makes the text bubbles match the color of the status bar In the dark theme swap the status bar and action bar colors Here are a few screenshots of the change original on left new on right View Full Album Potential Improvements We may want to make the action bar colour on the dark theme slightly darker maybe 800

column2: Support for multiple recipients without creating groups or support for local groups
column3: In TextSecure if I want to send the same message to multiple persons I can create a group first and send the message to the group However then everyone in the group becomes aware that it is a group message in other words groups are always global It would be nice to either send to multiple recipients without the need for creation of groups I think this has already been requested or allow the creation of groups which are local so that we can send the same message to multiple people without the recipients being aware of the fact

column2: Multi device strings inconsistent confusing
column3: The act of adding a device uses at least 5 verbs Create Link Add Register Pair The act of removing a device uses only 1 verb but it is unrelated to any of the positive actions Disconnect This inconsistency is both confusing to end users and troublesome for translators It would be awesome if we had a single positive action verb with a related single negative verb For example Add Remove Register Unregister Link Unlink Authorize Deauthorize used in Google Play Music The related string resources follow I will submit a PR with Register Unregister as a suggestion pending an official decision on what words to use

column2: General rules for translations
column3: I'm on the translate team for TextSecure and SMSSecure for the Dutch language and I noticed in both projects some inconsistencies In Dutch you have 2 forms for the English you ignoring the thou form here the informal jij and the more formal u I noticed both forms are used in translations probably depending on the personal preference of the translator of the specific string In French you have tu and vous in German du and sie but I did not check the French and German translations to see if the forms are mixed there too I do not know any other languages well enough to say if it can be an issue there In current Dutch both forms are socially acceptable although some mostly elder people frown on the use of the informal form I would suggest the app choose one of the forms to be more consistent Having both forms mixed makes a sometimes strange impression I have no strong personal preference for either form What is the opinion of the developers

column2: DB performance optimizations
column3: First round of database related performance optimizations it should cut load times for long conversations roughly in half It is still kind of slow even given that but more changes on the way to fix that Add multi column index that allows quick sorting against thread id and received time which is how we sort our conversations Without them SQLite has been having to sort with temporary B Trees which is not so efficient Part of this requires using column AS name instead of expr AS name so I had to migrate the MMS database to use normal timestamps Use the SQLite EXISTS method for checking if a conversation is empty instead of having to do a full sweep of the table Move unnecessary HashMap and array allocations to static variables for the most used getConversation method Stop keeping track of message count in ThreadDatabase since we do not use it and it is slow

column2: Fix sendMessage manual MMS dialog logic
column3: Previous logic 1 Did not request manual MMS settings when there was a single recipient but an attachment was present 2 Did request manual MMS settings before the chance of an upgrade to data was possible New logic only requests manual MMS settings when MMS is forced so we know an upgrade is not possible

column2: only create DB readers as needed
column3: Another thing I noticed during the method tracing from scrolling in the conversation No matter what the item type we create both an MmsDatabase reader and an SmsDatabase reader when almost always only one is used Each of those readers create their own instance of MasterCipher and each MasterCipher calls Cipher getInstance in its constructor which is not a particularly fast call I did not want to edit MasterCipher although might be worth looking into initializing those ciphers statically but this should help lower our object creation during scrolling on the UI thread Lowers jank

column2: Linking device with no TS groups crashes
column3: This is the stacktrace Basically I wanted to check the current status of the TextSecure Browser project Since I'm lazy rather than rebuilding the android application to use the staging server and create another account I wanted to try to use it to contact my mother and I modified the javascript sources to not use the staging servers I just removed the staging string from the urls as a wild guess I thought what is the worse that could happen the messages might just fail to be delivered well apparently I was wrong maybe because the browser plugin expects a newer version of the app but now I always get the above exception The problem still happens even after removing disabling the extension on my browser The exception does not happen if I put the phone in airplane mode but otherwise it keeps crashing and showing the related popup I tried to find a way to disassociate my browser from the phone but apparently there is no such option Rebooting the phone did not help I frankly could do without TextSecure for a few days I would switch back to the normal sms app until this issue would be fixed But afaik the only way I could do that is by uninstalling textsecure removing the account Unfortunately this would then create a new key and I would need to notify my new contacts of the changed fingerprint I would like if there was a day to do one of the following things Tell textsecure to stop connecting altogether Tell textsecure to disable automatic restart Export my textsecure is private key ok this is less than ideal but I'm already suffering from a self inflicted DOS P Also I understand that an Android application is lifecycle is not as simple as a normal Java app so it might not be that easy But is there no way to have a top level catch all exception that recognizes such an issue increments a counter to detect if the failure was a one off or is cronical and does something sane temporarily disabling itself do not let the exception bubble up to the system etc Thank you

column2: Warn user about contact leakage before creating a large group
column3: TextSecure makes it too easy to accidentally leak your contacts' phone numbers to each other It should make it more clear to the user perhaps through a user warning if a group contains more than X people that a group message to a large group will share everyone is phone numbers with everyone else Background I have been an enthusiastic TextSecure user for a couple years now but I had not done much group messaging I reset my phone and so my TextSecure key had changed I wanted to let everyone know en masse and went to create a group of all my TextSecure contacts Once I created the group before I explicitly sent a message it had already created the new group on all of my friends' phones and I quickly learned that they could all see every other person is phone number Obviously if I would done much group messaging before on TextSecure I would have known this But I had not yet and this was a rough way to learn it that resulted in me weakening the privacy of a good number of my friends I can imagine many solutions to address this but the one that I think would involve the least engineering effort would be to warn a user that phone numbers will be shared before creating a group where the group is above a certain threshold This could take the form of an OK Cancel popup after hitting the button to create a group or something more integrated Whatever the solution I believe adding friction to mass contact leakage is well within TextSecure is commitment to a UX that makes secure communication easy With a high enough threshold it is unlikely to affect many users and will only add that friction to a small number of important cases where that friction is constructive

column2: Most Required Features
column3: This is my first post I just compared textsecure with whatsapp and found that many features is required Hereby i try to list the most required features Audio call Brodcast Profile Pic Status Last seen Typing Wallpapper or Custom Background Email Chat Location Share Delete Account Change Number Optiin to Auto download media I just mentioned above features after comparison with whatsapp Its not necessary that we build application like whatsapp but above mentioned features is required for any messenger application I also found some issue in ts Like if you add any friends in group after that admin can not remove any friends from the group Admin must remove any member from group When some members post text message in group then notification shows that this friends post text message but does not show the group name so we think that this is private message but actually its group message Other issue is we only select one image at time we must select 10 to 20 image at time Sorry for my bad English but i tried to contribute to this awesome app Thanks Bahadursinh

column2: No way to disable Enable TextSecure Messages Nag popup

column2: Second factor for re registering with the server
column3: Currently if someone gets the ability to get my SMSes such as by stealing my SIM card or somehow intercepting them at the carrier or number cloning then the only thing standing in the way of that person impersonating me to a user I have already chatted to is the key mismatch warning Some users will click through that without thinking And someone who is never chatted to me before will not get any warning because of TOFU Since I do not think there is any intention to aggressively push users to manually verify key fingerprints it would be nice if I could add a passphrase to my registration that would not let someone register a new device with my phone number without also having that passphrase Since this adds some friction it would be reasonable for it to be opt in that is to say once I register my number for the first time I should be able to go into the settings and enable the passphrase requirement The biggest drawback I can see is that if I give up my phone number and then it is reassigned someone else will be stuck unable to use textsecure with that number I can not really think of a perfect way to solve this but expiring a registration that has not been used at all in some period of time say 12 months would probably be a reasonable approach Alternatively instead of just requiring use the server could periodically send the client a liveness check of some sort via push and clear the registration if those do not succeed for some shorter period of time 3 months if the app is not even responding at all

column2: Brand new Signal user is attempt to start session crashes ALL other TextSecure sessions permanently
column3: Well this is an interesting one TS 2 25 3 on Android 2 3 4 I coaxed somebody into installing Signal and after some confusion about a verification code I was getting texts that did not tell me to send it to her eventually we figured out that I should do that she attempted to start a session with me It failed At that point every other active textsecure session I have with every other contact is now completely broken I get a failed to send both on regular messages and on attempts to end the secure session The 'tap for details' UI just says failed to send in red and the tap to resend button will fail again With another TextSecure user in the same house now he cannot send me messages failed to send or end a secure session with me He also reports that it is asking him to verify my new identity key It appears to have persisted one reboot and I will try another

column2: SMS fallback not triggered if recipient offline
column3: Use case I and my contact are push registered but at various times one of us goes offline for a few hours and would like to seamlessly switch to SMS Explanation I only use data when connected to WiFi so SMS is prefered communication channel much of the time This is common amongst my contacts here in Europe but some have mobile data Issue TS seems to switch to PUSH whenever sender has data or even if previous conversation was PUSH This leads to frustrating undelivered messages if sender simply hits reply without deliberately forcing SMS Feature request When there is evidence that the sender or recipient is offline there should be some way to prefer SMS Two possible ways to avoid these undelivered PUSH replies 1 Seamless SMS fallback if either person is not online 2 If seamless is not an option receiving an SMS should trigger SMS mode for the conversation I understand that defaulting to SMS is problematic now that SMS encryption is gone but this could be an Advanced option for nerds like me Can add a warning as modal or in settings Warning this could cost you money or accidentally lead to insecure SMS communication Related This behavior was outlined by here issuecomment 36750018 If sender or recipient are not reachable because mobile data is not available a popup appears warning the sender that the message could be delayed and asking him for confirmation or to edit his message and send via SMS MMS Issue 678 looked promising but that bug is huge stale and it is unclear what was finally decided upon implemented

column2: let ThumbnailView handle remove button placement
column3: Let ThumbnailView figure out when and where to put the remove button in the case of drafts Since we use ThumbnailView in many places and most of the time neither the remove button or progress indicators will be shown I switched those to be lazily inflated since neither ImageViews nor ProgressWheel instances are very cheap to inflate when scrolling quickly

column2: glide all day every day
column3: Pretty much finish the transition to Glide by having it take care of all our bitmap related tasks both in and out of the UI Their code is both less likely to be buggy and allows our BitmapUtil to handle very nice abstract input models While this is actual a positive diff the code ends up being much cleaner IMO Most if it is having new InputStream loaders for Android contact photos Glide does not currently include one and TextSecure attachments fixes 3908

column2: Bump the max sizes for message limits delivered by push
column3: I picked totally arbitrary numbers that seemed reasonable sounding at the time closes 700 in issuecomment 89356438 wrote It is just a matter of limiting auto downloads of large files depending on the network you are on before we increase the size However naively it seems that a malicious implementor of TextSecure is protocol can already bypass this limit if the only restrictions are client side at present Thus I propose raising the limit I'm totally onboard with picking other numbers I literally just eyeballed a minute long video

column2: Key is QR code never matches when opened through You may wish to verify this contact
column3: When your contact is key changes and you try to scan their QR code through the You may wish to verify this contact link the keys wo not match because the QR scan expects the old key even though the hex fingerprint screen shows the new key j f sebastian identity change j f sebastian you may wish to verify Steps 1 Your contact is key changes 2 They send you a message 3 You tap the message to open the The identifying material for contact has changed dialog 4 Tap the link You may wish to verify this contact 5 Notice that you see two fingerprints on this verification screen and their fingerprint is the new one 6 Open the QR code scanning mode 7 You either a get a toast Recipient has no identity key in the case your contact has no previous key anymore e g they unregistered at some point OR b Barcode Scanner opens you scan their QR code and you will get the dialog saying WARNING the scanned key DOES NOT match You can see the mismatch when you compare the fingerprint verification screen opened through the lock icon vs the screen opened through the You may wish link As expected the former shows the old fingerprint and the latter shows the new one However in the latter screen the QR code matching seems to still use the old key Nexus 4 5 1 1 TS 2 26 1 and before

column2: filter duplicate numbers
column3: this fixes 4029 ContactsContract does not allow to select distinct numbers or grouping functions Therefore the query is done as it was and the duplicate filtering is done afterwards creating a new cursor with only unique numbers

column2: make the migration and media situation suck a bit less
column3: As it turns out outgoing group media was never marked as non pending after it was sent which was the assumption that caused the most recent thumbnail click regression After thinking about it I decided parts should only have a data uri set if there is a corresponding data file to read from and that should be the authoritative indicator on if we can preview the media So that is what this change does As for the migration we will not try to download any part that already has a non null data column has media available already I was not able to reproduce is failure case and there have not been any other crash reports besides that one but this seems like a more fail safe way to do this check than looking for a content location Tested the migration with pending parts that actually need downloading along with outgoing group media and the previously borked self send media messages Assuming 2 26 5 will be version code 151

column2: LargeSQLiteCursor
column3: getConversation uses a LargeSQLiteCursor instance which breaks up queries into chunks of a given window size This is set to 500 right now so a cursor load only happens every 500 messages and is pretty quick refactor MmsSmsDatabase a bit to stop excessive object creation when calling getConversation I do not know why we were calling setDistinct on our union subqueries since I'm unaware of any situation where dupe rows would be an issue but it is slower so I set it to false If that is a problem can switch back
