column2: SMS messages received from TextSecure users are blue not green
column3: Device Model MotoG Android Version 5 1 1 CyanogenMod 12 1 20150820 NIGHTLY TextSecure Version 2 26 5 Situation PersonA and PersonB both use TextSecure PersonA uses TextSecure as their default SMS application PersonB does not use TextSecure as their default SMS application PersonB does not always have a network connection and will at times send SMS messages to PersonA Expected Behaviour SMS messages sent from PersonB to PersonA will be shown as green in TextSecure Current Behaviour SMS messages sent from PersonB to PersonA are shown in blue Problems Caused PersonA does not know if the message sent from PersonB was sent securely PersonA may assume PersonB has connectivity due to them sending messages and thus wrongly assume their messages have been received PersonA may not know over which medium SMS TextSecure they are expected to reply to PersonB

column2: Proposal to speed up QR code verification
column3: The prequisite would be including barcode scanner into TextSecure Signal and to move the end secure session to the three dot menu Tapping the lock would enable QR code verification immediately When Axolotl protocol assigns Alice and Bob roles to devices by comparing the base key they could also be used assign roles for QR code verification e g display QR code on Alice is device and open camera on Bob is device Bob could then scan both fingerprints from Alice is device at the same time It could both verify that Bob is device had received the proper key from Alice and that the proper key was delivered to Alice is device After verification Bob is device would either report successful verification or MITM risk Here is a mockup I made textsecure new fingerprints This approach would reduce the amount of user interaction from nine taps to two and after crude measuring verification would be 20 seconds faster

column2: Wording of resetting secure sessions is probably inconsistent definitely confusing
column3: ' Reset secure session ' in the conversation menu leads to a dialog titled ' End secure session confirmation ' with the content ' Are you sure that you want to end this secure session ' The conversation thread then just displays ' Secure session ended ' Nevertheless one immediately can send encrypted messages after 'ending' the secure session It seems like a new secure session has been silently started afterwards and the user is not informed about this fact As far as I understand it the wording of ' Reset secure session ' is the one which is correct i e the existing session gets closed and a new session with a new session key is created immediately afterwards Is this correct If so all involved strings except for ' Reset secure session ' are pretty confusing They look like the secure session gets closed and that is it

column2: Single Default color for all contacts
column3: Colors per contact is a nice feature but I would prefer to have a default color for each contact until I want to customize The reason is that most colors look quite aggressive and I would prefer to have the system theme applied instead which is softer for the eyes Could you foresee an option default behavior where all chats have the system theme and contact color customization remains available in individual conversion settings

column2: Attaching Sending contact info should attach a contact record rather than a number
column3: Using Signal 3 0 1 beta for Android on a Nexus 5 Debug log though I doubt you will want it is On WhatsApp when I attach a contact it brings up the contact is record with checkboxes next to each item of information that you have for him her e g numbers and email addresses and you can choose which you want to include You then click send and it sends them all together as a record formatted specially Clicking on it in the WhatsApp chat then allows you to add that information to your contacts giving you the option to add it to an existing contact or create a new contact as is normal for receiving a contact It also has a clever little message icon under the contact record that allows you to send a WhatsApp message to that contact straight away without adding them to your address book The interface in Signal is much less developed When you select attaching contact information on the same contact it only shows me the phone numbers for the contact rather than the email addresses and selecting one just inserts the number alone with no name or formatting I would like to see Signal send a proper contact record with a similar flow to that described above for WhatsApp at least if the recipient is also a Signal TextSecure user and the message is being sent over the data channel

column2: Fix two message ordering issues
column3: 1 The group ID for jobs that process received messages was previously set to the sender is e164 This guaranteed serialization of messages per recipient while allowing processing of multiple recipients in parallel Unfortunately in the case of groups this results in out of order conversations since the sender for each message is different And we can not determine that it was a group message until after we process it So this change just puts all message processing from all senders in one big queue 2 Synchronization messages were always being displayed before received messages due to the received time for those being set to the time they were sent Fixes 3618 Fixes 2385 FREEBIE

column2: TextSecure marks messages as delivered before they are even sent
column3: Hi I have always wondered why this is but just figured it may be some sort of bug Like 80 of the time the messages I send get the delivery receipt symbol the check mark way before they turn blue meaning they have been sent Basically I send a message it is shown as pending it gets the delivery check mark and then it is shown as sent And this happens all the time way more than just half the time I thought messages turned blue after they would reached the server and got the check mark once they would been delivered But how is it possible that going from my phone to the recipient is phone and back takes less than going from my phone to the server and back Sometimes I get the delivery receipt several seconds before the message is marked as sent Is this some problem with the server being slower at some tasks than others or is it some problem with the client Thank you

column2: Multipart SMS send error and delivery notification UI improvement
column3: Recently I sent a large multipart SMS and shortly thereafter received a notification that sending failed I tapped the notification and was brought to the just sent message Confusingly it had a checkmark for successful delivery I was not yet able to confirm with the receipient whether the message actually arrived completely but the incident shows that the UI for multipart SMS in relation to delivery notifications as well as error messages needs to be improved I e a checkmark for successful delivery should only be displayed if all parts arrived and a send error should result in the whole message being marked as failed light background plus red triangle icon Additionally TS should continuously try to deliver the message again or the failed parts thereof if the SMS protocols allow that

column2: Better bubble coloring
column3: When I send a message this is the expected behavior for coloring message turns dark blue message turns bright blue once I get the delivery receipt its icon appears Now sometimes not all the time but pretty often the following happens message turns dark blue once I get the delivery receipt its icon appears message turns bright blue I think I read somewhere that the bubble turns bright blue once the server has queued the message So that should happen way before the delivery receipt makes its way to my phone Since that is not the case I think it would be cool to turn the bubble bright blue as soon as a delivery receipt is received Otherwise you could color the bubble bright blue as soon as the message reaches the server it would give the users the impression that messages are being sent faster which would be good The app seems slowish right now

column2: warm database caches asynchronously at app start
column3: Previously CanonicalAddressDatabase was reading the entire database synchronously on the UI thread and TextSecureDirectory was doing main thread I O every time we checked if a number was a TextSecure user On my slow phone this was taking multiple seconds This change Adds a caching layer for TextSecureDirectory Fills the TextSecureDirectory and CanoncalAddressDatabase caches asynchronously on app start Asynchronously loads the libphonenumber metadata from disk by calling it is parse method on our local phone number if it exists Otherwise this was another 1000ms operation on the UI thread the first time a conversation was opened

column2: unjankify incoming media sharing
column3: There were some incorrect assumptions about how long we are allowed to read from a Uri passed in via a share intent to us Turns out not long at all once the activity that receives the intent finishes the Uri is no longer guaranteed to be readable ShareActivity now writes a copy of the media to our own storage while the media remains relevant fixes 3989

column2: Messages from the future
column3: My friend is in a timezone 1h ahead of mine When they send me a message TS shows the time as one hour ahead of the current local time There are two problems with this 1 It is confusing for the user when following the conversation reading the message 2 The conversation list shows the conversation as 23h in the past sorted below a conversation that was only a few proper hours in the past Possible reason for the time difference 1 My friend did not set the timezone but the time when traveling to their current location Thus our timezones are the same but their time is wrong I did not ask them to confirm that yet What I would expect from TS 1 When a conversation is in the future show it above all others sorted by relative signed time difference instead of sorting it by absolute unsigned time difference 2 The server could append its own time so that the receiving client has three times sent by sender received by server received by recipient Then 1 TS could show all three times in the message details 2 In the conversation view it could show the time that roughly agrees with the others filtering the third from the user is view by default E g show an average of the two of all three times with the least difference

column2: Awkward uncomfortable fingerprint verification word combinations
column3: Hi one issue that comes up frequently when I make TextSecure Signal calls with extended family is uncomfortable fingerprint verification word choices For example today I had to explain to my parents why the words retouch puberty came up on their phone Some other possibilities that will probably happen to people at some point newborn puberty showgirl penetrate facial escapade adult visitor 95 of the time it does not matter at all but if it were possible I would prefer that the word combinations be extremely boring I want to be able to recommend Signal to anyone without worrying about whether they will get weird words and end up being creeped out I would be happy to go through and change the words in src org thoughtcrime redphone crypto zrtp SASCalculator java but I think there may be some additional work to do around versioning Is changing this list possible realistic If you all think this should be changed too I'm happy to help I was building TS from source for a while but stopped a few months ago I do not mind getting everything set up again if it means this will get changed

column3: happened when copied the indicatorText view from outgoing messages and ConversationItem previously relied on its existence or lack thereof to determine whether it should be capable of displaying it

column2: Crash if you use notification reply to SMS
Problems with properly accessing contacts stored via CardDAV on older Android devices
column3: Could it be that TextSecure has problems with contacts stored via CardDAV on older Android devices Since a couple of weeks then on 2 25 3 now 2 26 5 I'm experiencing some problems I have all my contacts stored via CalDAV none on the SIM card and none on the phone that runs on 4 2 2 1 Since a couple of weeks almost all TS using contacts are shown twice in the list of TS users and once under All contacts Only newly added TS contacts are listed once It started when I used TS 2 25 3 2 Today I noticed that one contact was listed in the conversations list and in TS' contacts list without her name only by her number Although the native contacts app shows a perfectly fine entry when I tried to call that person her name was not shown when dialing as it would normally happen instead her number was listed as an other number in the native contacts app her number is labeled mobile In fact when I tried to edit the contact in the native contacts app at the bottom there is an entry for TextSecure that cannot be edited that indicates that the number is stored on the phone with the label other In turn when I restrict the contacts to app to show contacts stored on the phone only it lists none as I would expect Does that imply that TS creates a local copy of the CardDAV phone number on the phone In fact said contact is one the many duplicates 3 I played around and separated and re joined the varying accounts via which I'm connected to said person in the native contacts app Now her name instead of her number only is listed twice again in the list of TS users but the two entries are not listed in two subsequent rows but the first entry jumped to the very top of the list before the names starting with an A I repeated that exercise with another duplicate entry to the same effect it seems that a second list of TS users is created that is alphabetically ordered and stacked on top of the other one Apologies for this lengthy post The only previous issue I found that mentions CardDAV is which solved itself when the user updated to a higher Android version

column2: batch invite
column3: opened against 3 2 0

column2: Failed incoming media messages are weird
column3: If you receive an MMS that fails to download the tap for details hanger on the bottom of the message actually shows up on the right side of the conversation row instead of under the bubble on the left side When you tap it it then shows a message details activity with a resend button even though this is a received message Been this way for a while

column2: UNKNOWN dialing screen and crash
column3: I found the following issue in Signal for Android build 3 0 2 with Samsung Galaxy Note 4 Steps to reproduce Switch your phone into off line flight mode Try to secure call a contact Immediately press the red hang up button to cancel the call Now again try to secure call that contact You will get the following dialing screen with UNKOWN name number and picture screenshot 2015 10 09 21 35 43 If you repeat dial hang up dial hang up multiple times Signal crashes It looks like the bad UNKNOWN dialing screen always first appears with the second call attempt

column2: Wrongly displays Error sending message in groupchat
column3: When I send a message in this groupchat it SOMETIMES displays Error sending message If I then check the details of the message it shows that it tried sending by MMS However the other people in the groupchat do receive the message and do so as a push message In the TextSecure settings I have SMS completely disabled and so by extension also MMS My TextSecure version is 2 3 2 I have an Cyanogenmod rom installed This is the link to the part of my logcat where I tried sending a message in the groupchat that I got by adb I deleted the phone numbers

column2: Message not sent but really was sent to one of two in group
column3: Sent message to group of two other TS users Message could not be delivered so I tapped on it and tapped both members since both showed unsent One member received two messages and the other received one message

column2: Group message reports error if it fails to deliver to one group member
column3: Hello If you send a group message and a member of the group is not valid is fails with an error but does not show any details The message has a flag Tap for details I guess it shows the users it has the message delivered to but not the error The log shows

column2: Incoming calls set media volume permanently to zero
column3: 1 Set media volume to non zero 2 Someone calls you with Signal 3 Answer the call and end it or just directly reject it does not really matter 4 Note that media volume is zero rubber chicken with a pulley in the middle Does not seem to happen with missed calls Only answered and rejected Signal 3 0 1 Nexus 4 stock 5 1 1

column2: encrypted phone work in Galaxy S1 but not S6
column3: I can send encrypted message between both phones I can call from S1 to S6 encrypted But I can not call encrypted from S6 to S1 The lock symbol over the phone symbol is missing When I try to start a phone call in the signal app it starts the normal phone function from the phone

column2: Signal 3 1 1 When sending picture with text text does not show until you scroll after message is sent
column3: When sending a picture the conversation scrolls so that the bottom of the picture is at the bottom of the screen If you have included text as part of the picture message and send it the text will not show until you scroll further I would expect the text to show as well Thanks again guys for the awesome software Signal 3 1 1

column2: Image thumbs in conversation list only after entering convo
column3: Update from 2 28 1 to 3 1 1 In the convo list I then had a group and a single convo saying media message but showed no thumbnail preview The thumbnail appeared after entering end leaving the specific convo Log right after leaving such a convo

column2: Nvidia Shield Tablet not supported
column3: Any chance on getting tablet support for this app I guess it should work out of the box Kind regards Tobber

column2: Sending picture with text window behavior
column3: Using Signal 3 1 1 When I have sent a picture with text my chat window looks like this current state I would either expect the chat to scroll to the bottom as in text only messages like this expectation1 Or the keyboard should disappear also scrolling to the bottom like it in picture only messages looking like this expectation2

column2: Secure call problem
column3: Hi the keylock drawn on the phone icon do not appear with my correspondant who has the new version of app I received his crypted call without problem but I cannot call him with the same way

column2: Secure call silent after 500ms of talking
column3: Hi All I did upgrade to version 3 1 1 and delete Redphone unfortunately I find out that secured calls will be muted on both sides after around 500ms The only what I can hear is a piece of word Hallo I did run Wireshark and it looks that after around 500ms all UDP packages have the same length 72 bytes from the package 55 Before length was jumping from the 28 till 164 bytes Assuming payload is 0 If you check logs the call start from the line 4576 file cat log L4576 Traces Samsung GT I9305 CyanogenMod 11 Android 4 4 4

column2: Verifying number fails
column3: I receive SMS but it fails to automatically identify number and I have to wait at least 1 minute before letting it call me to give me a code Solution let user manually enter the SMS code

column2: show transfer progress when re sending failed media
column3: fixes 4104

column2: TS resending the last sent SMS some 100 times after network unavailable and flight mode cycle
column3: The following has happened for the first time after many months of TS working flawlessly on this phone I sent a plain SMS message as expected and done many times before with TS It was received by the adressee Hours later I found the GSM network unavailable supposedly due to GSM hiccup as the phone was not moved nor touched I enabled then re disabled flight mode in order to cleanly reconnect to the tower As soon as this happened I was briefly notified that TS had troubles sending a message and TS apparently started to flood the send queue with hundreds of resending attempts Unfortunately many if not all succeeded giving the stunned recipient a massive SMS flood DOS experience There was a system popup dialog asking if I wanted to allow TS to send the high number of SMS messages it tried to but the phone S5 normally very fast and slick ROM was so busy sending and playing sound alerts that dialog did not seem to care about my answer or was immediately replaced by a new instance I do not know I shut off the phone and restarted but as soon as GSM was connected the mess continued Alas I did not manage to capture any logs When the phone finally got reponsive again they appeared empty I looked with System Tuner Pro

column2: secure call was not available after upgrade to signal
column3: much like this guy after upgrading to signal i did not have the lock next to the call button so it just brings up the normal dialers and of course the new redphone app just punts over to signal tried resetting the secure session etc no improvement to make matters worse there seems to be some serious lag on re registering you are seeing some new users i hope and not anything bad sinister as i attempted to clear data and reinstall now i'm dead in the water FWIW upgrade worked fine on my wifes phone guess i was just lucky before i reset teh app she could securely call me so it was just an outbound issue

column2: must have googleplay service to use signal
column3: why i must have googleplay service to use the app you must remove this bullshit message

column2: Calling then aborting right away still calls and recipient is forever stuck Connecting
column3: Hi my mom is clumsy and calls me by accident fairly regularly Every damn time it rings for me so I answer Then I'm always stuck at Connecting Regardless of how long I wait it never goes away because there is no one to connect to In my opinion for starters there should be a sound indicating connecting You know when you make a real call it makes a beep occasionally while connecting you Signal could totally use that to make this less confusing Second and more importantly I think Signal should send a message to the server or whatever indicating the call was cancelled to prevent me from sitting there waiting for a call that is never going to connect How to reproduce 1 Person A calls person B 2 Person A hangs up a second or so after pressing the call button 3 Person B answers the call 4 Person B sits around and waits wondering why he can not connect to grandma 5 Person B gets irritated and manually aborts the call

column2: Making a new call immediately results in RedPhone login failed error
column3: When I try to initiate a new call I immediately get an error Anmeldung fehlgeschlagen RedPhone login failed This is on a OnePlus 2 with latest Oxygen version The phone seems to have some issues regarding not knowing if it wants 32 or 64 bit I had that with another app where it tried to use the 32 bit libs instead of the 64 bit ones I do not know how this was fixed though This is just an estimated guess if I can help with debugging let me know but you have to tell me how

column2: Update from Textsecure to Signal on Play Store will not give you encrypted calls function
column3: Steps to reproduce 1 I had Textsecure installed and registered 2 I had Redphone installed and registered in the past But uninstalled for a long time 3 Update to current Signal 3 1 1 via Google Play Result is that I could not see any encrypted calling functionality with Signal with no contact Unregistering and reregister Signal resolved the issue and let me call old Textsecure only Android users What you need to do is offer a seamless upgrade path for old Redphone users and I was only trying it out in the past A normal user will never discover such a hackerish way of a solution Some users even telling to completely uninstall and reinstall or delete app cache to get it working

column2: Signal 3 1 1 Suggestion Long press phone icon to choose secure insecure call
column3: You can not long press the phone lock icon for choosing between secure insecure call like the send button for texting

column2: Signal 3 1 1 should provide a way to register to secure messaging and secure call separatly
column3: Contacts who do not have unlimited 3G would not want someone to call them using secure call because it uses a lot more internet than secure messaging

column2: Cannot un and re register
column3: A friend of mine received the update to 3 1 1 today but calling me did not work Therefore he tried to unregister but constantly gets an error that the server connection cannot be established Furthermore neither encrypted messages but calls with since then

column2: Ca not download MMS
column3: Downloads of attached images worked for one message once and otherwise I have had regular failures I have not reconfigured anything sadly so I have no idea why it worked once I received another MMS earlier today and the conversation view shows a bubble saying Multimedia message MMS download failed Message size 32KB Expires Nov 6 once tapping it says some issues need my attention and a button showing RESEND I do not understand why it says resend as I have not sent anything to this contact in several months and never anything other than pure text Pressing the button does not redownload anything The log is here But unfortunately it was after quitting TextSecure and starting it up again I did not think to capture it before trying to reset the app I'm on AT T The phone was using the WiFi connection at the time but I switched to cellular data and having the same problem I was guessing that perhaps download over an internet connection may be blocked as opposed to the cellular network Any suggestions for what I can try

column2: Update strings xml to fix issue 4278
column3: Change Broadcast in group messages to Broadcast MMS so the user knows that they will send an MMS message Lets the user know of potential costs

column2: Secure phone call not work on nexus 6
column3: On nexus 6 phone call icon not appear lock tried press the icon it open normal systen phone call But it is work on nexus 5

column2: No place to enter verification code after call with app closed
column3: I have had 2 verification calls much later than I pressed the button requesting them Each time I got the call I was already using a different app and had no place to put the code So now I have to leave the app open and wait A manual place to enter the code would be super

column2: Grouping notifications from different conversations is a bad idea
column3: It would be nice if either by default or in an option if there would be separate notifications for each conversation This way it would not block quick reply and it would be easily accessible to people who use Pebble or Android Wear

column2: Pal sending me signal messages I do not have it it says delivered
column3: So I had an Experia Z1 months back I tried TextSecure over a year ago and thought it was OK but I did not really commit and so removed it Factory erased it a couple months back and sold it bought a Galaxy S6 Did not install Signal at all When I look in the play store it says it is installed Does not say where tho I'm allowed to install it and it offers my Galaxy The Experia no longer shows in my devices as of course I removed it To be clear Signal is absolutely NOT installed on my Galaxy and never has been He texted me yesterday via signal and it said it was delivered securely I did not receive it of course I do not have Signal So I texted him a normal SMS today and it came up on his device with the little padlock How is this I can not possibly have sent him a secure message and where are his messages to me going When he goes to message me it says Send Signal message which would have led him to believe it was encrypted and being sent to me I have kept my same mobile number and the buyer of my experia did not get any old sim cards or anything So ummm bug

column2: Read Receipts an Animation to show when someone is typing
column3: I would really like to see an option for read receipts and an animation or something else to show when someone is typing in the conversation Much like the features WhatsApp or iMessage possess

column2: Replace 'my' with 'your'
column3: FREEBIE Description Bringing strings in line with Google is Design Guidelines by replacing 'my' with 'your' Quote Speak directly to users as you not me Don t put words in the users mouths with phrases that use I or my See writing language

column2: Add GPL Header
Remove a extra useless backup makefile
column3: This was a autogenerated backup file from gedit Let is get rid of this for source cleanliness It is not used FREEBIE

column2: Show number of to be deleted conversations messages in confirm dialog
Fixed issue 3536
column3: Updates the visibleThread in MessageNotifier when sending a new message in a new thread Update It also solves another bug related to 3536 When receiving a message after sending the first one in a new thread a push notification was created should not create push since the thread is open

column2: Runtime permissions and Marshmallow compat
column3: I looked at a couple of libraries for the new runtime permissions and did not fall in love with any of them Wrote a basic permission request handler to be a little nicer looking and abstract out all of Android is hard on the eyes result code system Also had to make a few changes to workaround new deprecations in API 23 NotificationCompat and Apache HTTP lib used by our MMS logic Tested in an emulator and the on physical devices for compatibility

column2: new conversation incorrectly displayed as unread
column3: 1 start conversation with A 2 send message to A 3 receive message from A 4 back out to the conversation list UI 5 notice that your conversation with A is shown as unread

column2: Prevents empty conversations from appearing
column3: Tested with Phone Moto G 2014 OS CM 12 1 20150714 NIGHTLY titan Android 5 1 1 Fixes 3581 Edit Since this is a thing FREEBIE

column2: fix bug 3562 messages received while in muted thread not marked as read
column3: Changed the logic in updateNotification method of MessageNotifier I tested this in the emulator going through all the possible logical scenarios in the method everything seems to work fine fixes 3562

column2: Group update triggers thumbnail preview
column3: Have a group with an avatar where the last message is text only Go to update group just hit the check mark See the group avatar as thumbnail preview in the convo list now non avatar groups do not show the default group icon in that scenario v3 1 1

column2: un jank Google Photos sharing
column3: as well as sharing from many other apps most likely We had incorrect assumptions about how temporary URI permissions worked when passed in via share intents This change copies over the file in ShareActivity to hold on to until the user dismisses it Also includes some AttachmentManager refactoring and simplifications

column2: extra logging for activity lifecycle
column3: to help debug 2971

column2: Signal 3 1 1 When sending picture image in thread is clipped
column3: This has been around awhile If I attach an image to a message in 3 1 1 the preview shows the correct HxW ratio say 16 9 but after I send it it only shows a clipped square 1 1 HxW ratio and actually does not let me see the whole picture in the thread If I open the picture it does show the whole picture correctly

Group update triggers thumbnail preview
column3: Have a group with an avatar where the last message is text only Go to update group just hit the check mark See the group avatar as thumbnail preview in the convo list now non avatar groups do not show the default group icon in that scenario

column2: Sharing Picture with Text does not work
column3: I have tried to share Image and Text from an App the draft looks just fine with a preview of the image However when I hit send it just disappears It sounds like 3989 but I do not use the Google Photos App Log is at

column2: media transfer progress missing when re sending a failed attachment
column3: Tryed sending a 12 MB video on WiFi Failed while screen was turned off Shows the typical error bubble but without any thumbnail

column2: messaged received while in muted thread not marked as read
column3: 1 start a new thread with A 2 send some messages back and forth 3 mute A 4 receive message from A while in thread with A 5 back out to conversation list 6 notice that conversation with A is shown as unread

column2: Cannot share photos from Google Photos
column3: I have a Nexus 6 with stock android 5 1 1 the problem is always reproducible The steps are 1 Take a photo with the phone camera 2 Go to the Photos app open the image and share it to TextSecure 3 TextSecure opens Chose a recipient The image appears in the conversation 4 Press send The message disappears nothing is sent Here is the debug log The initial logged crash is probably not related to this but to another issue that I'm going to report right after this

column2: update appcompat dependencies
column3: Our betterpickers library had an ownership chance so I switched us to their latest version Updated AppCompat to the most recent version available before the current one which requires a compile target of Marshmallow which in turn has a huge set of consequences Start adding the new support annotations to our code

column2: Fixing the issue 2791 Export backups to a sub folder
column3: This pr puts the plain text backup under the folder Signal Backup On the import side verify if old backup file exist to oldest clients Also I have changed the EncryptedBackupExporter to point to the new backup path I did not have tested the EncryptedBackupExporter because this is not working

column2: Update regular expression pattern for sms verification
column3: In South Korea SMS message include an extra text in front of body message in first line The extra text provide information that where message comes from So SMS verification cannot be passed in South Korea while registering It will cause failure of registration so that they can only choose ARS

column2: remove brackets from recipient numbers as not allowed for dialing
column3: this bugfix resolves issue 1516 Square brackets in numbers prevent the SmsManager from sending the message in some phones

column2: screen security setting does not apply to submit debug log UI
column3: 1 enable screen security 2 Settings Advanced Submit debug log 3 open recent activities view 4 notice that screen security did not do its thing

column2: Signal 3 0 3 Suddently password required in the middle of conversation
column3: I was texting with another TS friend and a few messages 5 back and forth suddenly was required to enter my password for TS even though I do not have it timing out

column2: Microphone does not work in an ICS Huawei device
column3: Not sure if this is really a bug or my device and ROM just suck but I will report anyway The microphone of my Huawei U8800 does not seem to work with Signal After establishing the call the other party does not hear anything I have gone through all the system settings and there is nothing that should prevent the microphone from working It works with regular calls And it sort of works with Google Hangouts calls there is static noise but the voice goes through But for Signal there is no sound at all I do not know if RedPhone works I tried to install it and register but the voice verification I received was silent so I could not test with it As this Huawei is my test device and it has cheap outdated hardware with a weird outdated and rooted ROM I do not mind if this will ever work But in the case that this is a Signal bug and it concerns other devices too here is a log There are a lot of these in there Signal 3 0 1 Huawei U8800 4 0 4

column2: Change 'SD card' to istorage' cosmetic corrections
column3: Fixes 3920 Change 'SD card' in strings to istorage' for clarity consistency Furthermore I have done a couple of minor cosmetic string corrections I have decided to include these here rather than in a separate PR as there is some overlap with the 'SD card' stuff and I would like to save the translators from translating these strings twice Change app is name from 'SMSBackup And Restore' to its official name 'SMS Backup Restore' Change 'Import encrypted backup' into ' Restore encrypted backup' as this is the only option that replaces the complete database rather than add to it which all the 'import' options do arestore' is the wording used in the description string as well Remove redundant periods at the end of single sentences of some related description strings in line with Google is design guidelines and the rest of Signal is description strings Remove some redundant line feeds in XML confusing to translators at Transifex

column2: Ca not properly translate some strings in Signal on Transifex
column3: With the latest strings added to the Signal Android project on Transifex there is no way for me to correctly translate some of them to my language Slovenian SEND TO 1 s FRIEND S Send 1 s SMS invite s Due to differencies between languages I can not use keys in the cases above and if I do not use them Transifex does not let me save my translations I suggest you solve these issues the same way as you did with 2421 without using keys

column2: Fixing the issue 2791 Export backups to a sub folder
column3: This pr puts the plain text backup under the folder Signal Backup On the import side verify if old backup file exist to oldest clients Also I have changed the EncryptedBackupExporter to point to the new backup path I did not have tested the EncryptedBackupExporter because this is not working

column2: new group conversation creates additional conversations with members
column3: If you create a new group with people you do not have a conversation with already the new group gets created plus normal conversations for every member If you open this conversations and go back the conversation is gone Tested with a new install of current master

column2: english playstore desciption still uses TextSecure
column3: Open Source Signal is Free and Open Source enabling anyone to verify its security by auditing the code TextSecure is the only private messenger that uses open source peer reviewed cryptographic protocols to keep your messages safe and Please file any bugs issues or feature requests at

column2: German Google Play page still says TextSecure
column3: On the German Google Play page it still says TextSecure instead of Signal

column2: Contact is phone number does not update when changing sim
column3: So a friend of mine recently changed their sim card and thus got a new phone number In the normal Signal chat session pane it will show the person is name with their phone number below it However this number has stayed the same when I view my chat with this person I actually had no idea this person had changed their sim number until a few weeks later even though I was frequently messaging them via Signal After they told me I then added their number to my contacts list so now both the new and old numbers are listed under their name in my phone is contacts list However the Signal chat pane still shows the old number I should point out that this in no way affects functionality of the app it is purely the aesthetical display of the phone number under their name If this is due to the fact I still have the old number saved I cannot remove that as that friend still swaps between the 2 sims on rare occasions

column2: microg GmsCore as free alternative for proprietary Gms
column3: Hello As stated here he would be pleased to see a 'API compatible open source implementation of play services' to make it possible to use signal with GMS without the need to install GAPPS Well there is now good progress in this direction with the project microG GmsCore This aims to be a 'framework to allow applications designed for Google Play Services to run on systems where Play Services is not available' Would it be possible to accept this as an alternative At the moment this project can be used to run Signal without GAPPS The disadvantage is that microg GmsCore needs to fake app signatures at the moment to get Signal running This is a huge security risk If Signal would accept microg GmsCore as an alternative to the proprietary implementation there would be no need anymore to tamper with the android security system What do you Signal developers think about this and would you consider this as an alternative Kind regards PS I am not affiliated with this project More can be found here

column2: Notification about a new Signal user appears every few seconds
column3: A friend is an iPhone user and installed Signal a longer time ago I am being told said friend is on Signal say hey every 20s In his chat I can only send unsecured SMS Signal messages or Signal calls are not available SMS transmission fails Force closing the app does not change anything I will still receive a notification every few seconds If I try to start a new conversation with him it has the header Take your conversation with said friend to the next level Invite to Signal Deleting the last active Signal chat with him did not have any effect I am still getting a notification every few seconds screenshot 20151106 002432 My device Stock Nexus 5 Android 6 0 Signal 3 3 0 all permissions are allowed The screenshot shows that I have a screen filter active rootless CF Lumen and a custom set DPI Both should not provoke this behaviour App state Push registered set as SMS application debug log

column2: Ca not call Signal iOS
column3: After upgrading to 3 3 0 I can not call to iOS anymore When I downgrade to 3 1 1 the call works OK I run 3 3 0 on Android 4 4 4 Log at I get this screen when I call from 3 3 0 screenshot 2015 11 06 11 49 40

column2: Quick capture always uses front cam as default
column3: V 3 3 Sony Z1 compact 5 1 1 Whenever I enter a convo a try to quick capture I get scared a little bit of what I see The happy me So the front cam is the default for me In convo the change to back is stored though between closing and opening the quick capture Until reentering Stock and 3rd party cam behave well and default to back Log after entering convo and opening quick capture front mode of course You dropped some log outputs did you

column2: New attachment selector close arrow shows in wrong direction
column3: In case the selector is overlaying the keyboard Arrows shows down Animation goes up in direction of the paperclip Just does not feel right maybe it is the urge to nitpick

column2: catch camera RuntimeExceptions
column3: Does not fix the root cause of 4415 but stops it from crashing We should be catching these anyway

column2: camera becomes unavailable with quick capture
column3: yesss twichty fingers is around again open convo open quick capture rapidly change between compose field and quick capture bang log after cam crash Wanted to reproduce the case where cam and keyboard are on screen the same time which I encountered a few minutes ago in 3 3 sounds familiar In case I got the mentioned behavior which somehow is new Edit to few log outputs it feels to me Edit 2 maybe it crashes cause of what the camera sees on the front cam joy

column2: Fix twitchy fingers bug in CameraView
column3: better diagnostic information too fixes 4422

column2: Contacts with WhatsApp appearing twice in Signal is contact list
column3: I guess this is somehow related to 4029 but that one seems to be fixed while I'm still experiencing that kind of issue Almost all of my contacts appear a couple of times in Signal is contact list with all of their different phone numbers So far so good expected behaviour But many have additional duplicate entries with the same number it is always a mobile number listed twice One of them has the format 12 345 67890 which is exactly how I format all of my phone book is entries The other one the duplicate has the very same number but formatted as 1234567890 a format not to be found in my phone book I have noticed that as far as I looked each of the contacts with this kind of duplicate has an WhatsApp entry in Android is phone book actually 2 entries one for calls and one for messages Interestingly though the WhatsApp entries in Android is phone book are also sort of correctly formatted as 12 345 67890 I do not necessarily say that the WhatsApp entries are the culprit i e they confuse Signal But it surely looks like they are It has been like this for a long time but I just took the time to inspect this more closely I'm using vanilla Android 6 on a Nexus 5 with Signal 3 3 0

column2: Feature Request Support fingerprint reader as an alternative to PIN for encryption
Is this screen flow intended
column3: Signal 3 3 0 other side the latest iOS version Yesterday I received a Signal call While calling on speaker I received a little bit delayed Signal message from the same person I pulled down the notification drawer to see tghe message and got in the standard Signal messages screen When I pushed the back button I more or less expected to re enter the call screen but I got in the list of conversations Is that intended When I re opened the conversation with the person who was calling we could continue to talk during this and pushed the call button I re entered the Redphone call screen

column2: https invite links
column3: FREEBIE

column2: material dialogs not found on maven
Some conversation colours are horrible to read
column3: One contact got yellow as colour and it not very good for reading their messages

column2: Revert Disable backups for Android M
column3: This reverts commit 3bec127020ca9d63f0964672adfc90d5753d3a90

column2: registering with the same phone number breaks original registration
column3: Since commit 5757962f95ae8e64330a75940a46b18e2becfcec was added you can now install Signal on WiFi only devices like tablets However if you do this and register using the same phone number as your phone with a Signal install your phone will no longer be able to receive or send Signal messages and vice versa The obvious solution is better multi device support which is already on the roadmap But until then there should be some warning that you can only have one device per number right now

column2: Do not turn display on during calls
column3: Signal 3 3 1 Call someone using headphones Turn the display off with power button on phone After a few seconds the display is switched on again There is no way to keep the screen off during the call Proximity sensor turning it off does not help when you are not holdint the phone to your ear and it should not turn the display on unless pressing the power button again

column2: Long pressing emoji backspace deletes only one character
column3: Another lovely emoji keyboard related issue If you want to remove ten characters with the emoji drawer is backspace you have to tap it ten times Long press does not work Compare to the regular keyboards' backspace which you can tap and hold to remove everything at once Tested with TS 2 11 0 Android 5 0 1 Android 4 0 4

column2: Low volume and very poor quality
column3: Low volume both hands free talking enabled and disabled and very poor quality Found with Signal 3 1 1 on Samsung Galaxy Note 4 device The competing open source app is louder and clearer on the same network conditions

column2: Low volume and very poor quality Signal 3 3 1
column3: Low volume both hands free talking enabled and disabled and very poor quality Found with Signal 3 3 1 on Samsung Galaxy Note 4 device The competing open source app is louder and clearer on the same network conditions Note This is NOT a duplicate of 4244 since that issue is about builds earlier than 3 3 1

column2: Change 'SD card' to istorage' cosmetic corrections rebased 3 3 0
column3: Rebased against master 3 3 0 Replaces 4317 Fixes 3920 Change 'SD card' in strings to istorage' for clarity consistency Furthermore I have done a couple of minor cosmetic string corrections I have decided to include these here rather than in a separate PR as there is some overlap with the 'SD card' stuff and I would like to save the translators from translating these strings twice Change app is name from 'SMSBackup And Restore' to its official name 'SMS Backup Restore' Change 'Import encrypted backup' into ' Restore encrypted backup' as this is the only option that replaces the complete database rather than add to it which all the 'import' options do arestore' is the wording used in the description string as well Remove redundant periods at the end of single sentences of some related description strings in line with Google is design guidelines and the rest of Signal is description strings Remove some redundant line feeds in XML confusing to translators at Transifex

column2: Replace 'my' with 'your' rebased 3 3 0
column3: 4369 rebased against 3 3 0 FREEBIE Description Bringing strings in line with Google is Design Guidelines by replacing 'my' with 'your' Quote Speak directly to users as you not me Don t put words in the users mouths with phrases that use I or my See writing language

column2: Ability to disable Invite to Signal suggestion
column3: I'm happy with Invite to Signal pop ups appearing by default but it would be great if there were a setting you could use to disable this or possibly also fine tune the situations in which they appear

column2: Always play sonar on call initialization
column3: If sonar was the last sound played on the last call it was not being played on the next calling attempt due to this line in OutgoingRinger L82 Steps to reproduce B has no internet connection A tries to call B hears sonar ringer A hangs up tries to call B again no sonar ringer

column2: Android Wear notifications WIP
column3: warning This merge request is currently work in progress Do not merge and I are working on it Changes One stack group element per contact is displayed Messages appear in the order they were received latest message bottom Notifications are ordered by the time of latest message arrival Contacts with the newest message appear on top Currently alarms for messages are disabled If an alarm ringtone vibration is set on the summary notification every single thread message appears on the handheld If an alarm is set on the single thread notifications the more notifications arrive the more alarms are kicked off TODOs Enable alarms for incoming messages This merge request implements feature

column2: Cursor occasionally missing when opening a conversation
column3: This is something I encountered while trying to reproduce 3134 of which I cut 'n' pasted my comments here because the issue appears to be separate Sometimes when I open a conversation the cursor is missing This happens on average 5 of the time The cursor comes back when you tap the input box though I speculate this issue was introduced in 2 14 1 but I'm not sure if I would have noticed anything without 3134 Here are some tests I ran while trying to pin it down for each conversation in the main conversation list repeat 30 50 or 100 times open the conversation count if cursor shows or not tap Android is back button to go back to main conversation list Nexus 4 Android 5 1 TS 2 14 1 Does not seem to happen on 4 0 4 But I had just one conversation Here is a debug log from Lollipop after rebooting phone opening TS switching between the conversation list and a specific conversation until the cursor disappeared took 16 tries I realize this is a new version of TextSecure makes my phone run 0 4 Fahrenheit colder than before and it is affecting my testicle balance when I keep my phone in my pocket type of an issue but I'm doing this mostly for documentation Maybe this has some relevance to another more important case in the future I think I'm gonna unsub myself as soon as I hit that Submit button

column2: Show who has Signal and who has not in the list of text messages
column3: Hello I wish there was a way of telling who has Signal and who has not immediately by looking at the contact is name on the front page of Signal It would only take a tiny lock next to their name As it is right now there is no way of teling if a user has Signal or not unless you click their name It is not a big deal I know But if the long term goal of Signal is to compete with WhatsApp I would say this feature is a necessity Sorry for a dizzy post I have had the flu for quite some time now

column2: No audio from call Can receive but cannot transmit
column3: Person can receive calls and can hear the other person but the other person cannot hear anything just dead silence Person canl also make calls although sometimes the other end does not get notified of the call and when it does it is like 30 mins afterwards of a missed call Here goes the debug log right after a call that audio was received but not sent I can see 2 java exceptions and termination stacks so seems to me this person is phone model is not well supported Thank you Devs

column2: Refactor group logic
column3: This is just moving around the business logic separate from UI refresh GroupManager class sibling of MessageSender handles all network and DB related group management work and is nicely annotated this time to be more confidently NPE safe All the AsyncTasks are now static and have their variables explicitly passed into their constructor Fixed the cases of changing instance variables off the main thread since that was bound to lead to danger The Adapter now keeps track of the members list none of that weird syncing between the list in the activity and the adapter and the ArrayAdapter underneath that Just a single BaseAdapter that has a list that manages it so the user sees what will be used in the logic

column2: Signal Registration Error
column3: Device info HTC One M8 stock android 5 0 1 Signal 3 1 1 My registration process terminated with error I try Network with mobile data WLAN and via USB but always the same error What is wrong registration process x establish connection successfully x SMS check incoming SMS successfully x create keys successfully 2015 11 09 15 58 34 screenrecord2 Registration ERROR err2a the Log

column2: Refactor group logic no visual changes
column3: 3 4 0 rebased version of with newline comments addressed

column2: Update build instructions with new URLs Expand Android Studio steps
column3: Update the URLs in the BUILDING md with the new URLs for name change Add minor additional details to set up with Android Studio spelling error fix

column2: Add the option to mute notifications for one year Closes 4448
column3: Some people like to have groups always muted Previously it was only possible to mute them one week at a time which can get cumbersome This adds the option to mute them for one year to the list

column3: fixes 4388 FREEBIE

column2: remove
column3: Its great that you cant make screen captures but it would be great to if you could delete your textmessege

column3: It would be great if you could delete the text message youve just send

column2: go back to old CameraView
column3: fixes 4415 in a backwards kind of way

column2: Quick capture regression
column3: Hi every time I try to take a picture directly in the app the app crashes Hotfix please Crash log coming real soon now Waiting for Firefox to sync the bookmark

column2: go back to old CameraView
column3: fixes 4415

column2: contact selection reeemix
column3: 1 RecyclerView based with better long scroller and more material inspired look 2 Add badge for Signal users to contact selection list so users can easily identify Lil' Signalers even outside the top section

column2: Add longer muting periods
column3: I have friends who always want to mute certain groups Currently it is only possible to mute groups one week at a time which can get really cumbersome I would be convenient for them to have the option to mute these groups for a really long time Is there any rationale not to extend the muting options with longer periods like 1 year or forever 9999 years

column2: Signal 3 1 1 crash during call
column3: Was talking to other Android signal 3 1 1 user and my signal crashed

column2: No dialer integration since move from Redphone to Signal
column3: Previous behavior with Redphone If I initiated a call from the system dialer for a user that was registered with Redphone I received a pop up asking if I wanted to upgrade the call to a Redphone call In addition calls showed up in the list of sent received and missed calls in the system dialer even if placed via Redphone Current Behavior With the introduction of Signal there is no longer any dialer integration Why the change matters I think this was a nice feature as it means a user could simply initiate calls through the system dialer as opposed to opening Signal to initiate a call This make it more likely that unsophisticated users like my mother would actually make secure calls since they do not have to do anything differently A Google search revealed another user brought up this issue but attempting to access that page results in a 404 I did not see any existing issues in Github Tested with Signal 3 1 1 and 3 3 1 on Cyanogenmod 11 Milestone 11 Android 4 4 4 on a One Plus One A0001

column2: Support for permanent disabling of notifications for group person
column3: Currently it is possible to disable notifications for a group for up to a week but it would be nice if it could be done permanently Seems like earlier work on this was done in 757

column2: Multiple notifications crashes app
column3: Signal has crashed again on my phone so I am submitting the debug log that I am able to access from the login screen using the three dots in the top right corner I do not intend to submit a duplicate entry however I'm not sure if this is the same log or not This morning I woke up turned on the screen on my phone and my notifications for text messages begin coming in There were approximately 9 to 10 messages three of them hide pictures on them and I am unable to retrieve them The only way I can get the signal application to open without crashing is to have the phone in airplane mode and this does not allow for the multimedia message to be downloaded Being that I am unsure which message is causing the phone to crash I'm going to try to delete picture messages one by one It would be greatly appreciated at this point if you all would allow the next update of this application to allow those of us who wanted textsecure to revert back to it I never had this level of instability with that application on my phone it saddens me greatly that the picture messages I am probably going to be deleting are going to be those thanking me for my service on Veterans Day Device column2: Add 'Signal Call' option to contact card
column3: Fixes 4392 FREEBIE

column2: Signal call not an option in contact details
column3: Tap a contact is avatar click the Signal icon There is only an option to message the person using Signal not call them even though I have made Signal calls with this contact before

column2: contact selection reeeeemix
column3: 3 4 0 rebased 4431

column2: Update contact DB on incoming messages
column3: When we receive a Signal message from a previously unregistered user reflect that in the contact DB Fixes 3949 FREEBIE

column2: Tint audio controls to be visible in dark theme
column3: Fixes 4353 FREEBIE

column2: some users in Mexico cannot register can register only temporarily
column3: At least some users in Mexico are having difficulty registering with Signal As far as I have heard this is an ongoing problem that also affected TextSecure The symptoms I have seen are that 1 SMS registration does not work the registration times out unsuccessfully 2 The user can successfully register using voice verification and an encrypted session can be initialized and messages sent back and forth 3 However the Mexican phone then decides that it is no longer registered and encrypted messages cannot be sent or received I suspect this issue may be related to 3360 there are multiple valid formats for a Mexican phone number I have posted a debug log

column2: Audio preview controls difficult to see in dark theme
column3: The play button and seek bar controls are difficult to see with some colors when using the dark theme Example dark theme top light theme bottom for comparison play Making them white on the dark theme would solve this Signal 3 1 1 Nexus 4 stock 5 1 1

column2: textsecure contacts do not auto update on receiving a message from a newly registered TS who is in your contact list
column3: it requires a manual refresh of the contact list with the not so obvious pull to refresh mechanism

column2: Speaker and microphone dead in secure calls
column3: This morning I tried to establish a couple of secure calls between two Android Signal phones Only the first time everything worked fine however thereafter everytime after having successfully established a connection my phone would not transmit anything I said nor would I hear anything my friend said It is as if my phone was dead even though the app indicates are normally functioning call I adjusted my phone is volume during such calls it does not seem like the volume had been set to zero or something A couple of times the connection would sort of disappear with both phones stating in the top bar that a phone call to an unknown recipient was active clicking on that notification gave a screen identical to the one depicted in In the most recent attemts to call my friend her phone would not even ring anymore In case someone found the time to have a look here are the logs My phone Signal 3 0 3 Android 4 2 2 and most recently with the failed call initialization Other phone Signal 3 0 3 Android 4 1 2

column2: reset contact selection after sending batch SMS invites
column3: fixes 4452

column2: fail faster in FileNotFoundException case
column3: I actually could not reproduce 3053 in 3 3 1 but either way it does make more sense to fail immediately without retry if we receive a FileNotFoundException so adding this in for extra sanity

column2: attachment drawer not big enough when keyboard is open
column3: When the keyboard is open and you open the new and really nice attachment drawer you can still see the keyboard peeking through I think it would look much better if the attachment drawer had the size of the keyboard or the keyboard gets closed before I do not have this problem with the emoji drawer the behaviour there is perfect Nexus 4 5 1 1 screenshot 21 53 29 HTC Desire 2 3 7 screenshot 20151106 215421

column2: Contact selection not reseted after sending invitations
column3: When I send invitations via SMS the contact selection is not reseted if I want to sent invitations again I would expect that no contacts are selected if I continue sending invitations How to reproduce In Main Screen Menu Invite friends Click Send SMS Select a contact Click Send to 1 friend s Confirm Send 1 SMS invite s Dialog with Yes Back at invitation screen with Invitations sent Notification Click Send SMS again Previous contact selection is still active Expected No contacts are selected

column2: Sending a deleted image gets stuck in pending state
column3: This came up in 3046 briefly Sometimes when you delete a picture it will leave around ghost thumbnails that are visible in the system gallery and also in TS attachment gallery This can lead to the following issue if you try to send the deleted image 1 Delete a picture that is on your device with shell or a file manager or create a ghost thumbnail in some other way 2 Attach that picture to a TS message using the attachment gallery is Recent tab the gallery does not know that the picture was deleted 3 You will get a missing thumbnail icon 4 Tap send 5 TS will create an empty message that gets stuck in a pending state for eternity If you try to do the same in Google Hangouts you will get a 'Ca not find picture' notification and you cannot send the image TextSecure should also check if the file exists and not trust the gallery viewer gif demonstration output TS 2 12 0 stock Android 5 1 and Android 4 0 4

column2: Is ProtocolV2 Going to Stick
column3: I'm currently looking to write a Signal compatible library that lets people send 2FA codes if supported and fallback to SMS if not Before I dive too deep is ProtocolV2 going to be changed drastically any time soon Or can I rely on that as a solid reference material with a reasonable level of confidence that there wo not be a ProtocolV3 in the next month or so In case anyone is wondering I will be using libsodium for Curve25519 etc I will not be writing my own primitives

column2: Sudden switch to unencrypted conversation
column3: White in the middle of an ongoing conversation encryption stopped working The other one can send me encrypted messages but I have to fall back to SMS He also not listed as Signal contact any longer Log

column2: move db query off main thread fix group self add
column3: Fixed adding yourself to a group as well as us doing DB queries on the main thread to check for push eligibility Also fixed a regression where updating a group said New group in title fixes 4168

column2: adhere to android plural standards
column3: using ONE changes the button sizes too much and no need to accentuate the fact that someone is only inviting one friend

column2: possible to add dupe contact to group
Wording 'SD Card' vs 'Storage'
column3: The wording of several strings is inconsistent regarding the use of 'SD Card' and 'Storage' although all of these strings refer to the very same thing as seen in the source code I would like to do a small PR correcting that but want to gather information first what term is prefered Some things to consider As far as I know TextSecure is not able to access a areal' SD card when using KitKat or Lollipop The term 'SD card' could be confusing to users with no SD card slot on their phone The concept of a 'emulated SD card' could be even more confusing to those users 'There are no power users' Possible terms SD card storage device storage external storage thx 4601 anything else I would appreciate your input

column2: bring back the ripple when clicking on preview
App is not usable without Google Play Services
column3: I realize this feature is likely necessary to have anything close to sane battery usage savings but for those of us who run Cyanogen without any google service installed it makes it impossible to benefit from the Signal app It would be awesome if you were to make an option version that would function without the push notifications of google Keep up the good work

column2: Response 401 Login failed on encrypted call
column3: When i try to call another signal user over signal i get Login Failed Error Message and the call aborts Text messages do work without a problem I have already tried resolve this issue by unregistering my mobile number via the webinterface and reregistering inside signal I still get the error Debug log You will find this Exception in line 881 When i try to call my number from another signal instance from Google Playstore then an error message is displayed saying that the called party me is not capable of encrypted calls But when i use the librephone app xmikos on my mobile to call the other way around it works very well Please note that i do use the websocket version from xmikos My understanding is that this build does not change the redphone part of signal so i come here for help

column2: Feature Request Voice messages
column3: Hi I could not find a similar issue I would love to be able to hold to speak release to send voice messages a la telegram and whatsapp Great app but this feature would be great

column2: Encrypted call not available
column3: My friend previously used a fork of signal and I told him to get the official version from the playstore Yet while we both have the official signal from the playstore Latest version The encrypted call option is not available The option is available for other contacts so I guess the problem is on his end What could be the problem

column2: Ca not get connected secure calls
column3: Hello With friends we installed Signal 2 Android users and 1 iPhone and can not get connected secure calls between us We verified our keys using barcode scanner and also sending SMS works When I call a friend he has same version of Signal as we all installed it at same time he gets the call ringing but when he answers on my caller side Signal still states Calling for a while and then drops the call When he calls me the situation is same I get the call but when I answer it just states establishing connection or similar and then after a while it drops the connection We have the same issue when we try to make calls on local Wifi or 3G 4G networks I use Android 5 1 1 non roted original ROM Samsung S6 Edge Friend uses Android 5 0 2 non roted original ROM Samsung Note 3 Friend uses iPhone 5 Here is the full debug log from my phone

column2: Annoying SMS notifications when a messages have been received
column3: I see two different behaviours when I am in Canada and in Chile whenever I send a SMS non secure text message In Canada koodo I see a check next to the message I sent and that is Good In Chile virgin a virtual provider I see a check but I also receive from 1 to 3 extra messages saying Mensaje fue recibido por 56 which translates to Message was received by 56 I believe I receive 1 message for as many cell operators roaming the message have passed to get to its destination And I guess that because the message is in Spanish Signal does not parse it in order to hide it or change it for something else The annoying part is that in a conversation it appears that infamous message every time I sent something so the thread is hard to follow Besides that I get a notification when I have not received an actual reply tricking me If you point me in the right direction I might provide a patch to fix it Update Android 4 4 Signal 3 3 1 when it just became Signal from TextSecure

column2: Sending Receiving SMS does not work when 3G 4G Wifi disabled
column3: Since the last update on the Play Store the Signal app cannot send nor receive SMS when the phone is on GSM namely when 3G 4G Wifi is disabled Is this normal I am using a Nexus 5 with Android 6 last update Best

column2: Signal messages delayed and unable to initiate secure calls until recipient restarts Signal app
column3: Over the last several days I have noticed that messages are occasionally not being delivered one checkmark and I am unable to initiate a secure call to said contact I confirmed that the user is phone was on at the time he had a data connection Wifi and in fact the Signal app was opened in the background The user was able to receive emails and regular phone calls without issue Restarting the Signal app fixed the problem In addition after restarting the app he recevied all my previous messages This user was running Android 4 4 4 on a One Plus One with Signal 3 1 1 I had a similar issue with a Signal iOS user Signal 2 2 iOS 8 4 1 iPhone 5S Messages to that user went through nearly instantly but I was unable to initiate a secure call However the user could call me via Signal and my phone rang nearly instantly When the user closed the Signal app I was able to initiate a call and it rang on her phone within a second I understand that Google Cloud Messaging is believed it be causing delayed message delivery intermittently However the behavior I'm seeing appears to impact both iOS and Android clients the messages are not merely delayed but do not arrive at all until the app is restarted and when the recipient restarts his her Signal applicaiton new messages sent to that user are delivered within seconds As noted above calls are also impacted I can not see why restarting Signal would suddenly make GCM more reliable so it seems there may be a bug in Signal causing the delays and inability to initiate secure calls Would logs useful If so do you want them for me sender or the recipient that is not receiving the messages

column2: German invite texts to signal sound rather spammy
column3: I like the invite feature but what I do not like is the text Wechseln wir zu Signal Let is move to Signal a strange looking link does not sound really trustworthy Hardly anyone knows about Signal So I assume recipents would rather think that someone has hijacked my phone I would suggest to change the text what people can more relate to Security and Encription Comparing it to SMS or Whats Apps that it is free That might be a longer text but more trustworthy and understandable Let is move to Signal the secure and free WhatsApp SMS alternative Link one that looks more trustworthy German Wechsel wir zu Signal eine sichere und freie Alternative zu WhatsApp

column2: Impossible to send SMS to short numbers
column3: It is impossible to send SMS to short numbers because it automatically adds the country code at the beginning of the number For example for 2282 it adds 47 to the number so it will be 47 2282 if you live in Norway that makes it impossible to send because the GSM networks at least here in Norway do not allow 47 in front of short numbers I tried with version 3 3 3

column2: Language of Contact is Additions

column2: Add branded launch screen
column3: When the app starts cold there is currently a blank white screen that shows for about 1 2 a second longer on slower devices while the app loads This introduces a simple branded launch screen as defined by the Google design docs launch screens branded launch that shows the TextSecure icon on a black background while the app is initializing Having a simple blank screen that matches the theme would probably be better but as far as I know and I would like to be proven wrong there is no way to color the launch screen background according to the theme I went with the black version of it so people with the dark theme at night are not blinded by white whereas a black loading screen with the light theme is not as bad IMO

column2: Let me aggressively invite non textsecure friends
column3: I just set Textsecure as my default SMS app on Android Every time I send an unconventional SMS I would like to invite these users to install Textsecure Signal because I want more of my friends to be able to have private conversations with me I also want Textsecure to spread organically because I think that would be good for the world I would like a preference that would append short invite text and an invite link to every message provided there are enough characters for example Let is speak privately SHORTLINK or Get privacy SHORTLINK or Get this SHORTLINK Ideally you would experiment and figure out whatever text worked the best For any user that sets their default SMS app as textsecure signal you should ask them if they would like to turn this on

column2: Everything is messed up after phone number change
column3: I recently had to change my phone number and used the recommended protocol from the support pages to do so After reenabling push messages everything worked fine on my side but most of my contacts only received an error instead of my messages Message encrypted for non existant session After they sent a message to me this problem was resolved I guess a new session was opened by that Furthermore my old number did still show up in all of my group conversations and broke them for everybody Error sending message As I can not reactivate my old number our only option was to create new groups My first attempt to do so was also unsuccessful because of the session errors mentioned above Half of the members still had their old session with me and only received notification about an unknown group in which they could not read or write I'm not familiar with the specifics of how Textsecure handles sessions or group conversations so all I can do is report this strange behaviour and hope for some smart people to figure out what went wrong here

column2: Changing app appearance fixes user jumping to root settings
column3: Changing the theme or language returns the user to the root settings screen which can be jarring If you accidentally tapped on the wrong language this also makes it harder find your way back For Android 3 0 Honeycomb and up this can be prevented by calling recreate on the Activity instead of using finish and manually starting a new instance Possibly a fix for 2476 FREEBIE

column2: MasterCipher constructor is sloooooow
column3: L65 As it turns out over the course of loading the items in the conversation list view Cipher getInstance is called 32 times from its various initializations and takes 100ms of main thread time per dataset change which means 300 500ms of main thread time per message sent since the cursor is reloaded up to 5 times when a message is sent Seems like we should either have one MasterCipher instance that we pass along to the various Mms SmsDatabase readers or at least have the Cipher instances be static singletons

column2: thread batch selection only displays selection count after count goes above 1

column2: Tap the local key to Share it
column3: This touches on 1911 and 826 When you are staring at your own fingerprint what should tapping on it do Nothing That is dumb In Android We expect to be able to copy data between apps and a fingerprint is exactly the kind of thing a user would want to share with someone So tapping your local fingerprint now prompts you to send your fingerprint to any app you have that accepts plain text If you already have a communication channel you trust this simplifies your universe and this makes it dead easy to publish it on Twitter et c

column2: Add Encrypted SMS between Signal users
column3: There should really be an option to send encrypted SMS instead of solely relying on an internet connection for encrypted chat I mean it is definitely possible between Signal users The problem arises when one party does not have an internet connection but both parties have a mobile signal You have to resort to insecure SMS in order to get a message through This should not be the case Between signal users it should seamlessly be able to switch between secure SMS and secure IM when available
