column2: Rekey ish support for group chats
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Upon reinstalling Signal or more commonly for me flashing a new android ROM group chats do not recognize my new key Steps to reproduce Install Signal set up a group chat Reinstall Signal thus generating a new set of keys for the same phone number Have a friend send a message to the previously set up group chat Realize that you are unable to respond to the message Actual result I essentially become a ghost reader Friends are unable to remove and re add me to the group or re verify my key allowing me to become a normal member again causing us to have to create an entirely new group As per the screenshots this is very confusing for the less tech savvy members of the group there are always several chats floating around and it is hard to tell which one I can write in The only workaround we have found is for me to remove myself from the group flash a ROM and then have a friend re add me to the group But that seems like bad UX Expected result This is a little tricky but here is what I'm envisioning Upon reinstalling Signal the group gets a notification that my key has changed similar to individual chats and they have to re verify it Once they do the group shows up in my Signal app where perhaps all I can see is a note reading Mark Cohen was added back into the group or something similar same design as Mark Cohen left the group messages After that step I'm again a normal member of the group and can read write as before Note I'm more than happy to contribute a PR for this provided y'all think this is something worth implementing I'm also unsure if the eventual fix belongs in both apps or server side Let me know Screenshots Pressing the Send Signal message text entry bar does nothing screenshot 20160812 163946 Group members list is empty to me but to them I'm added normally screenshot 20160812 164000 No Update Leave Group options screenshot 20160812 164005 Device info replace the examples with your info Device Nexus 5X Android version This has occurred on several Android 6 0 ROMs PureNexus CM etc as well as stock Android 6 0 1 MTC20F and the most recent Android N developer preview NPD90G Signal version 3 16 1 and many versions previous Link to debug log immediately after the bug has happened capture a debug log via Signal is advanced settings and paste the link below 3

column2: Expiration banner hidden under another banner
column3: After the app expires there is no message to the user that it expired Only messages simply fail to be send The only way to discover that the app expired is to see in the debug console I think this should be more user friendly Moreover it would be great if this could be display also few days at least before the expiration So that user can react in time

column2: Add Paranoid Mode or something similar to further encapsulate the complexity and make Signal even more userfriendly
column3: Hey there I hope this issue is correctly placed here I want to split it in two tiers My perception of what the Signal client lacks to be even more user friendly and easily adaptable and my personal suggestion how this situation could be improved I just realized that this is a extension of 838 with a slightly different approach Its still a relevant and interesting topic in my opinion The Problem There is a huge trade off between privacy trustworthiness and usability ok this was obvious I use signal ever since it was TextSecure and started with SMS maybe 3 years ago and watched it evolve over the time It continuously became more seamless to use but in my perception some of this implementations are diametrically opposed to the reason we all use Signal privacy And on the other hand there are some features that are still very annoying and I would bet that this is because of the integrity of the encryption My Suggestion Eliminate the trade off between security and convenience Every feature that makes the usage more smoothly but on the other hand compromises security integrity privacy should be opt in opt out with reasonable defaults or a wizard to set them I assume that this could help signal to differentiate itself from the competition e g WhatsApp Threema Telegram while makeing it smoothly and even more secure and trustworthy at the same time Some examples Convenience features that should be defeatable The sync of my contacts and everything that is connected to it The option could be something like Stop uploading my contactlist to the servers with an explanation what that means to usability Annoying features that kill the user experience when re registering or reinstalling the app my friends need to manually add me to our groups My guess would be that this is because of the changed encryption keys however it annoys me The option could be something like Ignore key changes in all conversations with an explanation of what that means to vulnerability What do you think Is this even reasonable Do you have more suggestons of opt in features Best Regards

column2: It is impossible to revoke Google Drive permissions
column3: Bug description When I attempt to send a photo using Signal using Android the first new screen I am presented with contains the Recent photos These photos include photos uploaded to Google Drive and are not limited to just my device I would prefer if Signal did not have access to my Google Drive account I have checked if Signal has access permissions to Google Drive by checking the connected apps page on the Google Drive website itself and discovered that Signal is not even listed I have attempted to view permissions in the Signal app itself but I see nothing about disconnecting or connecting Google Drive Steps to reproduce Open Signal Tap on a contact you wish to message Attempt to send an image See that your Recent photos contain Google Drive photos sigh because you do not want to see those photos in Signal at all Actual behavior Signal has access to Google Drive photos Expected behavior Signal should not have access to my Google Drive photos Device info replace the examples with your info Device Huawei Nexus 6P Android version N Signal version 3 16 1

column2: Message Compose Enhancement
column3: Steps to reproduce Open Signal and compose a long SMS message Issue The message text will be typed and previous written text will be out of the user views and the only way to view the text is to grab and scroll vertically Fix Text should be composed in line by line horizontally instead of a vertical line of text This will make it easier for the user to see what they have wrote previously and change a word or edit spelling mistakes before they send a message Device Nexus 6P Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 16 1

column2: Signal is sending a large number of SMS messages
column3: I have searched open and closed issues for duplicates read Steps to reproduce Use Signal for texting I still have plenty of SMS is with my carrier Actual result Signal is sending a large number of SMS messages Do you want to allow this app to continue sending messages Deny Allow error When I click Allow it immediately reopens the exact same message Not sure if they are queued from every text I have ever sent but do not have the time to click Allow several hundred times Expected result This is an Android defense mechanism to make sure apps are not sending tons of SMS is in the background Allow should add Signal to a whitelist and the error should stop popping up Device info Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 16 1

column2: Signal freezes on Android 7 Preview 5 when trying to add an attachment
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Signal was working without problems on latest Android 6 0 1 on my Nexus 6 Today I have dirty flashed the latest Android 7 0 Preview 5 image I have wiped the cache partition afterwards Signal is working on Android 7 Preview 5 but when I click the paperclip button to add an attachment Signal freezes immediately The blinking cursor in the text input field stops blinking and the app does not respond to any further input After closing the app by swiping it off the recent apps list Signal can be opened again The same happens if I select the respective menu item instead of clicking the paperclip button Steps to reproduce Open Signal app Enter a conversation Click on paperclip button or select respective menu item to add an attachment to the message Actual result Signal hangs freezes immediately The cursor stops blinking and the app does not respond to any further input Expected result The attachment selection dialogue is shown so I can select an attachment to be added to the message Device info Device Motorola Nexus 6 Android version 7 0 Preview 5 NPD90G Signal version 3 16 0 Link to debug log

column2: comparing mac digests with Arrays equals
column3: Hi out of interest when comparing MAC digests current implementation uses Arrays equals ourMacBytes theirMacBytes in lieu of lets say the crypto friendly java security MessageDigest isEqual Not sure how relevant timing attack is in the context of the client performing such comparison in non constant time fashion but as a matter of principle in a crypto conscious app you would think that ought to be there regardless specially that MAC digests are already truncated relative to their original ful length values

column2: Fix ConversationItem recipients listener
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in my commit message Description Fixes 4420 which was introduced by 7838e8fbe0ad992407529be81d48cf9f686dc61d as said The idea of that commit was to correctly color outgoing audio message controls i e according to the conversation partners color But the recipient of outgoing audio messages is Anonymous so the conversationRecipients were passed in and used for that And it is only used for that In group conversations the conversationRecipients and its getPrimaryRecipient is a group recipient i e group name and photo so it must not be used to update a single conversation items color contact name and photo which is exactly what is happening in the newly registered onModified listener again as has already pointed out The diff is not so nice I have only created a new method setAudioViewTint FREEBIE

column2: Added Timestamp to PlainTextBackup
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Google Nexus 4 Android 5 1 1 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in my commit message Description Like requested in 5364 this patch adds a timestamp to the backup The file will be named like SignalPlainTextBackup 20160620201010 xml So yyyyMMddHHmmss as format To test it is just necessary to do a simple PlainTextBackup The import was adjusted too It behaves like this take backup filename stored in environment if not search dynamically for the latest timestamp based on filename and use that backup if not search for the old filenmae SignalPlainTextBackup xml for backwards compatibility

column2: Simplify updateNotification variants
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in my commit message Description Simplify the updateNotification variants There is only one very special caller with includePushDatabase true so that case can be moved to a dedicated method It is in PushDecryptJob masterSecret null includePushDatabase true threadId 2 is not a valid thread by default signal true As a result there are now only three variants of updateNotification instead of four FREEBIE

column2: Adapt registration and submit log to dark theme
column3: First time contributor checklist x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor Licence Agreement Contributor checklist x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Sony Xperia U Android 4 4 4 screenshots AVD Nexus 5 Android 6 0 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in my commit message Description I added DynamicTheme to three activities Then I replaced the background pane s with CardView s because there was an inappropriate shadow in dark theme In this process I also updated some icons because they were outdated inconsistent and did not fit to dark theme Roughly 80 of the additions are caused by indentation most ones in xml I can adapt it to a guideline if you hand me some for your xml files But the effect of introducing CardView s on indentation will be large anyway Possible further improvements that I did not apply RTL support for registration white phone icon 32dp round corners of CardView s center alert headline vertically in Android 5 and 6 marshmallow centering Fixes 2625 Screenshots log dark enter number dark connectivity failure dark connectivity failure light verification failure dark verification failure light verifying dark verifying light

column2: Do not play in thread notification sound in priority mode
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on Android 5 1 1 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in my commit message Description Currently Mode vibrate only sounds off RINGER MODE VIBRATE automatically suppresses the ringtone Mode none RINGER MODE SILENT also automatically suppresses the ringtone Priority mode is always also reported as RINGER MODE SILENT but it still plays the sound unless sound is off With this patch the in thread notification sound will never be played in priority mode Not even for possibly starred contacts but I think that is a smaller issue In case the proposed solution needs to be discussed 1371 is related Fixes 3337 FREEBIE

column2: Group messages that are only sent to some of the members may be sent multiple times to all users when attempting to resend
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description I have a large group chat of Signal users 12 and when a message is sent to some but not all of the members likely due to intermittent internet connectivity that message may be spammed when the user attempts to resend the message by clicking on it for details then manually clicking Resend to each member to all members the number of times the Resend button was clicked plus one if they received the message the first time Steps to reproduce Take a group message that failed to send to some users but not all users Click Resend on all of the users it failed to send to the first time For every time the Resend button is pressed all users will receive the message again if this time it is successful Actual result So I walked around a large building that I was in while on data sending messages until one of them failed to send to some users but not all I then walked outside of the building to where I had a good data connection and pressed the Resend button on all of the users Instead of re sending to just the ones that were clicked all users received the message and those that had received it the first time received it once more Expected result If a message fails to send to some users when I press the Resend button to a specific user it should resend the message to ONLY that user or to all users that failed originally but preventing the user from pressing the Resend button again unless the resend fails once more Notes All users that have caused the spam have been Android users I believe this might be caused by rapidly pressing all of the Resend buttons before Signal Resends the message Device info replace the examples with your info Device Galaxy Note IV Android version 5 1 1 Signal version 3 17 0 Link to debug log

column2: WIP unread badge on homescreen for all launchers
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates read Bug description Describe here the issue that you are experiencing Steps to reproduce using hyphens as bullet points list the steps that reproduce the bug Actual result Describe here what happens after you run the steps above i e the buggy behaviour Expected result Describe here what should happen after you run the steps above i e what would be the correct behaviour Screenshots you can drag and drop images below Device info replace the examples with your info Device Manufacturer Model XVI Android version 0 0 0 Signal version 0 0 0 Link to debug log immediately after the bug has happened capture a debug log via Signal is advanced settings and paste the link below

column2: Update PR template to help auto closing issues
column3: Contributor checklist x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these browsers Ubuntu 15 10 Chrome 49 0 2623 110 Ubuntu 15 10 Firefox 45 0 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in my commit message Description It is probably the eighth deadly sin to update the templates every week or if it was not before it is now Aaand here comes the but but this is important as this reduces micromanaging Using the Fixes 616 syntax in PR descriptions seems to only work if the PR is merged with GitHub But as merging that way is not the preferred method at this repository the referenced issues wo not get closed automatically and someone has to undertake the tedious task of remembering to close them manually However the Fixes 666 syntax also works from commit messages and without the aforementioned issue This way also fits with the repository is established workflow Thus we should encourage the contributor to use this method by making it a checklist item In short this change will help to prevent leaving orphaned issues endlessly wandering at the repository and releases them back to the light automatically ghost soon high brightness sparkles Edit If I can read correctly this new feature could also help

column2: Ignore fast sender clock
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly X I am following the Code Style Guidelines X I have tested my contribution X My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is X I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in my commit message Description Steps to reproduce the issue take phone A and set date time some hours or days into the future send message to phone B check phone B 1 The message from A will stay on top of the conversations list even if newer messages are received until B replies to A or B reaches the date time of A 2 In the conversation with A the message will show a wrong relative timestamp it will show now for quite a while This PR reduces the annoying effect of the fast sender clock by checking if the message was received before it was sent In that case it is referencing the time the message was received which is based on B is local clock FREEBIE

column2: Halloween easter egg Muting notifications in group chat messes up avatars names
InviteReminder from an SMS intent for a phone number displays the contact name from the previous InviteReminder
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description InviteReminder from an SMS intent for a phone number displays the contact name from the previous InviteReminder Steps to reproduce Open Android Dialer choose call history tab Click on a recent phone call you have had with a contact that has a name let is say ContactName but that you have not used signal with and select Send a message Signal opens and displays the invite reminder Take your conversation with ContactName to the next level from InviteReminder java Open Android Dialer choose call history tab Click on a recent phone call you have had with that has just a phone number listed with no contact name let is say PhoneNumber but that you have not used signal with and select Send a message Signal opens and displays the invite reminder Take your conversation with ContactName to the next level from InviteReminder java Actual result The InviteReminder displays the ContactName from the previous conversation Expected result The previous ContactName is not in the InivteReminder It looks like the InviteReminder is generally not displayed for SMS conversations with phone numbers no contact name so perhaps do not display the InviteReminder in this situation Screenshots screenshot 20160826 085815 Device info Device Nexus 5X Android version 7 0 Signal version 3 17 0 Link to debug log Not included but please let me know if you need one

column2: Message shown in status bar with enabled option Display in notifications Name only
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description The option Name only in the notification settings under Display in notifications is enabled If you only receive messages from one person this works as intended But if you have an unread message from one person and receive a new message from another person the text of the second message is shown in the status bar of the phone Steps to reproduce Change the notification settings under Notifications Display in notifications to Name only Receive message from one person do not read the message Receive message from another person Actual result The message from the second person should appear as New message in the status bar of the phone Expected result The actual message appears Device info replace the examples with your info Device Fairphone 1U Android version 4 2 2 Signal version 3 16 0 Link to debug log

column2: Notification sound incorrectly plays when viewing a conversation from recipient
column3: With my Nexus 6 Android 5 1 on priority mode TextSecure does not play notification sounds This is correct However with my phone set up as above if I send a message to someone and remain viewing that conversation TextSecure will incorrectly play the notification sound if that person replies to me

column2: Push message with new key marked as SMS in message details
column3: I received a push message telling me the new key blah blah for the contact reinstalled Signal I accepted that new key and the message shows up fine With the little padlock In the message details however it says Via SMS confused V 3 6 0

column2: UX Invite friends UI should make clear that invitation allows to select contacts and is not sent to all
column3: When I joined Signal I was asked to invite my friends I hesitated because I was afraid the invatation would be send to all my contacts many business contacts and rarely used contacts among Now again I wanted to do this manually be selecting Invite friends from the main menu This really makes the impression that the SMS would be send to all contacts without being able to preselect which contacts to send it to screenshot 2015 12 12 11 36 27 1 Input I can edit the message which is supposed to be send 2 Submit button Says Send SMS Of course I did not Do not want to send this to all my 300 contacts I just learned from the documentation at under option B Use the invite flow to share through SMS or other media at the bottom that one can indeed select the ones to whom the SMS should be send The UI flow should make it clear that Send SMS button does not immediately send the SMS It should be clear that I can select the contacts to whom the invatation is send The way it is now I assume that many users hesitate to use the bulk friends invitation This hampers the spread of Signal I am afraid

column2: Group Images are still not getting resized
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Sending a large Image f i 13MPixel 6MB jpg to a Group does not resize the Image to a lower dimension and filesize When you send the same Image to a single Contact in contrary it does resize the image This leads to a large amount of traffic use on both ends Group images should ideally be handled the same way as single contact images In a perfect version the user should be asked for whether it should resize the image or not This issue has actually been found and fixed 1 year ago here BUT it is still happening in the latest Version of Signal Steps to reproduce create a group add one or more contacts send a large image 13 MPixel 6 MB to this group Actual result The Image is not getting resized and Signal sends a whole 6 MB image to the group The group receives and has to download a full 6 MB Image Expected result You actually send a resized image 1280 xxxx 200 KB to that group The group receives and downloads just a 200 KB Image Device info replace the examples with your info Device LG G3 Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 15 2

column2: Recover lost imports for disappearing messages
column3: Contributor checklist x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Sony Xperia U Android 4 4 4 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Disappearing messages were disabled by 059ff3e Some code was commented out This code needed the two imports android support v4 view MenuItemCompat and org thoughtcrime securesms util ExpirationUtil But as the code was commented out an IDE does not recognize this As a consequence the two imports were accidentally removed when merging 5617 diff 8b6badc7254f2d75634d87a85bc9cd31L39 This PR recovers those two import statements so that a simple activation of the disappearing message feature will be possible FREEBIE

column2: Signal do not receive incoming SMS
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have X searched open and closed issues for duplicates X read Bug description Since the upgrade to Signal 3 18 3 i do not receive SMS nor acknowledgement of receipt Steps to reproduce Send an insecure SMS to a contact who do no use signal wait for the acknowledgment nothing happen Actual result Look like an idiot when you meet you friend and you have receive their message Expected result acknowledgment and response message Send an unsecure SMS to a ping call reporting service wait You never receive the acknowledgement nor the automated response Actual result No response nor acknowledgment Expected result acknowledgment and response message Try to buy something only with Visa secure 3D etc You never receive the one time password via SMS Actual result you never receive the confirmation code Expected result response messages The phone have been restarted signal is the default SMS application hangout is not setup messeger is not setup and do not have access to the phone SMS Screenshots screenshot 20160910 101216 The 33700 is ping call and automatic caller reporting service it automatically respond to reporting with an acknowledgment message 33700 is french public number the other number are scammer numbers Device info Device LGE Nexus 5 hammerhead Android 6 0 1 3067468 MOB30Y Memory 43M 10 97 free 192M max Memclass 192 OS Host wpef17 hot corp column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have X searched open and closed issues for duplicates X read This is a pretty straightforward feature request Right now saving media places it in the root of the media type eg the Pictures directory and backups get exported to the root of the device I would like to be able to specify an alternate directory to keep my device less cluttered In the case of media in particular it would be great if it would be possible to do in settings so that the user wo not have to choose a location in a dialogue every time they save something or if there must be a dialogue have it remember the last chosen location so the user does not have to navigate to the right directory every time

column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description On a current Android N running on a nexus 5X the registering fails with Connection Error logcat shows that the Intent com google android c2dm intent REGISTER fails with java io IOException SERVICE NOT AVAILABLE The registration works on other devices Steps to reproduce install Signal enter phone number tap on register Actual result The registration fails with Connection Error Expected result The registration succeeds Screenshots Signal does not allow screenshots at this point and the setting cannot be changed until registered Device info replace the examples with your info Device Google Nexus 5X Android version Stock Android 7 0 Signal version 3 18 3 Link to debug log As the debug log is not accessible before registering here is the relevant logcat exerpt

column2: Feature Request Distribute Signal w deterministic biuilds Gitian
column3: Deterministic builds Gitian is an excellent decentralized secure means of distributing binaries Gitian is a secure source control oriented software distribution method This means you can download trusted binaries that are verified by multiple builders Gitian uses a deterministic build process to allow multiple builders to create identical binaries This allows multiple parties to sign the resulting binaries guaranteeing that the binaries and tool chain were not tampered with and that the same source was used It removes the build and distribution process as a single point of failure Gitian is used in the Bitcoin project Yes there have been many issues e g 122 127 281 282 458 525 722 2858 3435 3954 4429 4430 regarding distributing Signal in other ways than via Google Play or Apple Store but I do not think my feature request is a duplicate of those

column2: Plans for Numberless accounts
column3: While contact discovery is useful for the usecase of an average user just wanting secure communication with their friends it is a huge security risk for activists Although Signal is not primarily aimed at activists there are no suitable alternatives on mobile Are there plans to improve Signal in this area Numbers are available to anyone in the group chat so adding someone to a group requires you have to trust them not to leak phone numbers There are no display names so having everyone introduce themselves to each other is tedious and requires adding each other to contact lists which is potentially a security risk as well Global display names would not solve the problem as you would need to use a separate one in your activism group chats and with your friends

column2: Android N Additional emoji Support
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Signal does not support the full range of emoji is now offered in Android N such as skin color I know Signal uses the Apple emoji is but it does not offer the latest emoji is incorporated into iOS either List of Emoji is on Android N List of Emoji is on iOS Is it possible to add support for the new emoji is supported by Apple and Google I know this is a pretty low priority issue but from a usability standpoint it stands out as an issue for non technical people who have been converted by their techy friends Would be nice to stay current on the flashy parts of the Android and iOS ecosystems so it is easier to be an evangelist and get people to convert to Signal Steps to reproduce Use the new skin tone emoji is using a keyboard such as google keyboard or Swiftkey Actual result Unicode support for skin tone are not supported in Signal Expected result Accurate depiction of the most recent emoji is used by Apple and Google Screenshots screenshot 20160915 141859 Device info Device Nexus 6P Android version 7 0 Signal version 3 19 0

column2: Multi row messages jumping to the left when opening a thread
column3: Send a message with at least two rows like XXXXXXX XXXXXXX The new row has to be made with the enter key not by writing a long message Open the thread and press back a few times The text inside the message will jump to the left

column2: Feature Mention users in group chat
column3: Feature description After typing in the compose text box in a group chat a popup should pop up and list group members When selecting one of them or when you type one name he should be highlighted as link After sending the message you should be able to open the chat whit this user The mentioned user should become a special notification like xy has mentioned you in chat chat name Screenshots mention

column2: Play sound when call ends
column3: Especially when the internet connection is bad Redphone calls sometimes break It would be great to hear a sound as soon as a call ends because I happened to continue talking quite often without noticing that the call is already over The feature is available in normal phone calls too so I think Signal should definitely have it

column2: Offer option to choose emoji font
column3: After reading and I would like to request a feature that the user can choose which emoji font Apple or Emoji One to use The default would be whatever is used now

column2: Option to display contact in terms of name and or number
column3: In order to counter shoulder surfing an option could be added to show a contact in name wherever possible phone number as is currently done and default option name only no phone numbers are shown anywhere unless contact is not in address book phone numbers only no names are shown anywhere only initial letter in contact avatar alternatively as name the same initial could be used as is used for the contact is avatar Places where this applies is the overview of contacts a dialogue notification drawer et cetera Implementing would greatly counter shoulder surfing in terms of with whom one is commuicating

column2: Feature Request Automatic backups exports as an option
column3: I want to see Signal to have a setting where it can automatically create a backup on the phone of it is messages SMS MMS etc and the key set in a bundle that I can backup to my servers for example to ownCloud There is already a way to export to clear text but this does not backup the keys And this is manual I need this otherwise wiping my device or switching to a new one is going to be painful Or to put it another way if my phone is lost so is all my messaging Who is not an advocate for backups Please

column2: Fix DeviceListLoader behavior on init and restart
column3: Contributor checklist x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Sony Xperia U Android 4 4 4 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Our DeviceListLoader does not start a loader upon calling initLoader or restartLoader It has to be forced to do this with forceLoad This is a known issue and further discussed on stackoverflow The reason seems to be that a loader is created upon init and restart I tested this but it is not started loaded After creation onStartLoading will be called This is implemented without functionality in android support v4 content Loader We have to provide the functionality by overriding this method That is what I do with this PR In my implementation simply forceLoad is called inside onStartLoading In the above discussions there are some checks suggested before doing this forceLoad But I think everytime we init or restart the loader we want fresh data to be fetched So from my standpoint the proposed checks are unnecessary in our case Replaces 5591 Fixes 4641 FREEBIE

column2: Need way to persistently mark contact as insecure contact
column3: We need a per contact setting to disable secure messaging and just use regular SMS Why I have come across contacts who are incorrectly considered to be Signal users That is to say Signal wants to send them encrypted messages over data but these people do not have Signal installed and claim to have never used Signal or TextSecure previously I assume the issue comes about from mobile number re use

column2: Signal Icon in App Drawer Home should return the user to last viewed screen
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description When Signal is called from the Recent Apps List or Overview the user is properly returned to the window they were last using However When Signal is selected from App Drawer or Home the conversation list is always displayed as if first being run This is nonstandard from other messenger apps and does not give the user the functionality they expect Steps to reproduce Select Signal from either Home or App Drawer Select a conversation Press the Home Key Select Signal from home or App Drawer Actual result When selecting signal from either the app drawer or home screen you are always presented with the same conversation list Expected result A New user expects selecting signal from the app drawer or home screen to return to the last open window be it the last conversation setting screen etc just as if they selected it from the recent apps list

column2: Disappearing message notification disappears in group thread but not in contact thread
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description When you change the disappearing message timer a notification appears but whether that notification hangs around depends on whether you are in a group vs contact thread Steps to reproduce Given I'm in a group thread When I enable the unreleased disappearing messages feature And set the timer to 5 seconds Then I see the You set disappearing message time to 5 seconds In five seconds that info message is deleted Given I'm in a contact thread When I enable the unreleased disappearing messages feature And set the timer to 5 seconds Then I see the You set disappearing message time to 5 seconds The info message never gets deleted Actual result Contact thread You set disappearing message time info messages are never deleted Expected result Primarily I expect the Contact thread info message to be deleted Though if you could make a case for why the notification should remain then at least it should be consistent across group and contact threads

column2: multiple devices support non Desktop
column3: Hello It would be great for Signal to support multiple android devices so people will be able to use it on smartphone and tablet simultaneously like in case of WhatsApp or Viber For many people this is a stopper to start using Signal Thanks in advance

column3: Hi I would like to have the feature to enter the chat or groupscreen by clicking on the unreadcounter in Android But on the first unread message is postion not on the last It would simplify large groupdiscussions

column2: Reduced quality of shared images
column3: Bug description Reduced quality of shared images Steps to reproduce share image via one of the following a gallery app within Signal or taking a picture with signal save shared image to phone and view details note resolution check details of original image compare resolution to that of the sent image notice that resolution is drastically impaired vs the original Actual result Resolution of sent image is much lower than that of the original image Expected result Resolution of sent image should be the same as that of the original image Other Thoughts Sending a full size 1080p video worked flawlessly in my test the resolution and perceived quality are the same between original and sent video Screenshots Device info Signal version 3 19 1 Device LG G4 Android version 6 0 Android security patch level 2016 06 01 Android Kernel version 3 10 84 Android Build number MRA58K Android Software Version LS991ZVC Android Security software version MDF v2 0 Release 1 screenshot 2016 09 29 08 56 08 screenshot 2016 09 29 08 56 21 Link to debug log

column2: Changing default SMS app away from Signal displays wrong settings page on Android 6 7
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Tapping on 'SMS Enabled' 'Touch to change your default SMS app' displays Android is 'Wireless networks' settings page The problem here is that while on Android versions lower than 6 this indeed used to be the correct place to change the default messaging app this has changed with Android 6 and 7 The correct setting pages are on Android 6 'Settings' 'Apps' 'Configure apps' cogwheel icon 'Default Apps' 'SMS app' Android 7 'Settings' 'Apps' 'Configure apps' cogwheel icon 'SMS app' Steps to reproduce In Signal when Signal is currently the SMS default app tap on 'Settings' 'SMS and MMS' 'SMS Enabled' Actual result Android is 'Wireless networks' settings page is displayed independently of Android version Expected result Correct settings page to change the default messaging app should be displayed which depends on the Android version used Device info replace the examples with your info Device LG Nexus 5X Android version 7 0 0 Signal version 3 19 1

column2: Use read receipt envelope timestamp to infer startExpirationTime of disappearing messages
column3: Link Android and Desktop with disappearing messages support Go to conversation list on Android Open a conversation on Desktop Receive a 10s disappearing message on Desktop Note that it is also received and marked read in the Android conversation list Wait 10 seconds Actual result Message expires from Desktop but is still readable Android Expected result Message expires on both clients at about the same time Note that it is not enough to start the timer when marking the message read You have to back date it by looking at the send time of the read receipt itself in case your client has been offline for a while

column2: Change String Broadcast to Broadcast MMS
column3: When I recieve a group MMS but use broadcast mode to reply two problems occur 1 Even though my answer is plaintext only and sent to each recipient individually it still seems to get sent as MMS instead of SMS This does not only increase costs but can also be an issue with some people not being able to read the message 2 I message is sent to myself as well It would also be nice to have an option to reply only to the sender of the original message

column2: Disappearing messages Window size of timeframe picker jumpy
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description In some translations e g German the vertical window size for the 'Disappearing messages' picker is changing when changing the selection from 'Off' to some timeframe This is because the description string changes from the rather short ExpirationDialog your messages will not expire to the rather lengthy ExpirationDialog your messages will disappear s after they have been seen Please add space for one or even two to be really sure more line of text in the description so the window size stays constant for both strings I guess this should suffice for any language PS Additionally I think it would look better if you added a bit of vertical space below the title 'Disappearing messages' as well Steps to reproduce does not apply to e g English Open conversation Select 'Disappearing messages' Scroll from 'Off' to some other timeframe Actual result Window size changes when switching timeframe Expected result Window size stays constant Device info replace the examples with your info Device LG Nexus 5X Android version 7 0 0 Signal version 3 20 0

column2: Build fails due to invalid checksums in build gradle
column3: The Android Play Services and play services maps were upgraded from 8 1 0 to 9 4 0 but the checksums in build gradle line 107 and 108 were not changed so the build fails Removing the lines solved the issue but the checksums have to be updated The same holds for com android support appcompat com android support recyclerview com android support cardview com android support design com google android gms play services base com google android gms play services basement and com android support support v4 I wonder how OWS builds the project Are there things not checked in or do they disable the checksums completely After that the build fails with Signal Android build intermediates res merged debug values v23 values v23 xml Error 4 Error retrieving parent for item No resource found that matches the given name 'android TextAppearance Material Widget Button Inverse' Error 34 Error retrieving parent for item No resource found that matches the given name 'android Widget Material Button Colored' I'm still working on that one

column2: Feature Request Ephemerous messages local AND remote
column3: Any plans to add the same feature as Wickr ie allowing one user to attach to a message a period at the end of which the message is destroyed locally and remotely on both the sender and receiver phones Like you can see on this screenshot of Wickr you set up a time bomb on every new message and all past message have an indication of when they will be deleted Wickr time bomb Signal allow this locally but not remotely such as Wickr does With this feature there would be no more reason to use Wickr over Signal Thanks

column2: Disappearing message can be viewed in notification dropdown preview without starting deletion timer
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Disappearing messages can be viewed repeatedly and without starting a timer when they are in the notification drawer Steps to reproduce Have message notifications enabled Receive a disappearing message Open android notification drawer to read message Actual result The message can be viewed without a time limit via the notification drawer Closing and reopening the notification drawer does not start the deletion timer either hence messages can be viewed repeatedly Expected result I would expect the message to be hidden until it is either opened in app to start the deletion timer or would expect to be able to start a timer by previewing the message in the notification drawer after actively clicking to read message I would imagine that this could happen in a similar fashion as is possible already when replying to a message directly from the notification drawer without fully entering the app Screenshots you can drag and drop images below Device info replace the examples with your info Device Oneplus 2 Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 20 4 Link to debug log immediately after the bug has happened capture a debug log via Signal is advanced settings and paste the link below If you want I can supply one but do not think this is necessary here

column2: Better panorama resizing
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly camel I am following the Code Style Guidelines camel I have tested my contribution on these devices Emulator Android 5 1 camel My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is camel I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax camel I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description We are downscaling images to avoid OOM errors The amount of memory needed is proportional to the amount of pixels This PR replaces the edge length constraint with a pixel count constraint to achieve better results for exotic aspect ratios e g with panoramic pictures To convert the existing edge length limits into pixel count limits I arbitrarily chose an aspect ratio of 4 3 so the memory usage and the resulting image size for a 4 3 image should be the same before and after applying this PR while 16 9 images should turn out a bit larger and panoramic images much larger than before Fixes 5574 Related 672

column2: Double tick color for read message
column3: OLD IDDUE Can you add a double tick color to show when a message is read So i can know when a contact read my message and my contact can see when i read a message also when i tap mark as read in notification tab If you can not add this feature I would like if you add a new button in notification tab so when i receive a message I can mark as read I can quick reply and ALSO I can SEND MESSAGE READ in that chat so I can tell someone that i have read his her message very quickly and simply in a tap thank you in advance EDIT

column2: Allow possibility to disallow disappearing messages
column3: It would be nice to have the possibility to always disallow disappearing messages if you never want a contact to put a timer on your conversations The person trying to set a timer could even get a message saying that the other contact refuses to have disappearing messages deactivated disappearing messages

column2: Notify with a sound when call drops

column2: better highlight conversations with failed messages
column3: When sending a message fails the current behaviour is that you get a notification about the failure I think it would be better to also display something like a red triangle in the conversations list mostly because you may swipe the notification without taking care of resending the message right away several messages may fail to send if you temporarily lose your connection and clicking every notification seems cumbersome to me it would just make sense for the sake of clarity And maybe move the failed messages to the top of the conversations list Thank you

column2: Increase JPEG quality slow down quality decrease
column3: Contributor checklist chicken I am following the Code Style Guidelines chicken I have tested my contribution on these devices Emulator Android 5 1 chicken My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is chicken I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax chicken I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description While fooling around with some test images I noticed that the compressed files would usually be much smaller than the file size limits First change increase the maximum JPEG quality from 80 to 90 However for many images this still did not solve the problem the algorithm would start at quality 90 and jump to a quality much lower than necessary in the second iteration Second change slow down the quality decrease between iterations by adding a Math sqrt call around constraints getImageMaxSize bytes length Example image 1 via push limit 420 KB before the second change To account for the increase of MAX COMPRESSION QUALITY and the reduced step size I also upped the max number of compression attempts by one and added a minimum step size of 5 I hope this makes sense If not feel free to ask And please test and report back Related 672 FREEBIE

column2: Shadow above the message text box when texts are covered
column3: This is how Signal currently looks when texts are covered This is what Google messenger does when texts are covered As you can see a shadow appears on the bottom of the message area on Google messenger and not on Signal This bottom shadow serves two purposes to visually communicate the presence of later messages and to provide consistency with the shadow on the action bar It would be great if this could be added to Signal

column2: GCM alternative for custom roms without gapps
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Signal does not notify me in case a friend has responded in chat when my phone is in standby or Signal is in background I do not have gapps installed and therefore lack of GCM Steps to reproduce Start a chat with someone Wait till he she responds Set Signal to background and turn your display off Check if you got notified automatically Actual result Sent messages are only received when Signal is running in front as active app Expected result Signal is informing me about new messages Device info replace the examples with your info Device Samsung Galaxy S 4 Mini GT9195 Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 20 4

column2: Keyboard should hide after Giphy search
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description After using the new Giphy gif search the keyboard should automatically hide when pressing the return enter button Great job on the app and all the hard work Steps to reproduce Go to Giphy and tap the search input field Type a search string and press return enter Keyboard is still displayed shows a shift in the top row on my phone Must use keyboard down arrow to view all of the results Actual result Keyboard is still displayed and obscures half of the screen covering all the sweet sweet GIFS Expected result After searching and hitting return the keyboard should disappear Screenshots Search string entry img src width 200 After pressing return enter img src width 200 Manually hiding the keyboard img src width 200 Device info replace the examples with your info Device 2013 Moto X1 Android version 5 1 Signal version 3 21 0 Link to debug log Captured immediately after the steps above Debug log

column2: Add search for Giphy GIFs and stickers
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description This is a feature request wish A recent update added Giphy support While I am not too convinced by the usefulness of this I understand that for many users it is very important However trying to find a useful GIF or sticker in Signal is a fools errand of scrolling through a myriad of rather low quality GIFs stickers does it just display the most recently uploaded ones A search field would in my opinion go a long way to make this more useful Steps to reproduce Try to send a friend a Thanks Obama GIF example specimen Select Attachment Giphy Scroll through endless list of other GIFs that do not express the sentiment I try to convey Actual result I give up before ever sending the message Expected result I should be able to find a GIF if I already roughly know what I am looking for Screenshots you can drag and drop images below Device info replace the examples with your info Device Moto X 2013 ghost Android version 6 0 1 Cyanogenmod Signal version 3 21 1

column2: Group avatar stuck to some old version after change
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description It seems changing the group avatar has a weird issue where it is stuck to some old the last successfully changed group avatar It is kinda weird that the old one can be from an entirely different group Also it is not just a local cache issue The wrong avatar gets actually sent to every member Steps to reproduce change the group avatar to a new photo Actual result group avatar is stuck to some old avatar possibly from another group Expected result group avatar should change to the new image Device info replace the examples with your info Device bq Aquaris E4 5 and Nvidia K1 Android version 5 0 and 6 0 1 Signal version 3 21 0 Link to debug log This is kinda shitty report Would be great if someone tried to reproduce I have this issue on two devices

column2: Crash when viewing thread with media messages
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description The app crashes immediately upon viewing a message thread that contains a media message i e image The thread can never be viewed not even in airplane mode It is also not possible to delete the thread moving to archive works but trying to delete from archive results in the same crash Because I expected it to be a corrupt database issue I have completely removed the signal app data and re registered my phone The app worked again but was more unstable than I previously experienced As soon as I received a media message the thread makes the app crash again like before Two things I did before I ran into those problems 1 Updated Fairphone OS from FP2 release 1 6 1 to 1 8 1 2 Updated Android Web View from Play Store I have no idea if any of those events are really related to the crashes though Just to try I have also uninstalled the Web View updates but that did not lead to an improvement Note The updates to the Fairphone OS should only have contained the latest google security fixes up to October and no other feature changes Steps to reproduce receive media message from contact try to open message from notifications or from contact list in app Actual result App force closes immediately Expected result Message thread should be displayed Screenshots none Device info Device Fairphone2 Android version 5 1 r4275 1 FP2 gms66 1 8 1 Signal version 3 20 4 Link to debug log immediately after the bug has happened capture a debug log via Signal is advanced settings and paste the link below

column2: Quick Reply
column3: I have X searched open and closed issues for duplicates X read Is there any chance you guys are working on a quick reply that is like Android 7 0

column2: Enhance Signal to allow transfer of arbitrary file types
column3: One of the requests that came out of the work to improve photo quality was the ability to simply send photos exactly as they are without reprocessing them In the other thread there are many good reasons why there is not an option to handle photos that way dealing with the previews display memory limitations etc It occurs to me that the way to allow this option to those that need it and also provide more utility overall is to provide an option to send arbitrary file types including photos without processing them There are currently choices for Images Audio Video when sending a message Just give us an option for Files Add an option to the attachment area for File If we pick a picture via the file option instead of the image option we just send the image exactly as is with no processing preview etc The bonus is it now works for any file type and I can finally send full resolution images without having to revert to e mail or something like that Giving us the ability to push them through as files however bypasses a all of the issues related to device memory preview etc Following the existing UI design pattern gives the user customizability over what is downloaded and when only wifi etc It also now lets us send any other document securely which would be a great bonus Not sure what the upper limit needs to be on the file size but even if it was as low as 10 MBs we could send full resolution photos

column2: Proposal GIPHY Support
column3: While Signal currently supports GIFs it requires storing them on your local device which is annoying Since GIPHY has an API for searching GIFs it should be plausible to implement a client side feature where the client finds a GIF using GIPHY and then sends it without saving it locally or temporarily saving it The only issue I can see is that GIPHY would be told that a particular person is a Signal user

column2: Make an additional app with android allowBackup set to true
column3: There is the app org thoughtcrime securesms which has 'android allowBackup' set to false I request to make another app for those who want to be able to backup Signal is data for example 'org thoughtcrime securesmsadbbackup'

column2: Lower memory consumption of Giphy browser
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices AVD Nexus 5X Android 6 0 AVD Nexus 5X Android 5 1 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description First of all showing multiple GIFs is very memory consuming On Android they are loaded into memory as bitmap and this needs much memory and causes e g this oblong discussion 672 Nevertheless we want to do some caching and keep GIFs we once downloaded for a while RecyclerView attempts to accomplish caching for us It holds views to be reused later scroll upwards Then the view showing the GIF can be recycled loaded from memory cache But doing this in memory with the bitmaps is not a good idea as they are rather large We should perform another way of caching There is also Glide which we use to load the GIFs into the RecyclerView It also offers to cache images the GIFs itself I assume not the large bitmaps Glide offers to do this caching on disk instead of in memory This alone should be sufficient for our purpose tl dr So this PR marks the GIF views as not recyclable So RecyclerView does not cache them in memory for later reuse But the GIFs are still on disk so that they do not have to be downloaded every time we scroll by them This caching was already implemented before Memory consumption with all GIFs loaded animated before 95 150MB after 70 100MB sometimes up to 110MB because of a lazy GC I suppose Fixes 5831

column2: MessageRecord s set disappearing message time to s is bad for 2nd person cases
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Using the following strings for both 2nd and 3rd person cases causes issues string value MessageRecord you You MessageRecord s set disappearing message time to s 1 s set disappearing message time to 2 s These rely on the assumption that 2nd and 3rd person singular verbs have similar inflections Many languages do not have this feature Even English has some verbs that do not follow this cf you say vs cat says I think we should replace MessageRecord you with MessageRecord you set disappearing message time to s You set disappearing message time to 1 s Edit Imaginary example in German Du hat die Zeit bis zum Verschwinden der Nachricht auf 5 Sekunden festgelegt exclamation FAIL exclamation Franz Biberkopf hat die Zeit bis zum Verschwinden der Nachricht auf 5 Sekunden festgelegt Device info replace the examples with your info Device Nexus 4 Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 18 1

column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Sony Xperia U Android 4 4 4 CyanogenMod AVD Nexus 5X Android 6 0 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description This PR adds a share button to VerifyIdentityActivity Actually a string is shared which consists of short description Our Signal safety numbers the safety numbers each block separated by one space and grouped by four blocks per line So they are formatted like in app I was not sure about two things add a line break after the safety numbers Removed the line break with 70cee84 But this commit can be dropped and the line break will be there again Maybe people sharing their safety numbers want to add further explanation The short description could also be placed in the subject of the shared intent EXTRA SUBJECT But not all apps accepting shared text make use of this subject For those apps there would be no description provided along the numbers Therefore I added 7ff6cde This commit can also be dropped Fixes 5798 FREEBIE Screenshots device 2016 11 12 191809 device 2016 11 12 191840 device 2016 11 12 191906

column2: Emoji implementation breaches copyright
column3: Signal includes the Apple Color Emoji library to render emoji is on Android The problem is that Apple developed it strictly for their own use and they are not licensing it to anybody This puts the Android version of Signal in a legal grey area This could be fixed by switching to an alternative emoji library For something similar to Apple is library Twitter is Twemoji could be considered

column2: Ca not register Signal from Faroe Islands
column3: I have X searched open and closed issues for duplicates X read Bug description Ca not register Signal from Faroe Islands 298 xxxxxx Steps to reproduce Start Signal choose country code 298 and enter 6 digit phone number Actual result Connectivity error Signal was unable to connect to the server Expected result The rest of the steps i e receive an sms for verificatition etc At one point there was an bug in a library that Signal uses so I would not even get this far in the registration process That got fixed But I guess that the same or similar error is still running server side Because if I Steps to reproduce Start Signal choose country code 298 and enter 6 digit phone number 0000 Actual result Connecting check Wating for SMS verification times out I get the option to make a voice verification or edit my number again Expected result Well since it is not really my number I did expect the SMS to hang Conclusion I am guessing that this is a server side issue with an old version of api util PhoneNumberFormatter java

column2: Disable notification sounds from phone while using desktop client
column3: Mobile phone plays notification sound for every message received when using desktop client which is annoying in e g office environment There should be an option to disable sounds while using desktop client Possible implementation Start a timer in the android app whenever a desktop client is used e g message is read sent or so for say 1 minute or configurable and during that timer do not play the notification sound If a message arrives while timer is active then keep a flag If the timer is reset by desktop interaction clear the flag otherwise play the notification sound after the timer expires This way the phone is mute while the user is having a desktop conversation but there will be a notification in case when a message arrives from a remote party shortly after closing the desktop client or so

column2: Multiple repeating notification sounds vibrations alerts are annoying
column3: I have been using the group functionality recently and I have found that if when I sync I use battery stamina mode apps will not sync while phone is locked I get a stream of notifications My vibration motor gets a real workout If there are 30 notifications I get 30 vibrate sound events in very rapid succession Running android 4 4 2 Please let me know what other information would be useful

column2: Turn on SMS delivery reports by default

column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Nexus 5X Android 7 0 0 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Describe briefly what your pull request proposes to fix Especially if you have more than one commit it is helpful to give a summary of what your contribution as a whole is trying to solve Also please describe shortly how you tested that your fix actually works This corrects the remaining strings affected by the transition from per user fingerprints to per conversation Safety Numbers as both participants of a conversation now share the same Safety Number Furthermore me and some other community members are wondering why safety numbers is used in its plural form safety numbers vs safety number in that context as there is only 1 common Safety Number for both participants which contains 2 encoded fingerprints identity keys I'm offering to change the plural form to singular for all affected strings in an additional commit if this is desired Please advise FREEBIE

column2: Use Signal language for media preview timestamp
column3: First time contributor checklist x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor Licence Agreement Contributor checklist x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Sony Xperia U Android 4 4 4 CyanogenMod x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in my commit message Description Fixes 3449 Before this PR Android is DateUtils is used to get the timespan string in MediaPreviewActivity This class' methods have no parameters to provide a locale So I had to write our own method to get the timespan This method will respect the language set inside Signal We also could use the same timespan string like in the message bubbles or the conversation list But as there is enough space in the media preview action bar subtitle I decided to keep the unabbreviated format e g Monday instead of Mon or minute instead of min This required writing the new method FREEBIE
