column2: Allow swipe gestures in image preview
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Sony Xperia U Android 4 4 4 AVD Nexus 5X Android 6 0 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description I added a ViewPager to MediaPreviewActivity It shows all images of a thread and allows swipe gestures to navigate between images The information in the action bar recipient date is updated accordingly I also implemented a paging lock when an image is zoomed in paging is disabled Further image draft previews introduced in are still supported Those are handled differently and allow no swipe gestures as there can only be one image draft per thread And as drafts are not integrated in MediaOverviewActivity either I wanted to achieve consistency by not adding them to the thread gallery in MediaPreviewActivity The appearance of MediaPreviewActivity did not change Just for image draft previews the sent date is replaced by Draft see screenshot Fixes 2355 FREEBIE Screenshots outdated as of 2016 10 30 device 2016 10 23 154246

column2: Push to talk is enabled in SMS Mode
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have X searched open and closed issues for duplicates X read Bug description Signal lets you send voice notes even if it is plaintext sms Therefore GSM message And therefore extremely expensive Steps to reproduce Have Signal installed as your default messenger Use it to send regular SMS Open conctact who is not a Signal user Press push to talk Send voice note Actual result Voice note is send Since it is transmitted via GSM it is converted to an MMS message And MMS messages are extremely expensive I pay 0 49 for a single one I know that in other countrys you pay a lot less if at all So I wanted to you to be aware of it Expected result I do not know really know to be honest Just hide it in sms mode works for me But at the same time is probably quite annoying for someone who does not have to pay for mms messages and would like to use that feature even in sms mode Differentiate userbase for location and mms fees and hide show push to talk button accordingly is probably a PITA Sorry no easy solution here But I can see people using the voice notes And paying a hefty bill afterwards Which although it is the users fault could lead to bad Signal reputation Screenshots you can drag and drop images below Device info replace the examples with your info Device should not matter Android version should not matter Signal version 3 23 0 Cheers have a nice day Link to debug log immediately after the bug has happened capture a debug log via Signal is advanced settings and paste the link below

column2: FREEBIE Reintroduced the encrypted backup of messages and keys Removed the n
column3: You can remove this first section if you have contributed before First time contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor Licence Agreement Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Sony XPeria Z1 Compact Android 4 4 4 Acer Z205 Android 4 4 2 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Reintroduced the encrypted backup of messages and keys I prevented the native libraries from getting backupped because they will give problems when restoring between different versions or architectures Signal now needs a restart after restoring an encrypted backup this was far easier to implement than figuring out which data had to be reinitialized

column2: Signal calls fail sometimes since upgrading to Android 7 0 Nougat on Galaxy S7 Edge
column3: I have X searched open and closed issues for duplicates X read Bug description I recently upgraded my Galaxy S7 Edge to Android 7 0 as part of a beta program before Android 7 0 is rolled out publicly on the Samsung S7 series phones After upgrading and doing a full factory reset I reinstalled Signal I am now experiencing a bug where after I make a call with Signal future calls either incoming or outgoing fail If I try to make an outgoing call no call is placed and I see a broken interface with no buttons screenshot and I have to use my phone is back button to exit Full functionality can only be restored by either rebooting my phone or force stopping the Signal app Steps to reproduce Place or Receive 1st Signal call so far everything seems to work I or recipient answers the call we are able to converse Call is terminated either by myself or the other party Try to place another Signal call Broken incomplete interface is displayed and I have to back out of the screen No call is made or received Actual result Broken interface is displayed and no call is connected Expected result Call should connect as expected and interface should display that allows one control the call Screenshots broken signal call Device info Device Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge G935T Android version 7 0 Signal version 3 24 0 Link to debug log

column2: Constantly crashing when trying to answer unknown group recovery request
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description I was testing 5876 The device that is trying to answer the request for unknown group details is constantly crashing on startup Steps to reproduce Devices A and B in a group A running current beta 3 24 0 B still on 3 23 0 Re install on device B sent group message from device A to B B receives message in unknown group update device B to Signal 3 24 0 sent another message from A to B Actual result Device A is crashing on startup since then Expected result Device A should answer B is request and not crash Device info Device A Nexus 5 Android version Stock Android 5 1 1 Signal version see above Link to debug log I can only send a Google Feedback report after the crash I get this in Android Studio Apparently PushGroupUpdateJob is trying to attach a group avatar The group did not have a custom avatar set I'm really hoping for a quick fix in the beta channel Thanks

column2: incorrect labling of button
column3: Dear Devs First kindly accept my kind gratitude for including the voice note feature in Signal Private Messanger for Android Here I am reporting a minor issue which can easily be fixed The Record button or mic button is improperly labled In the left of the bottom part of the window there is the 'emoji' button then there is the edit box followed by the 'toggle attachment' button After that there is the record button I think but our screen reader Talkback announces it as toggle attachment button That is why we visually challenged persons are getting two 'toggle attachment' buttons which is a bit confusing Kind regards Pradip

column2: Automatically remove leading 0 in UK numbers stored in phone otherwise can receive not send Signal messages to numbers of 440xxxxxxxxxx zero after the country code
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Fresh installation the registration procedure completes successfully Basically nothing else works the contact list is empty I can receive secure messages blue lock Via Data Signal yet Signal prompts me to invite the sender Take your conversation with Xxxxxx Yyyyy to the next level I cannot reply I only see a big gray button ENABLE SIGNAL FOR SMS SMS and MMS are off and I would like to leave it that way but if I enable it then I'm able to see the contacts awkwardly duplicated e g xxxxxxxxxx and xxx xxx xxxx this situation lasts for months since the first time I tried signal I even performed an hard reset recently the phone is not rooted Note due to an operator switch my current SIM cannot always provide the correct phone number like in this case so I need to manually fix that It happens for other services as well e g WhatsApp without any problems Anyway as I said the registration procedure works Device info Device Nexus 5 Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 23 0 from Play store Link to debug log

column2: Deleted group reappears when contact safety number changes
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description A deleted group shows up again when a group member is security number changes so without exchanging messages in that group The group then appears to be in an inactive state i e sending messages is not possible Steps to reproduce Create a group group members A and B Delete group on device A you can even leave the group first Re install Signal on device B safety number changes Send a message from A to B Confirm safety number change notification on device A Actual result All deleted groups that contain B reappear on device A The only content is a safety number change notification see 848a25664b746f89b4435b01728247bf3d3135f4 Sending messages is not possible Expected result The groups should not reappear I was surprised to see that group information where still available at all Device info Android version stock Android 5 1 1 Signal version 3 24 1

column2: labling the unlabled buttons in Signal for Android
column3: Hi I am Pradip Sikdar a visually challenged android intermediate user I have started using Signal Private Messanger for Android recently and most of the part I am quite happy with it As you know we use screen reader technology to use our android or IOS devices So if there is a menu or button which is not properly tagged or labled the screen reader does not recognize it For example let is say there is a play button Visually there is a sign or graphics which represents that it is a play button But if the button is not properly tagged or labled as Play button our screen reader only says Button Unlabled So we cannot recognize what the button is So I am here by requesting to the developer of this nice application to lable all the buttons of this application For example when I am clicking on the toggle attachment button I am getting some additional buttons which are not labled So I cannot recognize them Thanks in advance from all the blind community Pradip

column2: Back button returns to registration screen
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description After installing signal I could not use SMS verification so I used the phone call verification After completing the registration process I noticed that hitting the phone is back button from the main Signal screen returned me to the SMS verification screen Steps to reproduce Install Signal When registering Signal allow the SMS verification to fail and then use phone call verification After registration completes and you are in the main part of the Signal app hit the phone is back button Actual result You are returned to the registration screen Expected result Navigating to a part of the registration screen should not be possible after Signal is registered Screenshots The screen that the back button returns me to screenshot 20161212 211252 Device info Device Google Pixel XL Android version 7 1 Signal version 3 24 1 Link to debug log

column2: Image stickers and scribbles OOM error preventable
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description I was testing Support for stickers and scribbles 1b44bdcd3cafee26f08327f4ba6d9462d5713875 on a phone that has only 768MB of RAM The picture to be edited was a 3000 4000 pixel w h 1 9MB jpg Tapping confirm after minimal editing resulted in a OOM error I got back to the conversation screen and conversation list by tapping the Android back button Entering the conversation again from the conversation list then let me sent unsecured SMS only which is a bad experience Fortunately force stop Signal solves the issue I wonder if the process would succeed if pictures were scaled before editing Sending the same picture without prior editing works as expected Device info Device HTC Sensation XE Android version CyanogenMod 12 1 Android 5 1 1 Signal version 3 25 0 Link to debug log I can provide more debug logs if relevant

column2: Emoji categories and ordering is incorrect outdated in 2 22 0
column3: Hello so apparently you finally made the switch for 2 22 0 But the categories and the ordering of the Emojis is outdated the ordering is actually not just outdated but also incorrect it would even have been incorrect earlier Over there you can read how the categories and ordering should be like Emoji Categories Prepare to re learn the position of your favorite emojis as they have all changed New categories have been introduced and emojis have been re arranged within the existing categories as well The new categories are People Nature Food Drink Celebration Activity Travel Places Objects Symbols Essentially many emojis that were previously in the People or Objects categories may now be in one of the new more specific categories Objects Symbols is now a catch all for the more obscure remaining characters The categories and ordering can also be seen on So could you please fix the Emoji categories and ordering Ideally before releasing 2 22 0 Regards

column2: feature request Possibility to disable multiple clients
column3: Hello There was a case in Germany some months ago where a suspects end to end messenger traffic has been decrypted by the German police In this case it was the application telegram But I started thinking about this issue and maybe the same hack could be used with signal too You might know that signal has a desktop application The German police used a desktop Application like this to get access to the messages of the suspect They just requested access to a desktop application man in the middle would the incoming Activation SMS and had full access to the messages 1 Is this possible with Signal too It would be nice to have an option to disable multiple clients 1 GERMAN sorry no english version available

column3: Because domain fronting will not work when for example you go to Egypt as a tourist with a number from another country it would be nice to be able to switch it on with an option When automatic detection of blocking is implemented this option could then be removed again Another question why not enable domain fronting for everyone In some countries Signal may not be blocked but contacting the Signal servers may give you a big red flag from intelligence agancies Is there some technical or other reason why activating it for everyone would not be a good idea

column2: This change fixes a logic bug that leads to a NPE
column3: You can remove this first section if you have contributed before First time contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor Licence Agreement Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices None x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Describe briefly what your pull request proposes to fix Especially if you have more than one commit it is helpful to give a summary of what your contribution as a whole is trying to solve Also please describe shortly how you tested that your fix actually works This change fixes a logic bug that leads to a NPE In the method isExemption the variables message and messageBody are dereferenced on lines 49 and 53 This will throw a NPE if either is null The null check on line 91 must have been meant to make sure neither is null However it uses which would allow the case value null and null value to pass the check and lead to the crash Using makes sure that neither variable can proceed as null and therefore prevents any possible NPE FREEBIE

column2: NPE when Signal syncs contacts
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Signal force closes with a NPE when trying to sync contacts Steps to reproduce There are two ways to reproduce the issue Go to Settings Accounts Signal Choose Sync now from the menu Shortly after a Signal has been closed from Android appears Open Signal to to Settings and retrieve log or Open Signal start a new conversation When selecting a contact to start conversation to choose Sync now from the menu Shortly after a Signal has been closed from Android appears Actual result Looking at the logs shows a NPE when processing the contacts Unfortunately the crash does not indicate which contact is causing the issue I have also seen it after completely emptying the address book so it looks like it is related to Signals contact mapping As a side note after I removed and restored my address book I have several contacts in Signal that only show numbers but not names When checking the contact the Signal entry is missing I can manually restore that to make the name show up again My guess is that those names do not have the Signal entry restored because the sync crashed Expected result Signal syncs successful and does not crash Device info Device motorola MotoG3 osprey reteu 2gb Android 6 0 36 MPI24 65 33 Memory 15M 15 00 free 96M max Memclass 96 OS Host ilclbld73 App Signal 3 17 0 Link to debug log Note this shows different timestamps since I grabbed it later when reproducing the issue again There is no change in the actual issue

checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description A friend tried to send me a just then taken photo On preparing the image for sending signal enters a crash loop The application becomes unsuable The crash loop can be broken by disabling wifi and mobile internet and deleting the faulty multimedia message Symptoms are similar to Bug 5310 the difference being that on my friends phone the error log shows an OutOfMemoryError which does not appear there Btw larger images sent without problems Even though the image displays fine everywhere else it might be faulty Steps to reproduce Download 20161210 133710 jpg from dropbox link below to phone Check sha256 hashsum to verify it is indeed the same image that crashes Singnal on my friends Samsung Enable Wifi Mobile Internet Send Image to another contact using Signal Actual result Signal crashes repeatedly every few seconds when not in use or when entering the application and becomes unusable Expected result Signal should catch all image processing errors and not crash Steps to recover from error Disable Wifi Mobile Internet Enter Signal delete faulty Image Message to stop Singal from crashing Image that crashes signal Versioninfo you can drag and drop images below Device info replace the examples with your info Device samsung SM G900F kltexx Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 24 1 Link to debug log immediately after the bug has happened capture a debug log via Signal is advanced settings and paste the link below

column2: Signal is censored in Cuba
column3: As I see from Signal does implement some ways to circumvent censorship This issue is mostly a report I'm not sure if anything can actually be done I have been in Cuba recently with Signal registered with an European phone number there are wifi hotspots in public locations The Signal servers are not reachable from Cuba I could not send receive messages It did work properly using Tor Orbot I see from the commit I referenced that Signal identifies censoring countries with their international phone prefix so I'm not sure if it would have helped in my case I did not try to register with a Cuban phone number

column2: Add support for bundled notifications Android 7 0
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Android 7 0 Nougat adds bundled notifications which allows the app to group notifications in a way that lets the user expand the group to work with each notification individually notification enhancements Currently when Signal has notifications from two or more conversations the notifications are grouped together into one notification that cannot be expanded preventing the user from preforming quick actions on the notifications without entering the app Implementing the new notification feature will allow Signal to continue to group notifications with the added benefit of preforming quick actions on each notification individually Screenshots you can drag and drop images below Bundled notifications example from Device info replace the examples with your info Device Nexus 5X Android version 7 0 0

column3: You can remove this first section if you have contributed before First time contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor Licence Agreement Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Pixel XL Android 7 1 1 Nexus 6 Android 7 1 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Firstly I apologize for the multiple commits and inclusion of some unedited files I was having trouble with the coordination on GitHub Sorry This addition creates a preference for the MMS carrier limits Signal defaults to a 300kb limit which is far below every US carrier I understand one of the main tenets of the Signal guideline is to not odd options but this is a minimal modification that adds a major benefit to those of us who would prefer Signal as our SMS client

column2: Country not supported for registration SMS
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Describe here the issue that you are experiencing Registration in Liechtenstein country code 423 does not work as the initial registration SMS is not received on the device The registration screen opens the number can be entered including the 423 prefix but the registration then times out waiting to receive a message After the time out when selecting the call me option no call goes through I assume this is a limitation on the servers end that does not allow calls texts to Liechtenstein to go through I assume that reversing the direction i e the phone calling the Signal server to get the code would not work as an attacker could spoof his her phone number Steps to reproduce Install Signal on Android phone Use Liechtenstein SIM card country code 423 Try to register Actual result Registration times out call fallback does not go through i e no incoming call is received Interestingly registration with an earlier phone and the same SIM card number worked 1 5 years ago Expected result Either a registration text message should be received or after the timeout a call should come in Screenshots Device info Device Nexus 5X Provider Telecom FL Link to debug log Registration fails so submission of debug log is not possible as the settings cannot be opened

column2: Server issue refuses New Caledonia numbers
column3: It is impossible to set it up in New Caledonia The app shows an error Connectivity issue I had a look to the logcat and the app sends a request to the server with this url 687xxxxxx If I access it in a browser I get this reply from your server code 400 message HTTP 400 Bad Request Then I tried a phone number from France and accessed the url 33xxxxxxxxx And it works well I get an empty response instead of a 400 Bad Request There definitely is a server issue not accepting New Caledonia 6 digits numbers

column2: Faroese phone numbers
column3: Phone numbers from the Faroe Islands have length of 6 digits The land code is 298 If I enter my number into the app f x 298 123456 the app will return the connectivityFailureLayout However if I type my number with a zero at the end 298 1234560 it will work This is not pratical as all my contacts will not be able to contact me encrypted because I always will reply with my normal number and not the one with a zero at the end I'm searching around in the source code and when debugging the application I find that the problem is maybe not in the app itself but in the online service Here is one log from the app Opening URL 298123456 And then the app receives a warning org whispersystems textsecure api push exceptions NonSuccessfulResponseCodeException Bad response 400 Bad Request And if add a zero to the end the 400 Bad Request error goes away I suspect you have a minimum requirement for at least 7 digits to be typed but could you edit that to 6

column2: domain fronting availability
column3: The domain fronting technique to circumvent censorship can be enabled for all users regardless of what mobile number they had used to register or will use to register Consider the case in which a user with a Canadian number already registered in Canada goes to UAE where Signal is blocked He must use a VPN solution to access Signal servers Signal can try main servers if it needs to establish a connection if failed then try again using domain fronting and this can be enabled for all users by default OR can be added as an option in the welcome screen first time registration and in the advanced setting page

column2: fix corrupt messages crashing Signal
column3: You can remove this first section if you have contributed before First time contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor Licence Agreement Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices nexus4 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Describe briefly what your pull request proposes to fix Especially if you have more than one commit it is helpful to give a summary of what your contribution as a whole is trying to solve Also please describe shortly how you tested that your fix actually works libsignal throws ArrayIndexOutOfBounds exception which terminate Signal Android if the serialized PreKeySignalMessage has the length zero This is fixing the crash in 5922 and stops this bug from being exploited by adversaries which want to disrupt Signal but not the cause of the malformed message I could only test if this works with normal signal behaviour since my device did not receive such a malformed corrupt message

column2: Fixes messages sent to self attempt 3
column3: You can remove this first section if you have contributed before First time contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor Licence Agreement Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Nexus 4 Android 6 0 1 Motorola whatever Android 6 0 1 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Describe briefly what your pull request proposes to fix Especially if you have more than one commit it is helpful to give a summary of what your contribution as a whole is trying to solve Also please describe shortly how you tested that your fix actually works Messages sent to self are now sent to all linked devices Credits to gulp21 and effigies Fixes 4844 Third time is a charm Since i cannot reopen the old PR because reasons so i open this one and go more into detail on why it works is objection was that this would cause Signal Android to attempt to create sessions with itself However when creating the OutgoingPushMessageList the messagesender does the following L402 Currently Signal Android always is the master device which always has the default device id 1 As you see libsignal adds messages to all slave devices since they are in the store is subdevicesessions A message to the master device is added if and only if recipient equals localAddress is true which is obviously not true if we send a message to ourself So if we do that only messages to our slaves are added and we never attempt to create a session with ourselves I have tested this commit on my own and on several of my friends' phones and it is working fine If you are worried that in the future Signal Android is device id may not be 1 do not worry here L434 is a fix for that which you could merge or incorporate

column2: Remove redundant ellipses in strings
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Nexus 5X Android 7 0 0 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Describe briefly what your pull request proposes to fix Especially if you have more than one commit it is helpful to give a summary of what your contribution as a whole is trying to solve Also please describe shortly how you tested that your fix actually works Remove redundant ellipses in strings according to Google is Material Design guidelines Quote Use to indicate an action in progress Downloading or incomplete or truncated text No space before the ellipses Omit from menu items or buttons that open a dialog or start some other process Midline ellipses three bullet glyphs are also used to represent numeric truncation and the redaction of sensitive data such as credit cards Edit I have not changed any string names so it should not be much work for translators as they can just take the old translations from Transifex' translation history feature and remove the ellipses FREEBIE

column2: Image Keyboard Support
column3: feature request Users often want to communicate with emojis stickers and other kinds of rich content In previous versions of Android soft keyboards also known as input method editors or IMEs could send only unicode emoji to apps For rich content apps had to either build app specific APIs that could not be used in other apps or use workaround like sending images through Easy Share Action or the clipboard With Android 7 1 API level 25 the Android SDK includes the Commit Content API which provides a universal way for IMEs to send images and other rich content directly to a text editor in an app The API is also available in v13 Support Library as of revision 25 0 0 We recommend using the Support Library because it runs on devices as early as Android 3 2 API Level 13 and it contains helper methods that simplify implementation With this API you can build messaging apps that accept rich content from any keyboard as well as keyboards that can send rich content to any app The Google Keyboard and apps like Google Messenger support the Commit Content API in Android 7 1

column2: Disregard
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Nexus 6P running 6 0 1 CM 13 0 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Consistency is a widely accepted usability standard These changes are intended to improve the consistency in the Preferences related activities Use SwitchPreferenceCompat globally The current implementation mixes CheckBoxPreferences and SwitchPreferenceCompats for boolean preferences Toggle LEDs on off using a switch This holds consistency with the current method of toggling of Notifications on off via a switch with customization options following the switch In the current approach one must unintuitively choose Color None Bugfix Until now changing a recipient preference from Default to another ringtone and back will have a radio icon indicating that the previous other ringtone is currently selected never going back to Default Recipient specific default notification and vibration settings now say Signal default ACTUAL SETTING instead of just Default This reflects how the global notification setting also says Default ringtone SYSTEM DEFAULT Clean up Global notification summary field is not used rather it is set to the current ringtone by the RingtoneSummaryListener Removed this unused field If there is any particular change that you disagree with please notify me and I will remove it from the PR Before and After Global settings before Global before Global settings after Global after Contact settings before Contacts before Contact settings after Contacts after

column2: getActiveNotifications throws an NPE on Android 6 0 1 mostly Motorola ROMs
column3: Edited by 4601 This issue is about a crash when opening notifications Most of the affected devices are Motorola is running Android 6 0 1 Original issue was about something else that was already fixed in the beta release at the time of reporting The original issue was turned into this issue from the second comment Original issue below for posterity I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description App crashes Steps to reproduce Unable to reproduce This happened twice within a short timespan as I was using the app Strangely the action I was performing at the time 1st crash sending a photo captured within Signal to a group conversation 2nd crash responding to a text message to a single contact was successful both times even though the app reported that it crashed Actual result App crashes and has to be relaunched Expected result App should not crash messages should be sent Device info Device Samsung Galaxy S5 Neo Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 25 4 Link to debug log 1st crash 2nd crash PS I also submitted the Google app crash report thing not sure if that is useful to the OWS crowd

column2: Some messages appear on Desktop but not on Android
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Sometimes messages are not delivered to my phone but they are in fact delivered to my computer The opposite also happens sometimes but this started happening with Signal 3 20 so I assume it is an Android issue Steps to reproduce 1 Turn off your phone and computer or Chrome at least 2 Have someone write you some messages 3 Start both Actual result Some messages will appear properly on Desktop but wo not show up at all on Android Expected result All messages should of course appear on both devices Device info Device motorola MotoG3 osprey reteu Android 6 0 1 33 MPI24 107 55 Memory 35M 3 56 free 96M max Memclass 96 low mem device OS Host ilclbld28 App Signal 3 20 4 Link to debug log

column2: Unread notification badges do not work on Huawei EMUI
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description I have installed Signal on a Honor 8 made by Huawei with EMUI 4 1 Android 6 0 I have noticed that Signal receives notifications on new messages and they are also listed in the notification area but the unread notifications badge on the app icon on the home screen is not shown In Signal support articles there is mentioned that badge icons are supported for some launchers see url So far I could not find out if this is a Signal or EMUI problem but Threema and Conversations show the notification badges Device info replace the examples with your info Device Honor 8 Android version 6 0 Signal version 3 26 2

column2: Crash after sharing xlsx as jpg
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Signal crashes after sending a shared Excel file xlsx which has been renamed to end with jpg Afterwards it can not be used anymore Steps to reproduce Rename a xyz xlsx Excel File to xyz xlsx jpg Share xyz xlsx jpg via signal to a contact Press the send button The app crashes Try to reopen the app Actual result The app crashes in step 3 and can not be opened afterwards step 4 The apps can only be restored to work with deleting all data via the android settings Expected result The best would be support xlsx files to be supported The minimum requirement in my opinion is that the app rejects shared files that are not supported and does not keep crashing in this case Screenshots n a Device info Device Aquaris M5 Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 26 2 Link to debug log A debug log can not be captured as signal crashes immediately after any restart attemp

column2: Use HTTPS for all support links
column3: Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Virtual device Nexus 5X Android 7 1 1 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Describe briefly what your pull request proposes to fix Especially if you have more than one commit it is helpful to give a summary of what your contribution as a whole is trying to solve Also please describe shortly how you tested that your fix actually works The support website is now available through HTTPS but the in app help button attempts open the link using HTTP making the user vulnerable to SSL stripping While I was at it I also updated the readme contribution guidelines and the issue template to reflect this change as well

column2: Avoid the hard dependency on Play Services
column3: You can remove this first section if you have contributed before First time contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor Licence Agreement Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Nexus 5X Android 7 1 1 Nexus 6P Android 7 1 1 Nexus 9 Android 7 1 1 My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description This is a revival of to avoid the hard dependency on Play Services The intention is to make further adjustments to make it more suitable for landing other than the currently blocked issue of being unable to support voice calls at least until webrtc support is implemented It needs to be changed from splitting isRegistered out from isPushRegistered to making a separate method to check for Play Services It does not necessarily need persistent state and the downside to doing it that way is inability to adjust to Play Services being installed later or removed It also needs to be adjusted to check for the presence of Play Services more precisely rather than whether it is functional This depends on the following library change being merged

column2: Disable audio controls in selection mode

column2: Duplicate messages being received during standard TextSecure messaging non group
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description In standard two device messaging signal messages not SMS one user receives some messages twice however the sender does not see the duplicate message in their history The log shows that around the same time the MessageRetrievalService logs a time out causing it to loop around for another go In reality both attempts seem to result in a message being rendered Steps to reproduce Use two devices Nexus 5 and Nexus 5x Proceed to have a secured TextSecure conversation Actual result Nexus 5 receives some messages twice Expected result Nexus 5 should receive exactly one message for each message the Nexus 5x sends to it Screenshots you can drag and drop images below Device info replace the examples with your info Device LGE Nexus 5 hammerhead Android version 6 0 1 2960889 MOB30P Signal version Signal 3 16 0 Link to debug log file cat log L229

column2: How can i still receive messages when the Signal application is closed
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Description I cannot really call it a bug more of a question Steps to reproduce Register a Signal account Complete the registration Register Signal on another device and complete the registration Close the Signal application with password enabled but occurs also without password enabled Send messages to the device with the Signal application closed Actual result Well like in the title from what I have saw is that the messages are not received until the Signal application is opened Is this the intended behavior I mean I also have WhatsApp installed that can receive messages even when the application is closed from the task switcher it seems that it has a background process service working maybe this is why Note that i have Notifications enabled Background Data is not restricted I have good Internet connection and using Android 5 1 1 Expected result Signal app should receive notifications messages even when the application is closed Thanks Device info Device Asus Zenfone Go Android version 5 1 1 Signal version 3 27 1

column2: Wishlist Groupselect Multiselect resent messages
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read I was in a room without internet i sent many messages pictures to another contact Of course textsecure signal told me that the messages was not sent After that i was in the need to resent every message manual The feature I'm missing is the possibility to groupselect multiselect every message which could not be sent and to resent it dependent on the sent time At the moment it is only possible to select one message click on the options and click on resent If I select two or more entry is this option is gone

column2: Feature request Indicate a new day ux
column3: I would like to request a new feature which would be some kind of indicator when a new day begins like it is implemented in other messengers like WhatsApp I think this would make searching messages that were sent on a certain day easier and it just structures the conversations Below you can see how WhatsApp handles it and I think a similar solution would be great screenshot 2015 05 10 12 09 39

column2: Call drops then Signal cannot re initiate the call from either party
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description So far in both of the last voice calls I have placed in Signal the call started getting choppy and breaking up after talking for a few minutes then eventually went dead When trying to re initiate the call from either end the Signal dialer shows up as a blank screen with no hang up button on the bottom Killing the app and trying to re launch and re dial does not fix the problem Calling on WhatsApp immediately after worked fine so it was not a data signal problem Interestingly the other party could not re initiate the call either They were also on Android I think but I'm not sure Steps to reproduce Dial a call Talk for a few minutes until the call breaks up and then dies Try calling back Actual result As described above Expected result Calls should not drop when there is a good Wifi cell signal and even if the call drops you should be able to call back immediately Screenshots Did not take a screenshot but I can add one if it happens again Device info replace the examples with your info Device Google Pixel XL Android version 7 1 1 Signal version 3 27 1 Link to debug log immediately after the bug has happened capture a debug log via Signal is advanced settings and paste the link below

column2: leaving a group turns off disappearing messages
column3: Bug description when a user leaves a group the disappearing messages setting is turned off for the remaining members of the group Steps to reproduce in a group turn on disappearing messages my group had 8 members verify that the disappearing setting is on hourglass on messages a member who was not the group creator left checking with the user to verify platform and version my android build showed creator set disappearing message time to Off immediately after user has left the group the group creator states they did not turn off disappearing messages following messages were not marked as disappearing previous messages disappeared correctly creator was able to re enable disappearing after noticing the problem and new messages are disappearing but the non disappearing ones are still there Actual result disappearing setting disabled when a user left Expected result disappearing setting should remain enabled unless turned off explicitly

column2: unable to receive messages if swiped off from Recents
column3: Updated 2016 02 27 Version 3 12 Nexus is ok x5pro still misbehaving The bug is likely in the rom But since there are so many affected devices and related regressions as system and apps are updated I will keep this issue open unless told otherwise 2016 02 23 Version 3 11 1 Affected devices Nexus 4 and Doogee X5 Pro Stock unrooted roms or rooted roms regardless Possibly dupe of This used to only affect the x5pro but now the nexus recently shown the same bug Also Whatsapp does not display this bug so this is likely a Signal issue workaround able android issue Previously Notes Version 3 8 1 This is was originally thought to be an OEM related bug Now it is been confirmed on two separate devices from two separate OEMs One of which is running a custom ROM Also I have no idea how process and memory management actually works in Dalvik ART so the terminology section is my ad hoc attempt to work around this Terminology Foregrounded Visible Full screened The running app Backgrounded Closed Still visible in the Recents tasks list Shown to be running under in Settings Apps Running Apps Daemonized Closed Not visible in Recents But still shown running as a service in Settings Apps Running Apps Killed Closed Not visible in Recents Not shown under Settings Apps Running Apps Scenario 2 clients 1 Nexus 4 works as expected 1 Doogee X5Pro misbehaving Working 1 When both phones have Signal foregrounded messages pass back and forth smoothly and instantaneously 2 When Signal is Foregrounded on one phone while backgrounded on the other a notification appears correctly 3 When the Nexus has Signal daemonized after being swiped off Recents while the X5pro is sending through a foregrounded Signal a notification appears correctly 4 When the X5pro has Signal backgrounded notifications appear correctly while the Nexus is sending them through the foregrounded Signal client Not working Swiping off Signal from Recents does not daemonize the process Instead it is killed and Signal messages fail to transfer SMSs still work I'm guessing a separate android daemon service handles that Extra credits When remaining opened under Recents Signal is indicated to occupy 26mb When daemonized it is 6mb Since I have no idea how Dalvik Android actually manages memory I can not say if that is address space virtual memory or resident memory or just what the Dalvik is process heap is pointing at TLDR Seems on some phones swiping off Signal from the Recents tasks list does not daemonize properly Instead Signal is closed off entirely and Signal messages fail to transfer Edit Updated reflecting further feedback And version

column2: DOS'ing self when turning phone on again after much texting with desktop app
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description App floods phone with nonstop notifications after desktop texting Steps to reproduce Turn off your phone Open the Signal Private Messenger app Do a bunch of texting with the desktop app Make sure to view all messages sent back at you Turn on the phone Actual result Watch your phone flood with notifications buzzing etc It will last for many minutes In my case almost 5 full minutes My phone died I needed to do a bunch of texting via the webapp and when I turned the app on again I basically DOS'ed my own phone It was going through messages slowly and individually since it gets the message first sends the notification and only then marks its read unread state Expected result From a user experience product perspective if I was opening the app after the phone was shutdown or reception was reentered or whatever I would not want to see the buzzing and have to wait I would simply see a single notification or perhaps no notification at all and be able to use my phone immediately tl dr I should not get a notification at all for a message if it was read on either platform Screenshots Not a single event so no screenshot Device info Device Moto X Pure Signal version 3 27 1 Link to debug log Can post this if necessary but a little uncomfortable with posting the raw debug log atm

column2: Feature Request Broadcast Msgs
column3: It would be nice to have a way to create a broadcast list to send msgs to those people who are part of this list individually That helps to keep a number of people updated about some subject without having to put all of them together in a group

column2: Personally identifiable information PII is being included in logcat logs
column3: I have X searched open and closed issues for duplicates X read Bug description On inspecting my own device using adb logcat I noticed that Signal is writing sensitive personally identifiable information to logcat Where 1000555000 is the phone number of one of my contacts There is one line per contact Steps to reproduce Install Signal Sign in Connect Android device to desktop computer running the Android SDK Use adb shell to inspect logs Impact If a device is rooted any app running on the device can have access to read sensitive PII If the user chooses to submit a bug report for any other unrelated app even on a factory device sensitive PII will be leaked This PII may be uploaded to a phone manufacturer s servers for crash report analysis compromising the security of that user s Signal contact list How to mitigate The offending Log i should be removed entirely If that is not desirable then some attempt must be made to write only a redacted or hashed version of the contacts' phone numbers

column2: Short authentication string SAS word pairs not visible on WebRTC calls
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description There are no SAS word pairs visible when placing a call with WebRTC This is not intended to be a critique of the crypto design or implementation of ZRTP but rather to reflect that two call recipients without knowledge of cryptography expressed concern that not having the SAS could result in possible interception of the calls The reaction was not related to the technical details of the Signal protocol but rather a sudden unexplained change in a ritual that accompanied previous usage of the service At least one call recipient was using the latest iOS beta I apologize if this is considered more to be a comment than a bug Steps to reproduce Place WebRTC call Look for previously existing SAS codes Actual result SAS codes are not visible and there is no explanation for why they are no longer there Expected result Either to see the SAS codes or in the case that they have been purposefully removed perhaps some other transitional visual indication of call security particularly vis a vis tapping or middle attack interception in lieu of the old SAS word pairs Screenshots you can drag and drop images below Device info replace the examples with your info Device Huawei Nexus 6P Android version 7 1 1 Signal version 3 29 2 Link to debug log immediately after the bug has happened capture a debug log via Signal is advanced settings and paste the link below

column2: Rotating device into landscape temporarily changes Signal is language to Android is default
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Rotating device into landscape temporarily changes Signal is language to Android is default Steps to reproduce Example 1 In Signal is settings set language to one that is not the default on your phone From the conversation list tap the pencil floating button contact list keyboard will open Rotate device to landscape with keyboard open Note that the button description right to the input field is displayed in Android is default language Example 2 In Signal is settings set language to one that is not the default on your phone In portrait mode open a conversation Open action bar 3 dot menu in order to check displayed language It is the one set in Signal Rotate device to landscape Open 3 dot menu in order to check displayed language It is the one set in Android Rotate back to portrait Open 3 dot menu in order to check displayed language It is still the one set in Android This is true not only for the 3 dot menu but for all kinds of texts within the UI E g the desciptions you get when long pressing a button Or the recpients list in a group conversation Or the settings decriptions Note You have to close an re open the element after rotating the device to experience the effect Actual result Language of many elements changes after rotating into landscape Expected result Language set in Signal stays no matter what Device info replace the examples with your info Device LG Nexus 5X Android version 7 1 1 Signal version 3 29 2

column2: Signal crashes when typing a message moving cursor in message
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have X searched open and closed issues for duplicates X read Bug description When I am typing a message and moving the cursor around to fix a typo every now and then the cursor is not responding as it should You select a position in the message try to delete a character by hitting backspace However not the character at which the cursor is pointing is removed but the last one in the message Continuing to correct most of the time results in a crash and restart of Signal A work around is to exit the message and go back to the entry screen message saved as draft opening it again and continue the message Not sure whether this is a quirk in the keyboard app or in Signal I have not experienced this on my previous phone Experia Z3 with Experia keyboard so it might be keyboard related Steps to reproduce Unfortunately I have not been able to come up with a sequence of steps to trigger this A range of messages go OK and then for some reason this weird behaviour occurs Actual result Signal crashes Expected result Signal should not crash on typing or correcting a message Device info replace the examples with your info Device Motorola Z Play Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 28 4 Keyboad used GBoard The Google Keyboard Link to debug log

column2: Signal reverts back to unsecured messages
column3: This is a bug report template By following the instructions below and filling out the sections with your information you will help the developers to get all the necessary data to fix your issue You can also preview your report before submitting it You may remove sections that are not relevant to your particular case Before we begin please note that this tracker is only for issues not questions or comments If you are looking for support please see our support center instead or email support whispersystems org Let is begin with a checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description When an SMS message is received from a user that DOES have Signal but does not want to use it at the moment Signal reponds via SIGNAL vs SMS It should respond in kind Also if you try to write an unsecured message to a user who has signal but wants sms and you leave the app and come back or compose and mms and then cancel signal reverts back to SIGNAL secured messaging Steps to reproduce Receive SMS from SIGNAL user respond to message SIGNAL will default to encrypted open new chat with SIGNAL user switch to UNSECURED leave app return to signal you will be back in secured mode Actual result SIGNAL defaults to SIGNAL Expected result SIGNAL should respond in kind when replying should remember preferences Screenshots you can drag and drop images below Device info replace the examples with your info Device Pixel XL Android version 7 1 1 Signal version 3 28 4 Link to debug log immediately after the bug has happened capture a debug log via Signal is advanced settings and paste the link below

column2: Message draft can get lost
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description A drafted message can get lost when you mistakenly open a conversation that has a drafted message and therefore go back to the conversation list immediately There is a quite noticeable lag until the message draft is displayed in the text input field The bug occurs if you leave the conversation before the draft has been loaded Steps to reproduce Add a message draft to a conversation Open that conversation from conversation list Immediately tap back button to go back to conversation list Actual result Message draft has been deleted Expected result Message draft should be kept Device info replace the examples with your info Device Nexus 4 Android version stock Android 5 1 1 Signal version 3 29 2

column2: Ringer Volume Too Low When Recieving Signal Calls with Beta Video Calls Enabled on both devices
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description On the Android Beta for signal with video calls enabled making a voice call to another signal user produces a low volume in ear only not speaker ring sound that is inaudible This happens for the call reciever If the call reciever prior to picking up the phone hits the speaker button the volume of the ringer reaches the expected volume Steps to reproduce 0 Enable video calls on beta on both recieving and calling device 1 Recieve signal call on either phone 2 ACTUAL RESULT Volume does not come through speaker only ear speaker EXPECTED RESULT load volume through speaker 3 Disable video calls on beta on either or both devices 4 Recieve signal call 5 Note that volume comes through speaker and is loud Device info Device Moto G 3rd Gen XT1540 Android version 6 0 Signal version 3 29 3 Link to debug log

column2: Add disappearing message time of 3 weeks
column3: This adds 3 weeks to the selectable times for disappearing messages 1 week maximum is too short for certain uses x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor License Agreement x I am following the Code Style Guidelines x I have tested my contribution on these devices Virtual device Nexus 5 Android 6 0 x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit This simply adds 3 weeks to the list for disappearing messages making the list feel more complete and allowing to have most conversations with this default setting 1 week is too short

column2: NoClassDefFoundError android graphics SurfaceTexture
column3: x read Bug description Since last week I am having signal crash at start up Wiped all data reinstalled did not help Log error is as following W System err 16403 java lang NoClassDefFoundError android graphics SurfaceTexture W System err 16403 at java lang Runtime nativeLoad Native Method W System err 16403 at java lang Runtime loadLibrary Runtime java W System err 16403 at java lang System loadLibrary System java W System err 16403 at org webrtc PeerConnectionFactory clinit PeerConnectionFactory java 21 W System err 16403 at org thoughtcrime securesms ApplicationContext onCreate ApplicationContext java 90 W System err 16403 at android app Instrumentation callApplicationOnCreate Instrumentation java Full log is attached Steps to reproduce Opening Signal Tap Signal Icon wait for signal to open Actual result White screen apears for a second then signal exits Expected result Signal should be opened and display my contacts Screenshots none possible Device info Device HTC Desire HD HTC ACE Android version 2 3 5 custom ROM Android Revolution HD 9 2 Signal version 3 29 5 and previous two beta releases Link to debug log can not do signal preferences are not accessible logcat instead logcat txt

column2: very loud gong when call connects
column3: I think the gong that is played when a call successfully connects is VERY loud I have had lasting pain in my ear from hearing it when all other volumes on my phone are normal This in combination with Signal is frequent issues with low call volume and the fact that this gong plays at a time when other call apps are done with connection signals have made me on several occasions position the speaker for max volume hoping to hear my call partner just to be surprised by the loud gong Please lower this sound or just double tap the sound that plays while it tries to connect

column2: aade4c7 degrades call quality
column3: 3 3 0 branch with 0e291a9509bb364b7595b88dae452df7c714ed7a as the latest commit The call quality is noticeably worse after this commit I tested several times switching between another 3 3 0 build up to cbc851bdaf9c33a3fa271ec1f668085373b08cf9 and the quality degrade is consistent When I adjust volume during a call there is a bluetooth icon in the overlay volume toast instead of the normal phone icon bt Huawei U8800 Android 4 0 4

column2: Crash when receiving call during a Skype call
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description Signal crashed when an incoming signal call happened during an established Skype call Steps to reproduce disclaimer I have not attempted to reproduce this I was on a Skype video call suddenly I noticed an incoming Signal call next thing I know Signal has crashed I do not remember accepting or rejecting the call I believe signal was still ringing when it crashed the Skype call was unaffected Actual result Signal crashed Expected result no crash but it is not obvious to me what the best next action should be Device info Device Samsung Galaxy S5 Neo Android version 6 0 1 Signal version 3 27 1 Link to debug log

column2: Group chat disappears from chat list if disappearing messages is on
column3: I have x searched open and closed issues for duplicates x read Bug description If disappearing messages are set the group name disappears from the chat list too Steps to reproduce Create a new group chat Set disappearing messages to a short time Let the disappearing time expire Actual result The group chat is no longer in the chat list Expected result The group chat should be empty but still in the chat list Otherwise I have to recreate it every time Device info Device Google Nexus 5X Android version 7 1 1 Signal version 3 29 5

column2: Beta call system Button to end call disappear when video is on

column2: use e164 for RecipientDetails
column3: Sibling devices do not like non e164 numbers so we should send the canonized number and not the one stored in Android is contacts Fixes 6093 FREEBIE You can remove this first section if you have contributed before First time contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I have read how to contribute to this project x I have signed the Contributor License Agreement Contributor checklist replace the empty checkboxes below with checked ones x accordingly x I am following the Code Style Guidelines I have tested my contribution on these devices none x My contribution is fully baked and ready to be merged as is x I ensure that all the open issues my contribution fixes are mentioned in the commit message of my first commit using the Fixes 1234 syntax x I have made the choice whether I want the BitHub reward or not by omitting or adding the word FREEBIE in the commit message of my first commit Description Describe briefly what your pull request proposes to fix Especially if you have more than one commit it is helpful to give a summary of what your contribution as a whole is trying to solve Also please describe shortly how you tested that your fix actually works I cannot test it right now since i do not have a Signal Android master device at hand

column2: Chromium app opened twice A MESSAGE FROM WAS NOT RECEIVED
column3: I am using Wire as a Chromium app on my Linux Mint PC When I accidently open the Wire app twice I can normally chat in the secondly opened chat window but in the firstly opened chat windows I will see messages like A MESSAGE FROM XXX WAS NOT RECEIVED ERROR 8550 You find the detailed error messages in the attached image I do not think that this kind of behavious is intended because it is very confusing for the user Especially after I closed the secondly opened chat window I continued receiving these error messages They stop appearing when I click on RESET SESSION wire
